Within the Mysterious Void, standing upon a five-colored lion, his radiance shines and illuminates Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into an immortal, his complexion like vajra, his neck bearing a precious wheel. Clad in a tortoise-patterned great robe, his light illuminates the ten directions. Amidst blue-green clouds, when visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a numinous tortoise, its three hundred and sixty patterns inscribed, mouth holding the Seven Stars. Seated beneath a flowered canopy atop dark clouds, his radiance gleams and shines, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into intertwining lights of white and black, their hue turbid and lustrous like jade essence. This is the reversion of the Mysterious Void’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Cavern’s fusion. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Cavern Radiance Lord, on the day of *Lidong* (Beginning of Winter), enter the chamber, face north, and bow five times in homage to the Cavern Radiance Lord. Click the teeth three times and visualize the Cavern Radiance Lord residing in the Jade Clarity’s Jasper Countenance Palace, within the Great Cinnabar Prefecture’s Vermilion Bird Village and Cliff Precinct. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s kidney palace and the double gates within. Softly intone the incantation:

*"The Cavern Perfected, lofty and pure,
The four seasons refine the immortal.
The Dao harmonizes with the Middle Primordial,
Transformations arise naturally.
Flowing nectar and mysterious showers
Bless and suffuse my body.
Supremely partaking of primordial auspiciousness,
Favorably and uprightly receiving grace.
The Supreme bestows the talisman,
The Primordial Lord inscribes the mountain.
Extinguishing the corpse of death,
Severing the roots of the womb.
The Eight Luminous Ones assist as wings,
Summoning the myriad spirits.
Descending with cloud chariots,
Conveying me to ascend the dawn."*

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing five breaths.

After eight years of practice, one may attain the mysterious ascent, where the Median Perfected descends to appear and bestow upon the adept the true scriptures and treasure talismans.

The August Supreme Jade Thearch is the qi of the Lofty Dawn. His taboo name is *Daning* (Great Peace), and his style is *Dayoushi* (Great Dark Beginning). His height spans thirty million *zhang*.

In the third month of spring, he dons a Seven Treasures Pearl Crown, wears a nine-colored tiger robe, bears the Golden Tiger Phoenix Seal, and girds the Spirit Tiger Jade Seal. Riding the essence of the Seven Primordials, standing upon the Vermilion Bird, his twelvefold flowery radiance shines resplendently within the Jade Clarity’s Cavernous Void. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a figure with a seven-colored precious canopy upon his neck, both hands holding the Dipper Star. Standing amidst solar brilliance, his radiance blazes and shines, above Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a human-headed figure with the beak of a Vermilion Bird, holding a solar emblem. Standing upon purple clouds beneath a flowered canopy, his light gleams and shines, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into intertwining lights of dark, yellow, and blue-green, coiling and entwining within the Purple Void. This is the August Thearch’s reversion of the August Supreme’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Lofty Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Jade Thearch, regularly on the first and fifteenth days of the lunar month, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow in reverence, and upon completing the homage to the Jade Thearch, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and with eyes closed, visualize the August Supreme Jade Thearch’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Cloud Palace of Supreme Clarity within the Misty Immortal Court of the Transcendent Metamorphosis Realm of Subtle Perfection. As his true form descends and reflects, let it enter between your brows. Silently invoke:

*"Radiant August Thearch, soaring in the lofty subtle,
Nine transformations of the Purple Origin, four qi refining brilliance,
Three harmonies in the Central Palace, five metamorphoses lingering,
Merging with the Thearch’s Unity, myriad qi converge in return.
Pacify the spirit in the Primordial Chamber, secure the nine gates,
Three divisions and eight luminaries, all true forms follow,
Together riding cloud-dragons, ascending in high flight,
Eternally partaking of the Thearch’s register, boundless and undiminished."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths of qi to conclude.

This is the secret teaching of the August Supreme’s Dao, concealed within the Purple Chamber. It is transmitted only to those whose golden names and jade characters align with the True. Those who receive it ascend as immortals, merging their form with the Thearch. To recklessly divulge it brings death, and seven generations of ancestors shall bear the burden, barred from immortality for ten thousand kalpas.

The Supreme Primordial Purple August Lord of the Loftiest Void, the qi of the Primordial Luminous Dawn, is named Zong Fanlian, styled Xuanshangmen, and stands fifty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of summer, he wears the Heavenly Origin Seven-Treasures Crown, a robe of nine-colored pearl and crimson cloud-light brocade, a girdle of Six-Mountain Fire Jade, and a sash of Spirit-Flight Purple Ribbon. Standing upon a five-colored lion atop a lotus, his radiance illumines the seventy-four directions of Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of five *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a human-headed figure with a tiger’s body, adorned with dark and yellow striations, his patterned splendor resplendent, his light illuminating the ten directions. Amidst purple qi, he stands upon the Five Mushrooms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a figure wreathed in golden light, a floral canopy upon his neck, clad in thirty-two colors, resembling a celestial immortal. His luminosity gleams and shines, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into intertwining lights of purple, yellow, and green, the three qi merging in primordial chaos within Supreme Clarity. This is the Purple August Lord’s reversion of the Supreme Primordial’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Luminous Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Purple August Lord, regularly on the day of *gengshen*, purify the heart and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow in reverence to the Purple August Lord, then turn north and click the teeth three times. With eyes closed, visualize the Purple August Dao Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Golden Radiance Palace of Supreme Clarity within the Purple Luminance Court of the Seven Origins Realm of the Floral Canopy. As his true form descends and reflects, let it enter the Purple Chamber Palace within you. Silently invoke:

*"Luminous Dawn scatters spirit, the Purple August absorbs brilliance,
Nine transformations of the Supreme Primordial, four refinements penetrating the subtle,
The Great Unity oversees destiny, the Duke’s Son preserves grace,
The Thearch-Lord governs life, the Three Origins harmonize in return,
In union with the True, blessings towering and majestic,
Spurring dragons to ascend, reaching the cloud gates above."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths of qi to conclude.

This is the secret essential of the Golden Chamber, transmitted to the Perfected of Supreme Clarity. Those who receive it ascend as immortals, their rank equal to the Lofty Perfected. To recklessly divulge or slight it brings servitude in the River Source, and seven generations of ancestors shall bear the burden, barred from immortality.

The Middle Origin Lofty Ridge Lord of the Purple Orchid Void, the qi of the Primordial Great Dawn, is named Huizhi, styled Tongdaye, and stands thirty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of autumn, he wears the Three-Flowered Treasure Crown, a robe of divine essence in seven colors, a girdle of flowing gold and purple insignia, and a sword of stone essence and golden light. Standing upon azure mist, his seven-colored tiger chariot radiates brilliance in thirty-two hues. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a tiger-bodied figure with a dragon’s head, adorned with five-colored striations. His luminosity gleams and shines, amidst azure clouds upon a five-colored lotus. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a three-headed phoenix, its nine-colored patterns resplendent, its light illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into intertwining lights of purple and azure, coiling like the rising sun. This is the Lofty Ridge Lord’s reversion of the Purple Orchid’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Luminous Great Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Middle Origin Lofty Ridge Lord, regularly on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, purify the heart and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow in homage to the Lofty Ridge Lord, then turn north and click the teeth twelve times. With eyes closed, visualize the Lofty Ridge Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Spirit Radiance Palace of Supreme Clarity within the Divine Metamorphosis Court of the Three Wheels Realm of Perfected Completion. As his true form descends and reflects, let it enter the Five Viscera and Five Cities Palace within you. Silently invoke:

*"The Great Dawn’s returning light divides the Void’s clarity,
Transforming and merging nine refinements and the Three True Wheels,
Spiritual effluence irrigates the gates of the Five Cities,
Securing the spirit and consolidating qi to seal the source of death.
Above, summoning the Lofty Void to gather the immortal host,
Soaring on feathered steps to ascend the Golden Gate,
Eternally partaking of the Thearch’s seat, life preserved in full,
Seven generations rejoicing together, freed from the Five Roots."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow three breaths of qi to conclude.

This is the Purple Orchid Precious Formula, revealed but once in ten thousand kalpas. Those who receive it ascend in flight, rising to Jade Clarity.

The Purple Void Jade Thearch Master, Purple Dawn Lord, the qi of the Jade Dawn, is named Ling Huixiao, styled Du Zhongguang, and stands seventy million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of winter, he wears the Seven-Treasures Flying Floral Crown, a robe of nine-colored purple brocade and floral skirts, and a tiger tally of seven transformations of the Dragon’s Radiance. Standing upon a five-colored lion, his twelve floral lights illuminate the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to a height of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a nine-colored phoenix, a plain ribbon in its beak, its patterned body resplendent, its light illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a human-bodied figure with nine raven heads, its nine-colored patterns radiant, its brilliance blazing and shining, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a radiance of purple, azure, and crimson hues, their primordial chaos entwined like intersecting clouds—this is when the Purple Aurora Lord reverts to the qi of the Purple Void Jade Sovereign, further receiving the refined essence of the Jade Aurora. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Purple Aurora Lord, one must on the day of the Great Year, enter seclusion in purity, face north, and bow with reverence in the heart to the Purple Aurora Lord. Knock the teeth thrice, close the eyes, and visualize the Purple Aurora Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Ninefold Palace of the Radiant Light Court within the Natural Realm of the Eternal Peace Ward in Supreme Clarity. As his true essence descends and reflects, it enters beneath the adept’s left armpit. Silently recite:

*"Nine Mysteries birth the Purple Aurora,
Imperial radiance blooms with jade splendor.
Thrice refined, it illumines the Spirit Palace,
Sevenfold it enters the golden sands of Li.
Exhaling and inhaling, I feast on youthful yang,
Rinsing and swallowing, I draw the sun’s blossoms.
Four transformations follow the turning seasons,
Wondrous visions guard the vermilion clouds.
Whoever masters this secret
Shall hand in hand ascend the Northern Peak."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow seven breaths to conclude.

This is the Golden Chamber’s treasured scripture—those who practice the true Way shall ascend and soar through Jade Clarity.

---

The Purple Void Three Primes Purple Essence Lord, primordial qi of the Purple Aurora, bears the taboo name *Ming Shangyao* and the style *Peng Daguang*, standing ninety million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of spring, he wears the Nine Primes Flying Aurora Infant Crown, a robe of cinnabar brocade and flying skirts, and bears the Nine Heavens’ Dragon-Script Tiger Tally. Girded with the Sun Essence’s *Yuyan* Sword, he stands upon a five-colored lotus, his neck adorned with seven-jeweled radiance. When visualized, he reverts to a height of nine *cun* and nine *fen*.

In the third month of summer, the Purple Essence Lord transforms into a youth with cloud-like topknots, clad in five-colored robes, holding a floral banner. His light blazes brilliantly, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a dragon-headed serpent-bodied figure, its azure and yellow hues resplendent, its radiance shining upon the Jade Void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a radiance of purple, azure, and white hues, their chaos like the mingled brilliance of sun and moon—this is when he reverts to the qi of the Purple Void Three Primes, further receiving the refined essence of the Purple Aurora. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Purple Essence Lord, one must on the day of the Spring Equinox, enter seclusion in purity, face east, and bow with reverence in the heart to the Purple Essence Lord. Then turn north, knock the teeth twelve times, close the eyes, and visualize the Purple Essence Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Treasure Palace of Supreme Clarity’s Cavernous Spirit Court within the Golden Phase Ward of the Ascending Joy Ward. As his true essence descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s heart chamber. Silently recite:

*"Purple Empyrean scatters vermilion spirits,
Cinnabar Empyrean gleams with jade clarity.
Three Primes surge with flying canopies,
Wandering the purple courtyards of the steps.
Return my natural qi,
Receive refinement to polish my jade form.
Nourish my taste with the moon’s waters,
Draw upward the essence of the vermilion sun.
Three blossoms unite in radiant vision,
Harnessing qi to hasten the eight steeds."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow seven breaths to conclude.

This is the Nine Heavens’ secret incantation, the Jade Chamber’s treasured scripture—those who practice its Way shall ascend and soar through Jade Clarity. To lightly disclose or neglect it is to consign oneself to the River’s source, barred from attaining immortality.

The True Yang Nine Elders Mysterious Unity Lord, primordial qi of the Cavernous Aurora, bears the taboo name *Ming Liulan* and the style *Xuantongbo*, standing fifty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of summer, he wears the Precious Aurora Permeating Essence Crown, a nine-colored cloud-patterned brocade robe, and bears the Supreme Lord’s Life-Spirit Seal and Dragon Radiance Cinnabar Script. Standing upon purple clouds, seated upon a seven-colored lotus, his light blazes brilliantly. When visualized, he reverts to a height of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into an infant seated within the Purple Void, crowned with a five-colored floral canopy, holding a banner of five sacred mushrooms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into moonlight, its azure hue dense and luxuriant, resting upon the azure blossoms above the purple clouds. His radiance flows and illuminates, penetrating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a radiance of azure, green, and mysterious hues, their primordial chaos entwined like intersecting clouds, their luxuriance surging through Supreme Clarity—this is when he reverts to the qi of the True Yang Elders, further receiving the refined essence of the Cavernous Aurora. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Mysterious Unity of the Elders, one must on the day of the Beginning of Summer, enter seclusion in purity, face west, and thrice bow to the Elders. Then turn north, sit upright, knock the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Mysterious Unity Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Flying Mystery Palace of Supreme Clarity’s Cavernous Supreme Court within the Three Passes Ward of the Nine Primes Realm. As his true essence descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s Gate of Life. Silently recite:

*"Cavernous Aurora refines true yang,
Mysterious Elders arise upon the void.
Four transformations alter the wondrous root,
Budding to bloom with the radiance of the bright moon.
Swift as the void, it halts at the cinnabar thoroughfare,
Harnessing the reins of the vermilion rhythm.
Bending to guide the exchanges of the dark realm,
Together they gather at the Ninefold Numinous Gate.
Subtle indeed is the merit of preserving the kalpa—
Who can fathom the floating and the submerged?"*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths to conclude.

Those who know the Mysterious Unity’s four seasonal transformations and cultivate them for nine years shall witness his true form descend into their chamber, enabling them to transform into the Great Void and ascend to soar through Supreme Clarity.

The Supreme Microcosm Heavenly Thearch, primordial qi of the Cavernous Origin, bears the taboo name *Da Chongshu* and the style *Yuandongdu*, standing thirty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of autumn, he wears the Nine Primes Flying Infant Crown, a seven-colored phoenix-cloud robe, and a belt of Night Radiance Treasure Seals with intertwined numinous white ribbons. Standing upon a five-colored lion, his body emits thirty-two hues of jeweled radiance, dwelling above Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into an immeasurable perfected one, his body wreathed in golden light, illuminating the ten directions. Standing upon nine-colored blossoms, he holds a golden bell. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into sunlight, its purple rays blazing upon the Jade Void, illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a radiance of white, azure, and green hues, their interwoven chaos like layered clouds—this is when the Thearch reverts to the qi of the Supreme Microcosm, further receiving the refined essence of the Cavernous Origin. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Heavenly Thearch Lord, one should, on the day of the Spring Equinox, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow twice and pay homage to the Thearch Lord. Then, turn north, sit upright, and click the teeth thrice. Visualize the Thearch Lord, who transforms with the four seasons in form and shadow, residing in the Cloud Radiance Palace of the Eight Luminaries Prefecture within the Three Perfected Realm of the Five Mornings in the Supreme Clarity. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters beneath the adept’s right armpit. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Cavernous Origin, transmuting numinous,
Nine-hued brilliance, resplendent and bright,
Revolving to merge with the Supreme Microcosm,
Four transformations perfect the true.
Jade Void, dense and flourishing,
Radiance blazes as crimson mist.
Embracing blossoms, rinsing in springs,
Fragrance soars in eightfold coils.
Gaze upward to feast on streaming splendor,
Refining and bathing my body.
My body transmutes and ascends,
Rising into the Nine Heavens,
Inscribed in the immortal registers,
Bound in affinity with the Thearch."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine times.

Those who comprehend the Thearch Lord’s four seasonal transformations shall have a lifespan equal to the dual unity of light. By cultivating his Way, one soars into the Supreme Clarity. Careless leaks or sloth will implicate seven generations of ancestors.

The Azure Numinous Yang Pacified Lord is the *qi* of the Vast Cavernous Origin. His tabooed name is "Degree of All Methods," and his style is "Great Illumination." His stature spans fifty million *zhang*.

In the third month of winter, he dons a crown of threefold essence and morning hibiscus, robes of cloud-patterned cinnabar brocade with flying feathers, and rides nine-colored lion steeds. He wears flowing golden fire bells, a sash of the Seven Origins, and his body emanates sevenfold transmuting light, resplendent within the subtle depths above the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into an elder, his head crowned with a flying dragon, mouth holding the moon, body clad in feathered robes, and hands grasping a purple sash. Upon the cinnabar clouds, he illuminates the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a tiger-headed human, five-colored and variegated, his light illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a radiance of yellow, green, and purple hues, chaotic and ascending into the Supreme Clarity like the sun’s brilliance. This is when he reverts to the *qi* of the Azure Numinous and further receives the refined essence of the Cavernous Vastness. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Yang Pacified Lord, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Spring, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow twice and pay homage to the Yang Pacified Lord. Then, turn north and click the teeth nine times. Visualize the Yang Pacified Lord, who transforms with the four seasons in form and shadow, residing in the Grand Tenuity Palace of the Six Harmonies Prefecture within the Vast Numinous Realm of the Cavernous Springs in the Supreme Clarity. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters the space between the adept’s two pellets beneath the axle of the chariot gate. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Cavernous Vastness erects the Five Blossoms,
Divine radiance bathes the Azure Numinous.
Merging with the Thearch’s unified *qi*,
Transformations follow the course of arising.
Penetrating and luminous, the primal spirit hall,
Unveiling the obscure to refine the cinnabar form.
Within the profound profundity of the Nine Origins,
In the vast emptiness, essence abides.
True effulgences illuminate the cloud palaces,
Resplendent, they shine upon the Three Clarities.
Revolving to reflect within the subtle depths,
Manifesting your form and name.
*Qi* enters the tranquil chamber of spirit,
Revolving to feast in the purple auroral chariot."*

Upon completion, swallow the *qi* thrice.

Those who comprehend the Yang Pacified Lord’s four seasonal transformations shall have a lifespan equal to heaven and earth. By cultivating his Way for nine years, one ascends in broad daylight.

The Supreme Primordial Three Origin Lords are the *qi* of the Morn Radiance. Their tabooed name is "Cloud Nurtures Jade," and their style is "Flourishing Mushroom." Their stature spans thirty million *zhang*.

In the third month of spring, they don a feathered crown of precious mystery and morning support, wear a purple *qi* floating-cloud brocade mantle, a nine-colored dragon brocade feathered skirt, and a waistband of flowing golden fire bells, tiger talismans, and dragon scripts. Seated amidst the Great Void, beneath their knees ever flow cinnabar, green, and white primordial clouds. Their light shines brilliantly, illuminating the ten directions. Within the subtle depths above the Nine Heavens, when visualized, they revert to a height of seven *cun*.

In the third month of summer, they transform into a single body with three heads, crowned with seven-tiered precious diadems, clad in three primordial flying-cloud brocade robes, and stand upon nine-colored phoenixes, their light illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, they revert to their true form.

In the third month of autumn, they transform into the seven luminaries’ radiant essence and jade light, resplendent upon the purple clouds, their luminous hues dense and flourishing like the sun’s brilliance. When visualized, they revert to their true form.

In the third month of winter, they transform into a radiance of purple, white, and yellow hues, luxuriant and flourishing like the essence of gold. This is when they revert to the *qi* of the Supreme Primordial and further receive the refined essence of the Morn Radiance. When visualized, they revert to their true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Three Origins, one should, on the days of one’s life destiny and the Grand Year Star, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow thrice and pay homage to the Three Origin Lords. Then, turn north, sit upright, and click the teeth nine times. Visualize the Three Origin Lords, who transform with the four seasons in form and shadow, residing in the Precious Primordial Palace of the Nine Mysteries Prefecture within the Morn Radiance Realm of the Jade Thearch in the Supreme Clarity. As their true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s nine apertures. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Three Primordials revolve the celestial origin,
Flowing auroras wing the Jade Numinous.
Vastly they ride the mysterious dispersal,
Wafting into the void of the Supreme Clarity.
Grasping my natural course,
How could transformations bear constant names?
Wondrous awakening begins the primal dawn,
Rejoicing in my myriad kalpas’ span.
Though the Great Auroras seem distant,
Their cavernous reflections oversee the sentient.
Together we hold the jade covenant,
Bound for the Nine Heavens’ chariot.
Swallow the three *qi* and cease."*

This is the secret Way of the Purple Origin Six Harmonies Palace. Those who comprehend the Three Origins’ four seasonal transformations shall not die. By cultivating their Way, one soars into the Supreme Clarity.

The Highest Supreme Primordial Lord is the *qi* of the Cavernous Contemplation. His tabooed name is "Precious Cavernous Penetration," and his style is "Illustrious Lineage of the World." His stature spans twenty-three million *zhang*.

In the third month of summer, he dons a crown of the Purple Origin, robes of cinnabar brocade with seven-colored *qi*, and wears the seven luminaries’ primordial talismans of the Vast Opening. He bears the three treasures’ summons to transcendence and stands upon five-colored lotuses, his light blazing and illuminating. When visualized, he reverts to a height of seven *cun*.

In the third month of autumn, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into a dragon-headed human, five-colored and variegated, his light streaming and illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into the image of three suns, their light reflecting the chaos and illuminating the Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into a radiance of azure and white hues, resplendent within the primordial *qi* and above the purple auroras. This is when he reverts to the *qi* of the Highest Supreme Primordial and further receives the refined essence of the Cavernous Contemplation. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Supreme Primordial Lord, always on the day of *jiazi*, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing northwest, bow twice and pay homage to the Supreme Primordial Lord. Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the Supreme Primordial Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Boundless Palace of Supreme Clarity, within the Heavenly Prefecture’s Sevenfold Phase and Ninefold Cycle, his true radiance descending to illuminate and enter the adept’s spinal repository of bone and joint. Softly recite:

*"The Supreme Primordial’s strategy moves,
Four seasons soar in emptiness,
Refining essence, dispersing *qi*,
Transforming into purple radiance.
Triple Treasure’s floral canopy,
Green chariots drift and hover,
Streaming light through rosy courts,
Illuminating the lofty subtle.
Come, transform my spirit,
Grow my feathered robe,
Lightly soaring in plumed attire,
Eight *qi* ascending in unison."*

When finished, swallow *qi* eight times and cease.

Knowing the Supreme Primordial’s seasonal transformations grants longevity of ten thousand years. Cultivating this Way allows flight to Supreme Clarity. Revealing its sacred script lightly brings death and loss of immortality.

The Supreme Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord, the *qi* of Primordial Cavernous Yang, is named *Xiaohua* and styled *Falingyao*, standing seventy million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of autumn, he wears the *Tongjing Chen* crown, a robe of five-colored tiger-patterned silk, the *Jiaoling Su* sash, and the Sword of Summoning Immortals. He stands upon a nine-colored lion, a circular halo crowning his head, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to seven *cun* in height.

In the third month of winter, the Supreme Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord transforms into a phoenix-headed human, clad in a three-hued feathered robe of azure, emerald, and purple. His radiance streams and shines within Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Supreme Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord transforms into a human-headed dragon, his patterned brilliance illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, the Supreme Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord transforms into a radiance of yellow and black hues, intertwined like ascending clouds. This is when he reverts to the *qi* of Purple Essence and further receives the refined essence of Cavernous Yang. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Threefold Primordial Lord, always on the day of *gengshen*, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow twice and pay homage to the Primordial Lord. Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the Primordial Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Emperor’s Palace of Treasure Clouds within Supreme Clarity, in the Threefold *Qi* Precinct and Intertwined Spirit Quarter. His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s great mallet bone at the skull’s gate. Softly recite:

*"Purple essence scatters radiant splendor,
Refining and transforming the ninefold *qi* court.
Square and round, the Threefold Convenience Repository,
Separating and uniting, altering fate’s course.
Spitting saliva to irrigate the sun’s root,
Imperial blossoms illuminate Purple Clarity.
Seek my lofty supreme Way,
Within the subtle lies the utmost numinous.
Who can turn my chariot?
With you, I bind a mysterious name."*

When finished, swallow *qi* three times and cease.

Knowing this Way, the Threefold Primordial descends in true form. Cultivating it for nine years allows flight to Supreme Clarity.

The August Clarity Cavernous Perfected Lord, the *qi* of Primordial Luminous Pristine Spirit, is named *Yuanbao Cong* and styled *Lixuanzé*, standing fifty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of winter, he wears the Three-Ridge Jade Dawn Crown, a seven-colored tiger-patterned robe, a belt adorned with flowing gold fire bells, and a seven-colored staff banner. He stands upon the Threefold Primordial’s flying clouds, his radiance blazing within the Jade Void. When visualized, he reverts to five *cun* and five *fen* in height.

In the third month of spring, the Cavernous Perfected Lord transforms, his head wrapped in a yellow kerchief, clad in a forty-two-striped ritual robe, holding a floral banner. He stands upon purple clouds. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, the Cavernous Perfected Lord transforms, his eyes closed in darkness, a floral canopy crowning his head, his feet treading upon lotus blossoms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, the Cavernous Perfected Lord transforms into a radiance of yellow and white hues, his light streaming and shining within the Great Void, illuminating the Ten Heavens. This is when he reverts to the *qi* of August Clarity and further receives the refined essence of Luminous Pristine Spirit. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Cavernous Perfected Lord, on the day of the Beginning of Winter, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing north, bow three times and pay homage to the Cavernous Perfected Lord. Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth twelve times. Visualize the Cavernous Perfected Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Cavernous Mysterious Palace of Supreme Clarity, within the Jade Phase Precinct’s Golden Infant Quarter of the Pure Tenuity Prefecture. His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the four boundaries of the adept’s mouth. Softly recite:

*"August Clarity’s standard dawns in radiance,
Numinous *qi* wings its ethereal ascent,
Drifting above the Ninefold Primordial,
Gently entering the Emperor’s dawn.
Gazing up, I draw the moon’s water,
Bowing down, I guide the sun’s root.
Cavernously refining the vast spirit *qi*,
Flowing fragrance to irrigate my true self.
Riding the course to seek the Emperor’s splendor,
My intent harmonizes to attain Jade Immortality."*

When finished, swallow *qi* seven times and cease.

Knowing the Cavernous Perfected Lord’s fourfold seasonal transformations, one may converse with spirits in three years. Cultivating this Way for nine years allows flight to Jade Clarity.

The August Supreme Four Elders’ Way-Middle Lord, the *qi* of Primordial Cavernous Emptiness, is named *Jingji* and styled *Haoyuan*, standing seventy million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of spring, he wears the Bright Perfected Seven-Treasure Jade Crown, a phoenix-patterned robe, the *Huoluo* flowing bells, and the Sword of Summoning Perfected Ones. In the third month of summer, the Way-Middle Lord transforms into a child, clad in five-colored robes, his mouth holding the Seven Stars. He stands upon white clouds. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, the Way-Middle Lord transforms into a human-headed serpent, five-colored and variegated, within the Jade Void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Way-Middle Lord transforms into clouds of blue, red, and white hues, intertwining within the Mysterious Void. This is when he reverts to the *qi* of August Supreme and further receives the refined essence of Cavernous Emptiness. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Way-Middle Lord, always on the day of the Winter Solstice, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing southeast, bow four times and pay homage to the Way-Middle Lord. Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth twelve times. His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s back’s earth gate at the bone’s hollow. Softly recite:

The Four Elders amidst the True Ones scatter flower-cloud chambers,
Their radiance revolving through the four quarters, transforming across the eight directions.
They exhale and absorb the Three Essences, their flowing luminance illuminating my palace.
The immortal soul and immortal spirit congeal, marrow knits, and the jade countenance forms.
Riding the void, they spur the clouds, soaring into the Great Emptiness.
When finished, swallow the *qi* four times and cease.

Those who know the Way-Middle Lord’s fourfold transformations shall enjoy a lifespan of ten thousand years.
Through cultivation, they summon the divine to descend; at noon, they ascend to heaven.

The Jade Dawn Supreme Great Dao Lord, primordial spirit of the Mysterious Void,
bears the taboo name *Xiaoxian* and the style *Bokuyao*, standing ninety million *zhang* tall.
In autumn’s three months, his head is crowned with a hundred-transforming divine-light jade coronet,
clad in a robe of flying frost-pearls, seven-hued tiger garments,
girded with nine-colored *li* silk sashes, and belted with dawn-light moon-bright bells.
Seated upon seven-colored clouds, his radiance streams and shines within Supreme Clarity.
When visualized, he reverts to nine inches in height.

In winter’s three months, the Supreme Dao Lord transforms:
his head wears a seven-light circular wheel, his body dons thirty-two-colored dharma robes,
and he stands atop nine-colored lions, his luminous brilliance blazing within the Supreme Clarity above the Great Tenuity.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In spring’s three months, the Supreme Great Dao Lord transforms into Lord Lao,
his head crowned with a horned kerchief, his body clad in tiger-patterned robes,
holding a golden talisman, standing upon five-blossomed mushrooms.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In summer’s three months, the Supreme Great Dao Lord transforms into a dual radiance of purple and yellow,
its luminous splendor intertwining within the Purple Void.
He reverts to the *qi* of the Jade Dawn and further receives the refined essence of the Numinous Void.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Great Dao Lord, always on the eight solar terms and one’s natal day,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing north, bow twice and pay homage to the Jade Dawn Lord.
Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth nine times.
Visualize the Jade Dawn Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons,
residing in the Supreme Clarity’s Rosy Pearl Palace, Sun Gate Prefecture, Purple Radiance Precinct, Golden Light Quarter.
His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s twelve spinal beams at the neck.
Softly recite:
The Jade Dawn bears lofty numina,
governing the Eight Clarities in total truth.
Jade blossoms drape the cinnabar chamber,
purple phoenixes illumine the cloud encampment.
They lead the Perfected of Mysterious Capital,
together refining the cinnabar essence.
Following transformations, the Five Spirits shift,
their luminous radiance brightening the Highest Numinous.
The primordial Dao has no boundless direction,
subtly I am wondrously born.
Command the immortals to bestow talismanic registers,
inscribe your form and name.
When finished, tilt the head and swallow the *qi* five times, then cease.

This is the exalted Jade Canon.
Those who know it shall live ten thousand years;
cultivating it for nine years, they ascend to Supreme Clarity.
Revealing its utmost subtleties results in death without transcendence.

The Central Yellow Elder Lord, primordial *qi* of the Five Luminances,
bears the taboo name *Wuyingsheng* and the style *Yunjiuye*, standing thirty million *zhang* tall.
In summer’s three months, his head is crowned with a treasure-jade dawn coronet,
clad in nine-colored cloud-patterned robes, girded with intertwining numinous purple sashes,
twelve-hued radiant light, ever standing atop five-colored lions.
His luminous brilliance streams within Supreme Clarity.
When visualized, he reverts to three inches and three *fen* in height.

In autumn’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into a jade lad,
his head crowned with seven-essence blossoms, clad in flying celestial feather robes,
holding a flowered banner.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In winter’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into a great immortal,
his entire body golden-hued, clad in seven-colored robes,
his neck bearing a halo of radiance, his feet treading lotus blossoms.
His luminous brilliance flows and shines.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In spring’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into a triple radiance of purple, green, and blue,
intertwining above the Jade Void.
He reverts to the *qi* of the Center and further receives the refined essence of the Primordial Five Luminances.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Yellow Elder Lord, always on *gengshen* and *jiazi* days,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing northeast, bow three times and pay homage to the Yellow Elder Lord.
Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth twelve times, then cease.
Visualize the Yellow Elder Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons,
residing in the Supreme Clarity’s Empty Radiance Palace, Golden Pearl Prefecture, Upper Essence Precinct, Prosperous Joy Quarter.
His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s four poles within the chest.
Softly recite:
Supreme Clarity connects to the Jade Void,
mysterious clouds disperse the cinnabar palace.
Four transformations diverge and flow away,
each metamorphosis alters its constant form.
Wondrous scenes ride the numinous and indistinct,
blending and merging to give birth to the void’s attendants.
Attaining the true lies in responsive union,
high and low mysteriously complete the pair.
In still contemplation, the self’s form vanishes,
the heart aspires to the Dark Ridge’s peak.
When finished, swallow the *qi* five times and cease.

Those who know the Yellow Elder’s fourfold transformations shall enjoy a lifespan of ten thousand years.
Cultivating his Way, they soar to Supreme Clarity.

The Great Ultimate Primordial Radiance Lord, primordial *qi* of the Supreme Fusion,
bears the taboo name *Daodaoshi* and the style *Dudaming*, standing thirty million *zhang* tall.
In autumn’s three months, his head is crowned with a morning-infant treasure coronet,
clad in seamless nine-colored unlined robes, girded with the divine tiger’s upper talisman,
belted with a treasure immortal’s sword, his neck bearing flowing golden radiance,
illuminating seventy-four directions, standing atop a dark turtle.
When visualized, he reverts to three inches and three *fen* in height.

In winter’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into a tiger-headed dragon-bodied form,
five-colored patterns adorning it, illuminating Supreme Clarity.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In spring’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into Lord Lao,
his hair unbound to the waist, clad in flying azure feather robes,
standing upon purple clouds.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In summer’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into a dual radiance of blue and red,
profoundly chaotic, intertwining above the Purple Void.
He reverts to the *qi* of the Great Ultimate and further receives the refined essence of the Primordial Supreme Fusion.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Primordial Radiance Lord, always on the day of the Beginning of Autumn,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow twice and pay homage to the Primordial Radiance Lord.
Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth three times.
Visualize the Primordial Radiance Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons,
residing in the Supreme Clarity’s Longevity Palace, Eight Misty Prefecture, Upper Prime Precinct, Assembly Numinous Quarter.
His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s stomach duct at the diaphragm’s gate.
Softly recite:

The Primordial Radiance penetrates the Mysterious, refining the form through the Nine Subtleties.
The Four Movements transform and shift, altering with the *qi* to rebirth,
birth merging with the true, flowing to illuminate the Eight Darknesses.
On this auspicious day, I ascend to report to the Divine Spirits,
seeking immortality and ascension, the Eight Effulgences aligned as one,
ten thousand expanses converging, to ride the streaming chariot,
ascending into the Nine Voids, to pay homage to the Three Pures.
Conclude by raising the head and swallowing twelve breaths.

Those who know the Way of the Four Transformations of the Primordial Radiance
shall live three thousand years. Cultivating it for nine years,
they shall share the same effulgence as the Perfected and ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity, the *qi* of Primordial Radiance Jade Fusion,
whose tabooed name is *Fu Shang He* and style *Ling You Hui*,
stands seventy million *zhang* in height.
In the third month of winter, he dons the Nine Origins Penetrating Heaven Crown,
wears the Nine-Colored Dragon Robe, bears the Central Chapter of the Three *Qi*,
girds the Intertwined Numinous White Sash, and stands upon the Threefold Plainness Clouds.
His radiance shines brilliantly, residing above the Upper Clarity.
Visualize him returning to a height of three *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of spring, the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity transforms his form
into a three-headed phoenix, holding a plain sash in its beak,
its body adorned with nine-colored feathers, resplendent in pattern and hue,
