This reverses the *qi* of Mysterious Quiescence, allowing you to refine further the essence of the Primordial Flying Sovereign. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Supreme Void Sovereign, on the winter solstice, enter your chamber and bow five times facing north. Upon completing your audience with the Void Sovereign, strike your teeth three times, and visualize him shifting with the four seasons’ forms and shadows within the Jade Clarity Sevenfold Jade Palace’s Northern Prime Prefecture, Tranquil Waters Hamlet, Supreme Goodness Hamlet. His true essence descends and reflects into the dark gate between your two kidneys. Then recite the incantation:

The Mysterious Quiescence pervades the subtle, dispersing the essence of the Void Sovereign. The Three Primes merge as one, the Flying Mystery streams forth in radiance. Divine youths irrigate and bathe, jade maidens scatter fragrance. The Primordial Father exchanges blessings, and fortune and prosperity befall me. The Eight Effulgences lend their wings, the Five Elders descend to their chambers. I behold the Supreme Spirits and meet the countenance of the Immortal King. Forever I enjoy boundless grace, soaring into the Great Void, light as a feather in flight, ascending into the Upper Palace.

This done, look upward and swallow ten breaths to conclude.

This is the Supreme Way of Mysterious Quiescence, concealed within the Purple Chamber of the Six Harmonies of the Most High. According to the statutes, it emerges but once in ten thousand kalpas, secretly transmitted to those destined to become Upper Immortals. Those who attain it become divine immortals, soaring into the Upper Clarity.

The Supreme Lord of the Radiant Brilliance of the Great Luminosity, the True and Peerless Sovereign, is the *qi* of the Primordial Mystery and Void. His form measures ninety million *zhang*. In the third month of spring, he wears a crown of seven treasures adorned with flying blossoms, robes of five yellow and five colored emblems, bears the seal of the Three Essences of Solar Essence, and girds the sword of flowing golden radiance. He stands atop the Azure Dragon amidst the azure clouds, his luminosity resplendent and dazzling, penetrating and illuminating the Jade Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of nine inches and nine *fen*.

In the third month of summer, the Peerless Sovereign transforms his form into a human-headed dragon-bodied figure, mouth holding solar essence, his nine-colored patterns and hues illuminating the eastern quadrant. Amidst the azure auroras, meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, the Peerless Sovereign transforms into a nine-headed dragon, his nine colors resplendent and variegated, his luminosity penetrating and brilliant, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Within the Purple Void, meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Peerless Sovereign transforms into a radiance of blue and black, his light luxuriant and dense, penetrating and illuminating the eastern quadrant. This reverses the *qi* of the Great Luminosity, allowing you to refine further the essence of the Primordial Mystery and Void. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Peerless Sovereign, on the day of the beginning of spring, enter your chamber and bow nine times facing east. Upon completing your audience with the Peerless Sovereign, turn to face north, strike your teeth nine times, and visualize the Peerless Sovereign shifting with the four seasons’ forms and shadows within the Jade Clarity’s Dark Forest Palace, Eight Obscurities Prefecture, Golden Net Hamlet, Cloud Net Hamlet. His true essence descends and reflects into the central gate of your liver’s palace. Then recite the incantation:

Great Luminosity shines doubly bright,
Dispersing numinous essence like scattered gold.
The Mysterious Radiance bursts forth in eight directions,
Streaming essence and penetrating the yin.
The Peerless showers nectar,
Moistening and overflowing the Nine Perfections.
Within filled, without replete,
Fortune extends to the Seven Ancestors.
The sunken and decayed enjoy moisture,
Ascending to the Supreme Perfection.
My body receives immortality,
Soaring into the Moon Forest.
My form grows feathers,
Transforming at will.

This done, look upward and swallow nine breaths to conclude. Practice this for nine years, and your seven ancestors will all become immortals. Divine perfected beings descend, allowing you to behold their numinous countenances. Lightly leaking or carelessly revealing this, your body will vanish into the river’s source.

The Lord of the Three Primes and Four Poles, the Primordial Sovereign of the Void and Numinous Mystery, is the *qi* of the Primordial Phoenix and Void. His form measures eighty million *zhang*. In the third month of summer, he wears a crown of the Three *Qi*’s Treasure Dawn Jade, robes of five-colored, striped tiger fur, bears the Seven Primes of the Vast and Falling, and girds the sash of Intertwining Spirits. He stands atop the Vermilion Phoenix amidst the crimson clouds, his luminosity brilliant and resplendent, penetrating and illuminating the Jade Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of eight inches and eight *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, the Numinous Mystery Lord transforms into a three-headed vermilion crow, his feathers crimson, his patterns and hues resplendent and variegated, his luminosity brilliant and dazzling, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Atop the purple clouds, meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Numinous Mystery Lord transforms into three vermilion crows, each holding a fire bell in its beak. They stand atop the solar essence amidst the crimson clouds, their luminosity brilliant and blazing, brightly illuminating the southern quadrant. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Numinous Mystery Lord transforms into a radiance of blue and red, his light blazing and brilliant, illuminating the southern quadrant. This reverses the *qi* of the Three Primes and Four Poles, allowing you to refine further the essence of the Primordial Phoenix and Void. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Numinous Mystery Lord, on the summer solstice, enter your chamber and bow eight times facing south. Upon completing your audience with the Numinous Mystery Lord, turn to face north, strike your teeth twelve times, and visualize the Numinous Mystery Lord shifting with the four seasons’ forms and shadows within the Jade Clarity’s Cloud Forest Palace, Cloudy Upper Prefecture, Pure Han Hamlet, Luminous Simplicity Hamlet. His true essence descends and reflects into the purple gate of the upper beam of your heart. Then recite the incantation:

The Numinous Mystery pervades the true,
The Primordial Supreme unfolds its radiance.
The Three Primes merge as one,
The Four Poles’ spirits take flight.
Revolving essence and curving irrigation,
Myriad Ways open and penetrate.
The Three Luminaries gleam and burst forth,
The Jade Emperor lingers and tarries.
He rectifies my register of life,
Preserving the true in the Purple Tenuity.
I live as long as heaven and earth,
Unwaning for a hundred million kalpas.
Auspicious days and felicitous hours,
Enjoying towering fortune.

This done, look upward and swallow eight breaths to conclude.

The Lord of the Three Primes and Morning Center, the Yellow Radiance of the Void, the Primordial Sovereign of the Terrace of Mystery, is the *qi* of the Primordial Purple Void. His form measures sixty million *zhang*. In the third month of autumn, he wears a crown of the Seven Primes’ Treasure Dawn Infant, robes of flying brocade patterns, bears the Six Mountains’ Fire Jade, and girds the sash of Pervading the True. He stands atop the plain clouds, seated upon a seven-colored lion, his luminosity brilliant and dazzling, penetrating and illuminating the Upper Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of six inches and six *fen*.

In the third month of winter, the Terrace of Mystery Lord transforms into a human-headed, crow-mouthed figure, a treasure’s radiance crowning his head, his body clad in plain feathered flying skirts. He stands atop a lotus blossom amidst the purple clouds, his luminosity flowing and brilliant, penetrating and illuminating the Upper Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Terrace of Mystery Lord transforms into a perfected person, blue and yellow like vajra, a treasure’s orb crowning his neck, clad in nine-colored dharma robes. He stands atop the plain clouds, his luminosity resplendent and dazzling, illuminating the ten directions. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, the Terrace of Mystery Lord transforms into a radiance of red and white, his light resplendent and luminous, illuminating the Upper Clarity. This reverses the *qi* of the Three Primes and Morning Center, allowing you to refine further the essence of the Primordial Purple Void. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Terrace of Mystery Lord, on the day of the beginning of autumn or the first *jiazi* day, enter your chamber and bow five times facing west. Upon completing your audience with the Terrace of Mystery Lord, turn to face north, strike your teeth three times, and visualize the Terrace of Mystery Lord shifting with the four seasons’ forms and shadows within the Jade Clarity’s Cavernous Auroras Palace, Evolving Perfection Prefecture, Nine *Qi* Hamlet, Flourishing Radiance Hamlet. His true essence descends and reflects into the golden gate of your lung’s upper palace. Then recite the incantation:

At the Yellow Radiance of the Middle Prime, the Three *Qi* merge with the true, the Four Measures of the Void Sovereign refine and transform the Jade Heaven. Flying mushrooms overflow, bathing and molding my body. Preserve essence and secure *qi*, gathering the myriad spirits. The right tally erases death; the left palace confers immortality. Above, it is bestowed by the Great Void, the Five Elders sharing the same chariot. Transformations are boundless, the form taking shape in the Purple Dawn.

This done, raise your head and swallow the seven *qi* to conclude.

The True Lord of the Primordial Womb, infused by the *qi* of the Radiant Purple Reflection of the Three Primes, is born from the Void and pours into the true primordial embryo. His form extends fifty million *zhang*. In the three months of winter, he dons the Three Treasures Morning Crown, wears a dragon-patterned tiger-fur robe, bears the tally of the Supreme Sovereign’s command for immortality, and girds the Dragon Abyss Sword. Seated upon the Dark Turtle amidst the Three Simplicities’ clouds, his flowing radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Highest Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Primordial Embryo Lord transforms his form into that of a youth, his head crowned with the Seven Stars, his body clad in a five-colored crimson robe. He stands upon a five-colored numinous turtle within the Dark Void, his luminous clarity resplendent, shining brilliantly in the ten directions. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Primordial Embryo Lord transforms his form into one body with five heads, each crowned with a star. He wears a five-colored brocade robe, his feet treading upon five-colored clouds, his hands grasping a golden tally. Above the Dark Void, his light illuminates the ten directions. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Primordial Embryo Lord transforms his form into a radiance of white and black, its brilliance resplendent, illuminating the northern direction. This reverses the *qi* of the Three Primes’ Purple Reflection, allowing you to refine further the essence of the Primordial Fusion Void. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Primordial Embryo Lord, on the day of the beginning of winter or your natal day, enter your chamber and bow five times facing north. Upon completing your audience with the Primordial Embryo Lord, strike your teeth twelve times, and visualize the Primordial Embryo Lord shifting with the four seasons’ forms and shadows within the Jade Clarity’s Returning Fragrance Palace, Wind Dance Prefecture, Pure Joy Hamlet, Eternal Gold Hamlet. His true essence descends and reflects into the hidden gate between your two kidneys. Then recite the incantation:

The Purple Reflection shares the same heaven,
The Void gives birth to the Three Primes.
Above lies the Mysterious Constancy,
The Lord within the Dipper.
His body clad in flying azure,
Broidered skirts of radiant splendor.
Refining and transforming,
The Four Measures intersect and divide.
Bending his reflection to descend in form,
He bestows upon me the cinnabar script.
Crossing the tally to Nanyang,
Preserving immortality and enduring existence.
Wielding the tally to command the golden chariot,
Riding the radiance and mounting the clouds,
Merging with the true,
Ascending to the Golden Gate.

This done, raise your head and swallow the ten *qi* to conclude.

These Ways of the Three Primes are all bestowed upon the Highest Perfected. Those who do not descend to the lower world naturally lack esoteric names and may not gaze upon the numinous scriptures. Those who behold them will surely attain the rank of Highest Immortal.

The Lord of the Inner Radiance of the Azure Essence, infused by the *qi* of the Primordial Beginning Cavern, extends ninety million *zhang*. In the three months of autumn, he dons the Three Flowers Treasure Brightness Crown, wears a seven-colored mottled robe, and bears the intertwining numinous sash. Seated upon yellow, white, and azure clouds, his radiance blazes brilliantly, illuminating the Highest Clarity. Within the subtle depths of the Purple Void, meditate, and he reverts to a length of nine *cun*.

In the three months of winter, the Lord of the Inner Radiance transforms his form into one body with seven heads, clad in seven-colored dharma robes, a halo encircling his neck. He stands upon a nine-colored lion, his resplendent radiance intermingling, illuminating the Highest Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Lord of the Inner Radiance transforms his form, his head bearing the moon, his mouth holding the sun, his body clad in a tiger-patterned robe. His radiant hues shine brilliantly, sometimes standing upon purple clouds. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Lord of the Inner Radiance transforms his form into a radiance of azure, white, and yellow, its brilliance resplendent, illuminating the Highest Clarity. This reverses the *qi* of the Azure Essence Highest Perfected, allowing you to refine further the essence of the Primordial Beginning Cavern. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Lord of the Inner Radiance, on the day of the autumn equinox or the *gengshen* day, enter your chamber and bow nine times facing west. Upon completing your audience with the Lord of the Inner Radiance, turn to face north, strike your teeth three times, and visualize the Lord of the Inner Radiance shifting with the four seasons’ forms and shadows within the Highest Clarity’s Jasper Palace, Grand Cinnabar Prefecture, Vermilion Bird Hamlet, Steep Cliff Hamlet. His true essence descends and reflects into the hidden dawn gate of your left ear. Then recite the incantation:

The Primordial Cavern’s vast essence,
The Azure Perfected scatters numinosity.
The Nine Gates open the path,
The Three Primes illumine the portals.
Vermilion numinosity and mysterious reflection,
Jade flowers fly in the four directions.
Riding the dawn and commanding *qi*,
The Azure Youth and Purple Tenuity.
Golden light penetrates within,
A cinnabar radiance born upon the face.
Sharing the radiance of the moon,
Revolving with the sun.
Above, paying homage to the Highest Perfected,
Forever enjoying undiminished blessings.
Extending felicity to the seven ancestors,
The dead souls ascend together.

This done, raise your head and swallow the seven *qi* to conclude.

Practicing this for nine years will summon the descent of the lofty numinous, merging with the true and communing in countenance. Your body will generate water and fire, and you will ascend by flying to the Emperor’s Dawn.

The Jade Worthy Primordial Lord of the Nine *Qi* of the Great Yang, infused by the *qi* of the Primordial Jade Pillar, extends seventy million *zhang*. In the three months of winter, he dons the Heaven-Penetrating Treasure Radiance Crown, wears a nine-colored seamless natural robe, drapes a tiger-patterned fur, and bears the sash of penetrating the true. Seated upon purple clouds, his radiance blazes brilliantly within the purple clouds, in the depths of the Eight Darknesses. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Jade Worthy Primordial Lord transforms his form, his head crowned with a yellow dragon, his hands grasping the Seven Stars, his body clad in a yellow feathered flying skirt. He stands upon three-colored clouds. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Jade Worthy Primordial Lord transforms his form into an Old Master with three heads, his body like yellow gold, clad in a yellow brocade flying skirt and azure feathered mantle. He stands upon a lotus flower amidst purple clouds. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Jade Worthy Primordial Lord transforms his form into a radiance of white jade, its light pure and luminous, brilliantly illuminating the Highest Clarity. This reverses the *qi* of the Nine *Qi* of the Great Yang, allowing you to refine further the essence of the Primordial Jade Pillar. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Jade Worthy Primordial Lord, one should enter the chamber on the day of *Lidong* (Beginning of Winter) or on a *Jiazi* day, face north and bow three times. After paying homage to the Jade Worthy Primordial Lord, knock the teeth twelve times and visualize the Jade Worthy Primordial Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Clarity’s *Qiong* Palace, the Communion-with-Spirits Prefecture, the Three Perfected Realms, and the Longevity Precinct. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s right ear through the Gate of Hidden Dawn. Then softly recite the incantation:

*"The Great Yang radiates its essence,
The Jade Pillar gleams with clarity.
The Six Qi flow and spread,
Illuminating the Crimson Court.
Transforming the Primordial Cavern,
Refining and transmuting my form,
The Five Palaces open to the true,
The Six Stomachs bloom anew.
A flying skirt of purple,
Upper brocade and lower azure,
Three-hued streaming clouds,
A green chariot with dark canopy,
Wandering the mysterious path,
Conveying me to ascend to Clarity.
Once the Great Unity’s talisman is received,
The Primordial Lord witnesses my life.
The Nine Perfected share one destiny,
My Dao attains completion,
Transforming into the Great Void,
Eternally enjoying the Emperor’s numen."*

After reciting, tilt the head back and swallow the *qi* three times to conclude.

Practicing this for nine years will summon the highest perfected beings to descend, commune with the spirits, and converse with the divine. Through communion with the true, one attains eternal existence with heaven. Guard this secret, for revelation invites calamity.

The Supreme Primordial Nine Essences Golden Flower Radiant Primordial Lord is the *qi* of the Primordial Sovereign’s numen, with a form extending ninety million *zhang*. In the three months of spring, he wears a crown of Purple Primordial Morning Infant Jade, a robe of seven-colored luminous clouds, a sash of pure numinous silk, and bears the Banner of Demonic Annihilation. Seated upon a cloud of threefold purity, his radiance shines above the Highest Clarity, even within the subtlest realms. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of nine *cun* and nine *fen*.

In the three months of summer, the Golden Flower Radiant Primordial Lord transforms into a being with three heads and one body, his form like a phoenix, resplendent with patterns that dazzle and illuminate the Highest Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Golden Flower Radiant Primordial Lord transforms into a being with a human head and dragon body, five colors resplendent, his light illuminating the Purple Void from atop three-hued clouds. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Golden Flower Radiant Primordial Lord transforms into a radiance of purple, crimson, and yellow, its light brilliant and luminous, reflecting upon the Highest Clarity. This reverses the *qi* of the Supreme Primordial Nine Essences, allowing further refinement of the essence of the Primordial Sovereign’s numen. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Golden Flower Radiant Primordial Lord, one should enter the chamber on the day of *Dongzhi* (Winter Solstice) or on a *Tai Sui* day, face northeast and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Radiant Primordial Lord, turn north, knock the teeth three times, and visualize the Radiant Primordial Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Highest Clarity’s Palace of Bright Perfection, the Numinous Radiance Prefecture, the Heavenly Power Precinct, and the Wandering Joy Precinct. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s head and face. Then softly recite the incantation:

*"The Supreme Primordial blends with the Yellow,
The Three Qi distinctly clear.
The Golden Flower’s Cavern Chamber,
Named Radiant Primordial.
Illuminating the Dao through nine revolutions,
Four transformations merge with the clouds.
Above, the Jade Talisman is bound,
Below, the Cinnabar Gate is guarded.
Gathering the hun and securing the po,
Preserving the true in perpetuity.
Refining the form and transmuting the bones,
Marrow and brain transform into immortals.
Dragons soar and phoenixes dance,
Ascending to the Emperor’s chariot."*

After reciting, tilt the head back and swallow the *qi* nine times to conclude.

Practicing this Dao for nine years will summon divine perfected beings to descend and appear. The body will gain the power of transformation and the ability to fly through the Great Numen.

The Nine August Supreme Perfected Controller of Destiny is the *qi* of the Primordial Jade Numen, with a form extending fifty million *zhang*. In the three months of summer, he wears a crown of Cinnabar Flower and Purple Radiance, a robe of five-colored flying yellow cloud gauze, bears a golden fire bell, and carries the talisman of the Divine Tiger. Standing upon five-colored clouds, his radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Great Void. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the three months of autumn, the Controller of Destiny transforms into a phoenix, nine colors resplendent, his light dazzling and illuminating the Highest Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Controller of Destiny transforms into an old man, wearing a purple headscarf, a robe of seven-colored tiger-patterned brocade, holding a golden staff, and treading upon three-hued clouds. His radiance blazes brilliantly, illuminating the Highest Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Controller of Destiny transforms into a radiance of azure, emerald, and black, its light brilliant and luminous, reflecting upon the Highest Clarity. This reverses the *qi* of the Nine August Ones, allowing further refinement of the essence of the Jade Numen. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Supreme Perfected Controller of Destiny, one should enter the chamber on the day of *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) or on one’s *Benming* day, face east and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Controller of Destiny, knock the teeth nine times and visualize the Controller of Destiny’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Highest Clarity’s Purple Radiance Palace, the Seven Treasures Prefecture, the Northern Life Precinct, and the Flowery Palace Precinct. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s chest and abdomen. Then softly recite the incantation:

*"The Nine August Supreme Perfected,
Govern transformation and oversee life.
Controller of reckoning in the Southern Sun,
Overseer of the Crimson Court.
Once the Great Unity’s talisman is received,
The Five Elders record the name.
Nine revolutions and eight subtleties,
The immortal soul becomes luminous.
Three transformations and five refinements,
Decayed bones revert to infancy.
Flowering countenance and vermilion youth,
Eternally sharing the Emperor’s numen.
Preserving the talismans of sun and moon,
Outlasting heaven and earth.
Transforming without limit,
Ascending to the Emperor’s court."*

After reciting, tilt the head back and swallow the *qi* three times to conclude.

Practicing this for nine years will prompt the Controller of Destiny to inscribe one’s name, summoning perfected beings to descend into the chamber. The name will be recorded on the Cinnabar Terrace, ensuring eternal preservation.

The Heavenly August Supreme Perfected Jade Flower Three Primordials Lord is the *qi* of the Primordial Cavern’s numen, with a form extending seventy million *zhang*. In the three months of autumn, he wears a crown of Morning Tassels and Flying Flower Purple, a robe of five-colored mysterious yellow and purple, bears the Supreme’s Cinnabar Script Purple Seal, and carries a sash of Intertwined Numinous Purple Silk. Standing upon a nine-colored lion, his radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Highest Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the three months of winter, the Jade Flower Three Primordials Lord transforms into a woman, her hair styled in flying clouds, wearing a robe of purple and yellow flying gauze, holding the moon in her mouth, and treading upon clouds of yellow, purple, and azure. Her radiance illuminates the ten directions. Meditate, and she reverts to her true form.

In the three months of spring, the Jade Flower Three Primordials Lord divides her form into three women, their hair styled in three-cornered buns, wearing seven-tiered crowns, embracing the moon and cradling the sun amid purple clouds, standing upon lotus blossoms. Meditate, and she reverts to her true form.

In the three months of summer, the Jade Flower Three Primordials Lord transforms into a radiance of purple, white, and azure, her brilliance resplendent, illuminating the Jade Clarity. This is the reversion of the Heavenly Sovereign’s *qi*, where she further refines the essence of the Mysterious Numinous. Meditate, and she reverts to her true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Perfected Jade Flower Three Primordials Lord, on the day of the Spring Equinox or the *dingmao* day, enter the chamber, face southeast, and bow three times. After paying homage to the Three Primordials Lord, turn north, click the teeth three times, and visualize the Three Primordials Lord assuming her seasonal forms and shadows within the Jade Clarity’s Cavernous Wondrous Palace, the Fixed Subtlety Mansion of the Cloud Path Precinct in the Pure Source Hamlet. Envision her true radiance descending to illuminate you, entering your lower pass from the lesser abdomen to the feet, then recite the incantation:

*"Jade Flower scatters numinous power,
Three Primordials refine essence,
Returning to coalesce with Jade Perfection,
Transforming the cloud-court’s splendor.
Flowing clouds linger,
Resplendent flames and bells fall,
Golden talismans and dragon banners,
Ten Absolute pennants and streamers.
Ascend the cinnabar terrace of the Upper Realm,
Roam and gaze through the Eight Obscurities.
The Highest curves its radiance,
Overseeing my Dao’s fulfillment.
Three dawns unite in aspiration,
Attaining eternal life.
Transform spirit to subtlety,
Sun and moon conjoined in parity."*

Afterward, swallow three breaths and cease.

Practice this for nine years, and the Three Primordials will curve their radiance to descend into your chamber. Your eyes will behold their divine countenance, and you will attain the Dao as a divine immortal.

The Supreme Unity Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord is born of the *qi* of the Flying Numinous, his form extending ninety million *zhang*. In the three months of winter, he wears a crown of Triple Treasure Morning Tassels and Flying Flower Purple, a robe of nine-colored mysterious yellow and flying clouds, bears the Six Mountain Fire Jade, and carries a sash of Intertwined Numinous Purple Silk. Seated upon seven-colored clouds, his radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity amid the Nine Heavens. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of nine *cun* and nine *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord transforms into a towering figure, his body like golden yellow, his neck bearing a wheel of phases. He wears a Dharma robe of forty-two strips in nine colors and sits amid the Three *Qi*. His radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord transforms into the form of three moons, their luminous hues intermingling, blending and separating in chaotic harmony amid purple clouds. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord transforms into a radiance of azure, green, and purple, their strands intertwining within the Jade Clarity. This is the reversion of the Supreme Unity Upper Primordial’s *qi*, where he further refines the essence of the Flying Numinous. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord, on the day of the Beginning of Summer or the *gengshen* day, enter the chamber, face south, and bow three times. After paying homage to the Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord assuming his seasonal forms and shadows within the Upper Clarity’s Heavenly Sovereign Palace, the Jade Void Mansion of the Primordial Opening Precinct in the Purple Convergence Hamlet. Envision his true radiance descending to illuminate you, entering the gate of your left hand, then recite the incantation:

*"Supreme Unity seizes destiny,
Peach Prosperity governs the hun-soul,
Lackluster Lord and White Primordial,
Three Perfected shine in unison,
Fortifying the gate of death.
Refine *qi* to commune with spirit,
Unite form with the Thearch Lord.
Four transformations, eight mysteries,
Follow the alchemy to immortality.
A thousand chariots, ten thousand riders,
Wing my ascent upon the clouds,
Soaring to the Upper Clarity,
My form crafted in the Purple Dawn."*

Afterward, swallow twelve breaths upward and cease.

Practice this for nine years, and you will behold the Upper Primordial Prohibiting Lord. Your name will be inscribed in the Southern Culmen, ensuring your immortality and eternal existence.

The Primordial Void Yellow Chamber Perfected Dawn Lord is born of the *qi* of the Pure Numinous, his form extending sixty million *zhang*. In the three months of spring, he wears a seven-colored vermilion essence flower crown, a cloud-patterned robe, bears the Tiger and Phoenix Gold Seal, and carries a sash of Divine Tiger Jade Talisman. Seated amid purple clouds upon a five-colored lotus, his radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity beyond the Eight Obscurities within the Subtle Realm. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of six *cun* and six *fen*.

In the three months of summer, the Yellow Chamber Perfected Dawn Lord transforms into a single body with three heads, wearing purple headscarves and robes of purple and yellow. He wields a golden halberd and stands upon a five-colored lion within the Yellow Chamber Cloud Palace. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Yellow Chamber Perfected Dawn Lord transforms into a human body with a dragon’s head, his nine-colored scales resplendent. His radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity amid yellow clouds. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Yellow Chamber Perfected Dawn Lord transforms into a radiance of yellow, white, and red, his brilliance resplendent, penetrating the Nine Heavens. This is the reversion of the Primordial Void Yellow Chamber’s *qi*, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Pure Numinous. Meditate, and he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Perfected Dawn Lord, on the day of the Summer Solstice or the *jiazi* day, enter the chamber, face southwest, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Perfected Dawn Lord, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Perfected Dawn Lord assuming his seasonal forms and shadows within the Jade Clarity’s Golden Flower Palace, the Purple Life Mansion of the Longevity Precinct in the Eternal Prosperity Hamlet. Envision his true radiance descending to illuminate you, entering the gate of your right hand, then recite the incantation:

*"Yellow Chamber’s Central Perfected,
Primordial Void’s Cavernous Clarity,
At midday he alters his title,
Now named Square Fullness.
Vermilion terrace blazes in splendor,
Washing its radiance in the Golden Court.
Embracing the embryo, refining breath,
Flowing purple, gazing upon azure.
Two *qi* blend and merge,
The body transforms to immortal birth.
Flying essence intones within,
Countenance like a youth, visage like an infant.
Naturally ascending and soaring,
Entering the Three Clarities."*

Afterward, swallow twelve breaths and cease.

Practice this for nine years, and you will behold the divine Perfected, communing with spirit to soar through the void.

The Supreme Ultimate Lord of the Four Perfected Sovereigns is born of the *qi* of the Four Radiant Directions, his form extending seventy million *zhang*. In the three months of summer, he wears a Far-Wandering Treasure Crown, a robe of azure feathered flying brocade, a five-colored feathered skirt, bears the Divine Infant Nurturing and Extending Sword, carries a sash of Flowing Gold Fire Bells, and holds the Divine Tiger Jade Talisman. Seated amid four-colored clouds, his radiance flows brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity within the Subtle Realm. Meditate, and he reverts to a length of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the three months of autumn, the Supreme Ultimate Lord of the Four Perfected Sovereigns transforms his form into a four-headed phoenix in human shape, clad in a nine-colored tiger robe with variegated patterns, his feet treading upon five-colored lions. He stands either upon a lotus flower or amid purple *qi*, and when meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Supreme Ultimate Lord of the Four Perfected Sovereigns transforms into four youths—azure, crimson, white, and black—each wearing a brocade skirt of a single color, each bearing a staff and banner of a single hue, standing upon purple clouds. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Supreme Ultimate Lord of the Four Perfected Sovereigns transforms into four beams of light—azure, crimson, white, and black—mingling in chaotic brilliance like clouds and mist, their radiance shining resplendently. This is the reversion of the Supreme Ultimate’s *qi*, whereupon he refines and receives the essence of the Four Radiant Directions. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Four Perfected, on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, as well as on *jiazi* days, enter the chamber, face west, and bow four times. After paying homage to the Four Perfected, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Four Perfected Sovereigns shifting their forms with the seasons, dwelling in the Eight Radiant Mansion of the Jade Clarity’s Four Luminous Palace, within the Golden Jasper Village of the Ultimate Essence Precinct. Envision their true forms descending and reflecting into your left eye, then recite the incantation:

*"Supreme Ultimate Four Spirits, Sovereigns ascending to the Upper Capital,
Golden essence vast and numinous, refining spirit into light.
Sun’s splendor scatters radiance, crimson moon pours nectar,
Eightfold sacred fungi disperse, illuminating my bright beam.
Supreme Unity commands, four ministries come to welcome,
Body sprouts wondrous fur, soaring in feathered robes,
Ascending the void in flight, flesh and bones together take wing."*

Afterward, look upward and swallow eight breaths, then cease.

Practice this for eight years, and the Four Perfected will curve their radiance into your vision. Beholding their divine countenance, your name shall be inscribed in the Supreme Ultimate, and you will attain the rank of Perfected.

The Seven Dawn Scattering Blossoms Lord of the Central Four Dipper Perfected, born of the *qi* of the Four Primal Chaos, extends seventy million *zhang* in form. In the three months of autumn, he wears a Seven Dawn Flying Essence Flower Crown, a robe of yellow brocade flying fur, an azure feathered skirt, a sash of numinous flying purple cords, and treads upon the Seven Origins. In his hand, he grasps a radiant star, his brilliance shining resplendently, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Within the subtle realm, when meditated upon, he reverts to a length of four *cun* and four *fen*.

In the three months of winter, the Seven Dawn Scattering Blossoms Lord transforms into a single body with four heads, each crowned with a sun disk. Clad in robes of four colors, he wields the Dipper’s刚, his feet treading upon purple clouds. His radiance shines resplendently, illuminating the Upper Clarity. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Seven Dawn Scattering Blossoms Lord transforms into four youths, each four *chi* in height, wearing robes of five-colored variegated patterns, bearing flowered banners, standing amid yellow clouds. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Seven Dawn Scattering Blossoms Lord transforms into four beams of light—azure, crimson, white, and black—mingling in chaotic brilliance, illuminating the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion of the *qi* of the Central Four Dipper Perfected, whereupon he refines and receives the essence of the Four Primal Chaos. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Scattering Blossoms Lord, on the day of the Autumn Equinox, enter the chamber, face north, and bow eight times. After paying homage to the Perfected, click the teeth three times, and visualize the Scattering Blossoms Lord shifting his form with the seasons, dwelling in the Seven Rigor Precinct of the Jade Clarity’s Flourishing Dawn Palace, within the Golden Canopy Village of the Celestial Pivot Precinct. Envision his true form descending and reflecting into your right eye, then recite the incantation:

*"Four Dipper’s total rigor, Central Perfected scattering blossoms,
Three luminaries blend as one, exhaling the dark rosy clouds.
*Jia* unfolds, destiny is ordered, seven spirits subdue demons,
Arrayed talismans and five seals, years align with the primordial,
Golden wheel and treasure canopy, dark essence shines numinous,
Body soars through the Great Void, ascending to the divine abode."*

Afterward, swallow *qi* seven times, then cease.

Practice this for seven years, and your name shall be inscribed upon the Dark Diagram. The Seven Origins will respond in resonance, the Perfected will descend, and you will behold their divine countenance. They will bestow upon you the divine scriptures, granting you cloud chariots and feathered canopies, ascending in broad daylight to the dawn.

The Yellow Radiance Lord of the Central Dawn, born of the *qi* of the Yellow Splendor, extends seventy million *zhang* in form. In the three months of winter, he wears a Golden Flower Treasure Crown, a robe of five-colored variegated fur, a flying feathered brocade skirt, a sash of Seven Origins talismans and Flowing Gold Fire Bells, and wields a nine-colored jade staff. Seated upon yellow clouds, his radiance shines resplendently, flowing in brilliance across the Nine Heavens, illuminating the Upper Clarity’s right Eight Dark Realms within the subtle. When meditated upon, he reverts to a length of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Yellow Radiance Lord transforms into a single body with three heads, each crowned with a phoenix, his entire form suffused in yellow. In his hand, he wields a golden halberd, his feet standing upon five-colored lions. His radiance shines resplendently, illuminating the Upper Clarity. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Yellow Radiance Lord transforms into three figures, each head crowned with sunlight, mouths holding the Seven Stars, bodies clad in five-colored robes, ever standing upon yellow clouds. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Yellow Radiance Lord transforms into three beams of light—yellow, purple, and azure—intertwining and blending with the yellow of the Great Void. This is the reversion of the *qi* of the Central Dawn, whereupon he refines and receives the essence of the Yellow Splendor. When meditated upon, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Yellow Radiance Lord, on the days of the Beginning of Summer and Winter Solstice, enter the chamber, face east, and bow three times. After paying homage to the Yellow Radiance Lord, kneel and click the teeth three times. Visualize the Yellow Radiance Lord shifting his form with the seasons, dwelling in the Nine Dawn Precinct of the Jade Clarity’s Seven Spirits Palace, within the Celestial Pivot Village of the Mysterious Mechanism Precinct. Envision his true form descending and reflecting into the Flowery Canopy Gate of your lungs, then recite the incantation:

*"Youth of the Central Dawn, yellow clouds triple-wound,
Rosy terrace shines resplendent, harmonizing with the Jade Perfected,
Named Darkly Supreme, arrayed as royal guests,
Governing the hundred spirits, bearing them into purple mist."*

Afterward, swallow *qi* three times, then cease.

This is the secret method of the Central Dawn’s reversion to life. Those who know it shall not die; those who cultivate it shall ascend as flying immortals. To lightly divulge its numinous sounds is to bear the weight of the river’s source.

The Posterior Sage of the Golden Portal, Supreme Peace Li, the Celestial Emperor of the Upper Radiance, Lord of the Primordial Dawn’s *qi*, whose form spans ninety million *zhang*. In the three months of spring, he wears a crown of seven-jeweled efflorescent blossoms, robes of dark and yellow five-colored furs, azure brocade flying skirts, and holds a tiger tally. Seated upon seven-hued clouds, his radiance shines resplendent, illuminating the Upper Clarity. He dwells within the infinitesimal and beyond the eight obscurities—envision him reverting to a height of nine *cun* and nine *fen*. In the three months of summer, the Celestial Emperor of the Upper Radiance transforms into an elder, his head adorned with a flying dragon, his body clad in yellow-patterned furs and yellow-feathered skirts, holding a golden tablet. Standing upon purple clouds, his luminosity blazes brilliantly, penetrating the Upper Clarity—envision him reverting to his true form. In the three months of autumn, the Celestial Emperor of the Upper Radiance transfigures into a young child, dressed in five-colored garments, sometimes riding a lion, sometimes seated upon azure clouds—envision him reverting to his true form. In the three months of winter, the Celestial Emperor of the Upper Radiance transforms into a radiance of dark, black, and azure hues, its luminous chaos intertwining—this is the reversion of the Golden Portal’s *qi*, wherein he refines the essence of the Primordial Dawn’s communion. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Celestial Emperor of the Upper Radiance, on the first day of the first lunar month, as well as on *jiazi* days and the day of the Beginning of Spring, enter the chamber, face southeast, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Lord of the Upper Radiance, turn north, kneel, and strike the teeth twelve times. Envision the Lord of the Upper Radiance assuming his seasonal forms, dwelling in the Jade Clarity’s Golden Portal Palace, Jade Perfected Precinct, Eastern Florescence Village, and Nine *Qi* Hamlet. His true form descends and reflects into the root of your five viscera and the base of your throat. Then recite the incantation:

*"Golden Portal harmonizes the divine and engenders life,
Nine *qi* illumine the cinnabar clouds,
Luminous radiance wings the golden numen,
Five clouds merge with triple efflorescence,
Mysterious rinsing flies the dawn’s ford,
Refining and congealing the natural teeth,
Sound the drum to summon the hundred spirits,
Whistle and roar to call forth the host of demons,
A thousand chariots and ten thousand riders,
Escort me to ascend the Jade Heights."*

Afterward, swallow *qi* nine times, then cease.

This is the secret essential of the Golden Portal’s Jade Chamber. Those who attain it become the seed-people of the Posterior Sage. Cultivating it for nine years, they ascend to the Golden Portal in flight. To lightly divulge its numinous scripture is to consign one’s seven ancestors to retribution, and one’s own life to perdition, eternally bearing the blade-mountain’s burden.

The Posterior Sage of the Great Void, the Radianceless Lord Peng of the Chamber, Lord of the Primordial Fourfold Evolution’s *qi*, whose form spans forty million *zhang*. In the three months of summer, he wears a transcendent purple crown, robes of white brocade-patterned furs, white-feathered flying skirts, and a sash of flying numina. At his left hangs a tinkling bell, and in his hand he holds the light of the Seven Primes. He stands perpetually upon the purple void amid a lotus blossom, his radiance blazing brilliantly, penetrating the Upper Clarity—envision him reverting to a height of four *cun* and four *fen*. In the three months of autumn, Lord Peng of the Chamber transforms into an immortal, his hue like vajra, his halo round and luminous, illuminating the four heavens. Clad in thirty-two-colored boundless Dharma robes, his radiance blazes brilliantly, dwelling within the infinitesimal of the Upper Clarity—envision him reverting to his true form. In the three months of winter, Lord Peng of the Chamber transforms into a human-bodied, phoenix-headed figure, five-colored and variegated, standing amid the purple void. His radiance shines resplendently, illuminating the Upper Clarity—envision him reverting to his true form. In the three months of spring, Lord Peng of the Chamber transfigures into a radiance of dark, red, white, and black hues, layering and intertwining like solar halos and clouds—this is the reversion of the Great Void’s *qi*, wherein he refines the essence of the Primordial Fourfold Evolution. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of Lord Peng of the Chamber, on the day of the Vernal Equinox and on one’s natal day, enter the chamber, face south, and bow four times. After paying homage to the deity, face north and strike the teeth three times. Envision Lord Peng of the Chamber assuming his seasonal forms, dwelling in the Upper Clarity’s Boundless Palace, Dark Portal Precinct, Fourfold Rectitude Village, and Union of Primes Hamlet. His true form descends and reflects into the upper opening of your five viscera’s great stomach. Then recite the incantation:

*"Great Void’s garden of blessed seeds,
Blessings upon blessings arise in succession,
Receiving life at the Ninefold Mystery Gate,
True *qi* flourishes at midday,
Refining bones to knit immortal sinews,
Cultivating the adept to ascend the Three Clarities,
Six harmonies gather the ten thousand spirits,
Tiger tally commands the vermilion hosts,
Ancestral generations safeguard the primordial register,
Generation upon generation reveres the immortal scriptures."*

Afterward, swallow *qi* four times while looking upward, then cease.

This is the supreme method of the Posterior Sage’s immortal refinement, secreted within the Radianceless Palace of the Great Void, revealed once in ten thousand kalpas. Those who attain it become the seed-people of the Posterior Sage. Cultivating it for nine years, they are welcomed by the Sage Lord into the Upper Clarity Palace. To lightly divulge it is to consign oneself to servitude under demonic officials.

The Lord of the Immortals, Master of the Nine *Qi* of the Great Mystery Capital, Lord of the Primordial Transformative Vastness’s *qi*, whose form spans seventy million *zhang*. In the three months of autumn, he wears a vermilion essence nine-virtue jeweled crown, robes of azure-feathered six-harmony furs, skirts of hundredfold-transforming luminous patterns, and a belt bearing the sword that summons immortals and subdues demons. Seated upon a nine-hued lion amid three-*qi* clouds, his radiance blazes brilliantly, illuminating the ten heavens—envision him reverting to a height of seven *cun* and seven *fen*. In the three months of winter, the Lord of the Immortals transforms into nine figures, each nine *cun* tall, their heads crowned with moonlight, clad in azure and yellow five-colored immortal robes. They dwell perpetually upon purple clouds, sometimes riding phoenixes to sport in the Dark Capital—envision him reverting to his true form. In the three months of spring, the Lord of the Immortals transforms into a single body with nine heads, each crowned with a phoenix, five-colored and variegated, dwelling above the Upper Clarity amid the purple void—envision him reverting to his true form. In the three months of summer, the Lord of the Immortals transforms into a radiance of dark, white, purple, yellow, black, red, azure, crimson, and green hues, intertwining above the Upper Clarity—this is the reversion of the Great Mystery’s *qi*, wherein he refines the essence of the Primordial Transformative Vastness. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Lord of the Immortals, on the day of the Beginning of Summer, as well as on one’s natal day and the day of the Grand Year Star, enter the chamber, face southwest, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Lord of the Immortals, turn north and strike the teeth nine times. Envision the Lord of the Immortals assuming his seasonal forms, dwelling in the Upper Clarity’s Great Mystery Palace, Kingly Hall Precinct, Dark Capital Village, and Assembly of Perfected Hamlet. His true form descends and reflects into the opening of your nine intestines, beneath the Hidden Wish. Then recite the incantation:

The Great Mystery generates the divine, safeguarding and stabilizing the Gate of Life. The hidden corpse dissolves and vanishes; the spirit is pacified, the hun-soul settled. Reverting the light to the Emperor’s chamber, one receives the Jade Maidens of the Immortals. The Great One carries and uplifts, joining the assembly of the Emperor’s guests. Long abiding in the Golden Chamber, years merge with the mist of months. Endlessly partaking, one’s lifespan connects with Heaven.

Conclude by raising the head and swallowing nine times to finish.

This is the Supreme Way of the Lord of the Great Mystery’s Immortals, concealed within the Golden Chamber and Jade Casket. Emerging but once in ten thousand kalpas, those who attain it do not die; those who practice it become divine immortals. To lightly reveal it brings death to the body and condemns one to the river’s source in suffering.

The Lord of the Eight Effulgences of the Upper Clarity, the Venerable Lord, is the *qi* of the Primordial Cloud Source, his form stretching eighty million *zhang* in length. In the three months of winter, he wears the Flying Dawn Floral Crown upon his head, his robe naturally adorned with cloud patterns, a flying immortal’s feathered skirt, a tiger-script waistband, and holds a golden bell in hand. He stands constantly upon a seven-colored lotus amidst purple clouds, his radiance resplendent, illuminating the ten directions. Envision him reverting to a length of four *cun* and four *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Lord of the Eight Effulgences transforms his form into that of the Eight Radiant Lads, eight in number, each eight *cun* in height. Clad in yellow brocade capes and flying silk robes, they generate clouds of eight colors, their radiance resplendent, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Lord of the Eight Effulgences transforms into an old man, his head bound with a yellow kerchief, his body clad in Five Tigers Robe, holding a golden tally in hand and girded with the Sword of Subduing and Slaying. Amidst yellow *qi*, he constantly draws in the light of the sun. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Lord of the Eight Effulgences transforms into eight hues of light—yellow, white, purple, red, green, dark, crimson, and azure—layered and intertwined above the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion of the Upper Clarity’s *qi*, wherein he refines the essence of the Primordial Cloud Source. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Lord of the Eight Effulgences, on the day of the Autumn Equinox, as well as on one’s natal day and the day of *jiazi*, enter the chamber, face west, and bow eight times. After paying homage to the Lord of the Eight Effulgences, turn north and strike the teeth nine times. Envision the Lord of the Eight Effulgences assuming his seasonal forms, dwelling in the Upper Clarity’s Palace of Pure Emptiness, the Grotto Clarity Precinct, Upper Prime Village, and Purple Chamber Hamlet. His true form descends and reflects into the root of the two apertures in your lower abdomen. Then recite the incantation:

*Qi* of the Upper Clarity’s Mystery,
The Eight Effulgences birth a cycle.
The Yellow Prime harmonizes the divine lineage,
Essence and hun-soul face the Emperor’s child.
Five talismans safeguard the register of life,
Passing through years as at kalpa’s dawn.
The flying cloud chariot of the Eight Effulgences
Ascends you to the Cloud Gate’s realm.
The body soars into the Great Void,
The dead soul suddenly revives.

Conclude by raising the head and swallowing eight times to finish.

This is the Mysterious Secret Way of the Upper Clarity, concealed by the Most High in the Golden Register. Those who attain it do not die; those who practice it ascend as flying immortals. To lightly reveal the sacred text condemns seven generations to servitude, while one’s own life perishes, bearing guilt in the dark mountains.

The Lord of the Azure Lad of the Highest Dawn, the Jade Guardian King of the Eastern Florescence’s Square Simurgh Palace, is the *qi* of the Primordial Solar Essence, his form stretching seventy million *zhang* in length. In the three months of spring, he wears the Azure Floral Treasure Dawn Crown upon his head, clad in an azure feathered flying cloak and azure brocade flying skirt, girded with the Azure Essence Sword of Luminous Passage, holding a nine-colored demon banner in hand and bearing the talisman of the Divine Tiger. Seated upon azure clouds amidst purple mist, envision him reverting to a length of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the three months of summer, the Azure Lad transforms into a human-bodied, bird-headed figure, his entire form clad in azure feathered robes. Standing upon a five-colored lion, he holds the Scepter of Summoning Immortals, amidst purple clouds. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Azure Lad transforms into the Azure Essence Lad, his head adorned with a flying dragon, mouth holding a fire bell. Seated upon the Dark Void, azure clouds constantly coil around his form. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Azure Lad transforms into three hues of light—azure, crimson, and green—intertwining above the Upper Clarity amidst azure clouds. This is the reversion of the Eastern Florescence’s *qi*, wherein he refines the essence of the Primordial Solar Essence. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Azure Lad, on the day of the Beginning of Winter, as well as on one’s natal day, the days of *gengshen* and *dingmao*, enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Azure Lad, turn north and strike the teeth twelve times. Envision the Azure Lad assuming his seasonal forms, dwelling in the Upper Clarity’s Square Simurgh Palace, Azure Prime Precinct, Passage of Radiance Village, and Eastern Florescence Hamlet. His true form descends and reflects beneath the hundred joints and severed nodes of your body. Then recite the incantation:

Azure Florescence blends the distant,
Five paths radiantly divide.
The Golden Dawn erects its tally,
Receiving and upholding the Seven Gates.
The Great One safeguards life,
The numinous banner orders the hun-soul.
Ascending the Yang Mound, the register is passed,
The Prime Duke summons the spirit.
Escorting you to ascend the clouds,
Resting in the Jade Pavilion.
Fortune accumulates by the billions,
Blessings flow by the thousands.
Inscribed in the Eastern Florescence,
Forever partaking as an Upper Immortal.

Conclude by raising the head and swallowing nine *qi* to finish.

This is the Secret Way of the Upper True One of the Eastern Florescence’s Jade Register. When the great kalpa cycles and heaven and earth transform, its text shall appear in the chambers of the Five Marchmounts. Those who attain it do not die; those who practice it transcend the great deluge, ascending in broad daylight. To lightly reveal it condemns seven generations to servitude, while one’s own life perishes, bearing guilt in the river’s source.

The Nine Elder Immortal Sovereigns of the Fusang Great Emperor are the *qi* of the Primordial Valley Source, their form stretching ninety million *zhang* in length. In the three months of summer, they wear the Treasure Coral Dawn Crown upon their heads, clad in robes of shifting, multicolored hues, girded with the Flying Numinous White Sash, bearing the Seven Prime Sword of the Vast and Falling, and holding the Azure Numinous Banner of Life and Demon in hand. Standing upon nine-colored clouds, their radiance resplendent, they illuminate the Upper Clarity. Envision them reverting to a length of nine *cun* and nine *fen*.

In the three months of autumn, the Nine Elder Immortal Sovereigns transform into immortals, their color like vajra, halos of circular light upon their necks. Clad in seventy-two dharma robes, they stand upon three-*qi* lotuses, their radiance blazing, penetratingly illuminating the Upper Clarity. Envision them reverting to their true form.

In the three months of winter, the Nine Elder Immortal Sovereigns transform into beings with human heads and dragon bodies, their forms resplendent in five dazzling colors. They dwell amidst the purple void above the azure clouds. Envision them reverting to their true form.

In the three months of spring, the Nine Elder Immortal Sovereigns transform into a tri-colored radiance of azure, dark, and mystic hues, layering and intertwining above the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion of the qi of the Azure Vastness of Fusang, where they further refine the essence of the Primordial Source Valley. Envision them reverting to their true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Nine Qi Immortal Sovereigns, one should, on the day of the Spring Equinox, as well as on one’s own life-destiny day and the eighth day of the fourth month, enter the chamber, face the northeast, and bow three times. After paying homage to the Immortal Sovereigns, turn north, click the teeth twenty-four times, and envision the Immortal Sovereigns assuming their seasonal forms within the Upper Clarity’s Pure Primordial Palace, the Court of the Sunlit Valley in the Mingjing Village of Fusang. Their reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the root of one’s life-destiny within the great knot of the womb. Then recite the incantation:

*"The Supreme Thearch transforms the luminous,
The Dawn Upholder governs the primordial,
The four qi refine and transmute,
A hundred changes, a thousand divisions,
Entering the womb of the destined,
Severing the roots of death.
The Great One guards the gate,
The Jade Perfected protects the portal.
Delivered from the Three Realms,
The body becomes a Golden Immortal of treasure.
Divine laws overflow,
Feathered wheels unite and ascend.
Inscribed upon the jade register,
The world preserves the source of fortune.
Calamitous death is extinguished,
Reborn as an immortal soul.
The Seven Mysteries soar together,
Ascending to transform at the Gate of the Thearch."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi twice, then cease.

This is the arcane and secret text of the Supreme Thearch, concealed within the Jade Chamber. Once in ten thousand kalpas it is practiced. Those who attain it endure forever; cultivating it leads to immortality. To recklessly divulge it invites misfortune and punishment, drowning one’s life in the River of Origins.

The Lord of the Jade Diagram of Xiaoyou, the Jade Perfected of Ten Thousand Flowers, embodies the qi of the Primordial Receptive True, his form extending thirty million *zhang*. In the three months of autumn, he wears the Far-Wandering Treasure Crown upon his head, robes of flying immortal feathers, and the Precious True Cavern Sash. In hand, he holds a flowered banner, standing amidst azure clouds upon a five-colored lion. His radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Envision him reverting to a length of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the three months of winter, the Lord of the Jade Diagram transforms into a being with a human body and a bird’s beak, the beak holding a jade talisman. His body is clad in feathered robes, and in hand, he holds the three-qi flower. His radiance glows resplendently, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Lord of the Jade Diagram transforms into a human form, his two hands becoming phoenix wings. His entire body is clad in robes of yellow feathers, his feet standing upon the Seven Stars, above the purple void. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Lord of the Jade Diagram transforms into a dual radiance of azure and yellow, layered like clouds above the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion of the qi of the Jade Perfected of Xiaoyou, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Receptive True. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Lord of the Jade Diagram, the Jade Perfected, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, as well as on one’s own life-destiny day, enter the chamber, face the northwest, and bow once. After paying homage to the Jade Perfected, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and envision the Jade Perfected assuming his seasonal forms within the Upper Clarity’s Golden Cloud Palace, the Qi-Uniting Court in the Zhaoyao Village of the Jade Perfected. His reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the philtrum beneath one’s nose. Then recite the incantation:

*"The Lesser Existence knots the true,
Conjoining essence and refining spirit.
The great reversion transforms,
Six harmonies, seven divisions.
The Thearch of Unity governs life,
The Peerless guards the soul.
Seven flowers bloom from decay,
Sinking light rises as mist.
Offering the register to the August Honored,
Celebrating the deliverance of the Seven Mysteries.
The form unites with sun and moon,
The Three Luminaries link as one.
Riding feathered chariots and roaming,
Ascending into the lofty dawn."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi three times, then cease.

This is the Golden Standard and Jade Text of the Central Heaven of Xiaoyou. Those who attain it enjoy a lifespan equal to heaven and earth; through cultivation, they ascend to become Perfected Ones. To recklessly transmit or reveal it brings guilt upon the Seven Mysteries, the body dies under punishment, and for ten thousand kalpas, there is no redemption.

In the three months of summer, the August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions transforms into a youth, his head crowned with a flying dragon, his body clad in purple and yellow feathered garments. In the three months of autumn, the August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions transforms into a radiance of a hundred changes, chaotic and variegated hues intertwining above the Upper Clarity. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Summer, as well as on the Autumn Equinox and the *jiazi* day, enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and envision the Thearch assuming his seasonal forms within the Upper Clarity’s Controller of Emptiness Palace, the Court of the Immortal Capital in the Dark Yin Village of the General Rectification Hamlet. His reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the tip of one’s yin organ. Then recite the incantation:

*"The Mystic Perfected assists the immortals,
The August Thearch oversees the register.
Divine kings refine qi,
Five clouds spread as a mat.
Talismanic commands govern the Four Controllers,
Examining and ordering the essence and soul.

Preserving the immortal rank of the destined.
Returning to youth, beholding the countenance,
Halting the years, stopping the white.
The body flies to the Mystic Capital,
Dwelling with heaven as one.

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi nine times, then cease.

Those who obtain it have their names inscribed by the Immortal Elders, attaining boundless longevity. Through cultivation, one soars in flight, ascending to the Immortal Courts. Those who lightly disclose it shall perish, their offenses handed to the ghostly officials.

In the three months of spring, the Lord of the Supreme Void at Dawn transforms into a youth seated within a blooming lotus, holding a five-colored floral banner. He resides above the purple clouds of the Highest Clarity. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

After paying homage to the Lord of the Dawn, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Lord of the Dawn in his seasonal forms, residing in the Jade Portal Hamlet of the Open Immortal Village within the Sixfold Life Mansion of the Mystic Cavern Palace of the Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the Palace of the Cinnabar Field within one’s original destiny chamber. Then recite the incantation:

Her reverted true essence descends, entering one’s Hall of Light. Then recite the incantation:

Congealing essence and coalescing spirit,
Ascending as a Golden Immortal.
Merging to become one,
Dispersing the form into myriad parts.
Ascending to the Great Dawn,
Treading the void and mounting the clouds.
Preserving life in the Yellow Register,
Enduring through kalpas of years.

Names recorded in the imperial archives.
Forever enjoying the Great Flower,

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi nine times, then cease. This is the supreme Dao of the Nine Numinous, concealed within the Chamber of Great Possession above the Nine Heavens, transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. In the three months of autumn, the Azure Thearch transforms into a human body with a dragon head, clad entirely in azure, standing upon azure clouds and holding the talisman of the Yang Radiance. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Azure Thearch of the East, on the days of the Beginning of Spring or the Spring Equinox, enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Azure Thearch, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Azure Thearch in his seasonal forms, residing in the Azure Valley Hamlet of the Eastern Meng Village within the Ninefold Life Mansion of the Eternal Yang Palace of the Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends, entering one’s Liver Mansion. Then recite the incantation:

The Yang of the Upper Realm reverts to the Origin, the Origin transforms into immortality. Refining the azure, receiving transformation, it merges to complete my spirit. The spirit’s truth enters the Mystery, suddenly transforming into myriad forms. A thousand chariots and ten thousand riders assist and flank my body. Azure dragon and jade-green radiance, brocade mantle and flying skirt—conveying the form upward, ascending to pay court to the Imperial Dawn. Arrayed in the registers of the Eastern Florescence, erasing traces at the River’s source, dwelling long in the immortal ledgers, equal in splendor to the sun.

Conclude by raising the head, swallowing nine qi, and ceasing.

The Vermilion Thearch of the South, who penetrates Yang and receives Yin, embodies the primordial qi of cinnabar. His form measures eighty million *zhang*. In the three months of summer, he wears the Three Qi Mystic Beam Precious Crown, a scarlet cloud-brocade robe, a cinnabar-patterned skirt, bears the Southern Culmen’s Yang-Restraining Talisman, and girds the Crimson Palace’s Light-Entering Sword. He constantly stands atop crimson radiance; visualize him reverting to a height of eight *cun* and eight *fen*.

In the three months of autumn, the Vermilion Thearch transforms into a vermilion bird, holding a crimson sash in its beak, standing upon crimson clouds. Its radiance blazes brilliantly, illuminating the Great Void; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Vermilion Thearch transforms into a being with a human head and avian body, wearing the Essence of the Sun upon his head, holding a fire-bell in his beak, and dwelling amid purple clouds; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Vermilion Thearch transforms into azure light, its color lush and luxuriant, illuminating the eastern direction. This is the reversion to the qi of Penetrating Yang, mutually refining the essence of the Eight Cinnabars; visualize him reverting to his true form.

The Three Qi revert to the numinous, the Eight Thearchs and Nine Clarities. Flying heaven, penetrating the subtle, cinnabar Yang illumines brilliantly. Blending and merging the central truth, refining and transforming of itself, fourfold transmutations alter and change, reverting to my true form. Following the qi’s movement, uniting with heaven’s numen, flying through space, riding the void, ascending to the Imperial Court, long enjoying primordial auspiciousness, equal in rank to the Southern Culmen.

Conclude by raising the head, swallowing eight qi, and ceasing.

He constantly stands atop plain radiance; visualize him reverting to a height of six *cun* and six *fen*.

In the three months of winter, the White Thearch transforms into a being with a human head and tiger’s body, his solar radiance resplendent, illuminating the Great Empyrean; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the White Thearch transforms into a being with a tiger’s head and human body, wearing the Essence of the Moon upon his head, holding a plain sash in his mouth, clad in tiger-patterned robes, and standing upon a lion; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the White Thearch transforms into yellow light, its color penetrating and clear, illuminating the central direction. This is the reversion to the qi of Lesser Yin, mutually refining the essence of the Six Essences; visualize him reverting to his true form.

The revolutions of sun and moon, threefold union and sevenfold completion. Western Metal blends the po, governing and refining the transformation of form. The Mystery and Void unite with transformation, qi enters the hidden depths. The Dao accords with the primordial contract, ascending to create the Jade Court. Equal in tally with heaven, equal in numen with the Thearch, long abiding in auspicious fortune, steadfast for billions upon billions without end.

Conclude by raising the head, swallowing six qi, and ceasing.

He constantly stands atop dark clouds; visualize him reverting to a height of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Black Thearch transforms into a being with a human head and serpent’s body, its five colors resplendent and variegated, holding a golden talisman in its mouth, wearing the Seven Stars upon its head. In the three months of summer, the Black Thearch transforms into a being with one body and five heads, wearing the Five Stars upon its heads, clad in dark-feathered robes, treading upon a dark turtle, and holding fire-bells; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Black Thearch transforms into white light, its color resplendent, illuminating the western direction. This is the reversion to the qi of Penetrating Yin and Grand Yang, mutually refining the essence of the Five Numinous; visualize him reverting to his true form.

Reverting the form to the primordial void, riding space to enter non-being. The Grand Unity assists destiny, the Thearch receives the talisman. Preserving the purple semblance of immortality, recording the name in cinnabar script. The Five Paths unite in truth, merging with my bodily form. Driving the light, spurring the clouds, flying upward to the Jade Capital.
