The Highest Clarity Primordial Beginning’s Transmutations and Primordial Registers

The High August Jade Emperor, the Supreme Sage Lord, the Nine Heavens Jade Perfected—all receive qi naturally, entrust their forms to jade wombs, conceal their brilliance in the Purple Prime, and through numinous harmony and resonance, attain personhood. Descendants of the imperial lineage, born as perfected beings, they knit the hollow cavern to form their script and unite the Three Qi to compose their names. Receiving the title of Thearch, they respond and transform in Highest Clarity, governing the immortals of the High Void, presiding over the Mysterious Mysteries. With the four seasons’ changes, they adjust the nodes and adapt, bathing, donning crowns and sashes, refining and adorning to endure forever. Their transformations of form and shadow respond to resonance and arise, obscure and indistinct.

Thus the Dao has no constant name; its depths cannot be fathomed, its subtleties cannot be exhausted. Heaven and earth rely upon it to stand, the Grand Mystery harmonizes with it to attain clarity. Sun and moon hold to it to shine brightly; the Five Phases receive it to attain numinosity. Vast is its virtue’s origin, boundless its lofty honor. Its Dao is exalted and wondrous, beyond all comparison.

The Primordial Beginning’s recorded registers are concealed within the Purple Chamber of the Supreme Lord’s Sixfold Union Palace. Transmitted once in ten thousand kalpas, they are the Nine Heavens’ forbidden scriptures, not to be heard by ghosts or spirits.

Those who obtain and behold their chapter titles shall rejoice in the flourishing of their ancestral leaves, their blessings flowing to the mysterious root. Their souls ascend to the Southern Palace, their seven ancestors share in the joy. Their names inscribed on jade tablets, they attain immortality in life and death.

Later sages studying the Way of the Supreme Perfected should refine and master the forms of the Primordial Beginning’s transmutations, adapting with the seasonal nodes to communicate with the true, revert the qi, and refine the spirit.

For instance, the Primordial Beginning’s August Elder of the Above, on the day of the Beginning of Spring, receives the qi of the Primordial Jade Void and assumes the title of August Elder of the Above. These are all true forms, their garments of proper colors. Throughout the ninety days of the three spring months, he resides in truth and presides in rectitude. By the day of the Beginning of Summer, the August Elder of the Above transforms his proper form, receiving the seasonal transmutation. Bathing in the divine and perfected, this is called “transmuting the immortal and exchanging the radiance,” communicating with the true and receiving the numinous, causing the qi to endure forever.

In the ninety days of the three summer months, the immortal soul bathes, the divine and perfected resonate and communicate. By the day of the Beginning of Autumn, the August Elder of the Above transforms his form with the season, donning the Five Constants’ crown and sash, called “immortal transmutation.” The qi communicates with the Mysterious Mysteries, filling within and overflowing without. Radiance and brilliance manifest, transforming the true and nourishing the qi, causing the qi to be inexhaustible.

In the ninety days of the three autumn months, donning the Nine Heavens’ crown and sash, the immortal transmutation is perfected. By the day of the Beginning of Winter, the August Elder of the Above contains the true, embraces fetal breathing, reverts the qi to its natural state, liberates the bodily form, transforms the radiance to enter the light, and returns to his primordial beginning. Receiving refinement and reverting the essence, he nurtures and polishes the divine and true. His radiance and color blend into chaos, like misty clouds.

In the ninety days of the three winter months, he congeals the qi and concentrates the spirit, returning to his proper form. Four revolutions complete the cycle, and the cycle renews. These are the Primordial Beginning’s four seasonal transmutations, adapting appearances with the nodes.

The revolutions of heaven and earth all have flourishing and decline, closure and opening, rest and activity, responding to the Celestial Pass. When flourishing, they preside in rectitude; when resting, they nurture and cultivate. Donning crowns and sashes, refining the essence, they do not lose their constancy. Thus heaven and earth endure forever, and this is the wondrous Way of transmutation, beyond all recording.

Those who study the true should each follow their season, cultivating and visualizing the host of perfected beings, all according to the method of the Primordial Beginning’s August Elder of the Above. Within eight years, without losing the seasonal nodes, they shall surely cause the perfected to descend, behold the divine forms with their own eyes, and by following the qi’s transformations, ascend and fly into the Great Void.

In practicing the Way of the Four Transmutations, one should follow the season and ingest the Four Transmutations’ talismans.

For instance, in the three spring months, when practicing the Way and visualizing, one should first ingest the Talisman of Eastern Brightness Communicating with the True and Transmuting the Yang Radiance...

In the three summer months of practice, one should ingest the Talisman of Southern Radiance Eightfold Refinement and Fourfold Clarity of Cinnabar Radiance. In the three autumn months of practice, one should ingest the Talisman of Western Essence Vast Numinosity Transforming Radiance and Supporting the Rare. In the three winter months of practice, one should ingest the Talisman of Northern Mystery Profound True Refinement of Radiance and Whispering Wind.

If practicing the Way of the Yellow Emperor, one should ingest the Talisman of the Yellow Above Eight Directions Generating Radiance and Jade Gate during the seasonal transition months.

This is the Primordial Beginning’s transmutation and conjoining of the true to ascend the Dao. Those who practice it shall communicate with the celestial qi, summon spirits to attain immortality, cause divine countenances to descend in winding paths, and reflect them within their chambers. It regulates the practitioner’s form, harmonizes the qi of the Four Brahmā Realms, illuminates the Five Palaces, opens the gates to receive the true, and settles the spirits within the Jade Treasury. Following the seasonal nodes, it binds the immortals, harmonizes yin and yang below, orders the portals of observation, and revolves heaven and earth, encompassing the eight directions.

Its scriptures are lofty and wondrous, the foundation of divine immortals. Those who know its method shall sit and behold the true numina, capable of transmutation and transformation, refining their forms in accord with the seasons. With the myriad spirits at peace and complete, they shall ascend and fly into the Upper Clarity. If kept secret, the spirits descend; if divulged, calamity befalls.

**Talisman of Eastern Brightness Communicating with the True and Transmuting the Yang Radiance**
In the three spring months of practice, when visualizing the spirits and summoning the numinous, one should inscribe it in black upon blue paper, face east to ingest it, and after a hundred days, attain communion with the numinous. After a thousand days, one shall see the spirits; after thorough vision of ten thousand li, one shall sit and behold the natural. It commands nine Jade Maidens of the Azure True, who bring the treasure scriptures of the Azure Palace and the true writings of divine immortals.

Alternatively, inscribe it in blue upon yellow silk and place it to the east of one’s seat or bed. Clad in azure brocade for a hundred days, the Azure Elder shall descend to one’s side, and the divine officials of the Azure Emperor shall attend with sacred writings, shielding the practitioner’s body. After nine years, one shall naturally attain the azure clouds of radiance, which shall bear one aloft in flight.

This is what is meant by "through essence, one senses the descent of spirits, and sits to attain flying immortality." Its script is the essence of the Eastern Azure Radiance of Yang Brilliance, Opening Clarity and Communicating Light. Its qi is the primordial radiance of the Nine Origins, whose brilliance illumines the eastern heavens, flourishing in ninety-nine thousand nine hundred ninety-nine myriad layers. Its essence whirls in verdant clarity, while azure clouds billow in the Great Void. Resplendent splendor shines upon the Nine Mysteries, flowing nectar beyond the groves of fine herbs, and jade springs pour into abysses of ten thousand fathoms. Within the groves dwell flocks of azure fowl, and in the abysses reside the divine kings of the Yang Valley. Above lies the Abode of Primordial Azure, and within stands the Palace of Azure Splendor. The abode contains the palaces of the Nine Qi Primordial Elders, where the Azure True Sage Sovereign is attended on the left by Jade Maidens of the Azure Waist and on the right by Azure-Feathered Numinous Lads. They ever ride the numinous beasts of Mount Tai, driving and guiding the Nine-Light Divine Dragons. In the third month of spring, they ascend to guide the qi of the Nine Heavens and descend to draw forth the source and flow of the Liver Palace. When the two qi intersect in resonance, transmutation occurs in an instant.

Thus, qi is congealed to form the talisman’s name, and essence is concentrated to form its script. By swallowing its qi, one may instantly behold the divine forms; by consuming its essence, one may transform and enter the Nine Heavens. This is the wondrous numinous transmutation—majestic and boundless in the Great Void, gathering myriad marvels too vast to record in full.

**Talisman of Southern Radiance Eightfold Refinement and Fourfold Clarity of Cinnabar Radiance**
In the three summer months of practice, when visualizing the spirits and summoning the numinous, one should inscribe it in blue upon red paper, face south to ingest it, and after a hundred days, attain communion with the numinous. After a thousand days, one shall see the spirits; after ten thousand days, attain flying immortality. It commands eight Jade Maidens of the Great Cinnabar, who bring the cinnabar chapters of ascending immortality with flowing gold and fire bells.

chunks.original_text: 上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓 经名：上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓，简称《龟山玄箓》。 撰人不详，约出於南北期。 系早期上清派经典。 三卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 参校本：敦煌P.3435 号残写本。 上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓卷上 上清宝书，以九天建立之始，皆自然而生，与气同存，三景齐明，表见九天之上，太空之中。 或结飞玄紫气，以成灵文，天书宛妙，文势曲折，字方一丈，难可寻详。 自非九天中真王，莫能明其旨音。 九天真王以上虚元年，命玄都上真铸金为简，众圣明义，高上口诀，撰集灵篇。 玉帝注笔，刻简成章，以俯仰之格，皆有高下次第禁限，品目悉出高圣之微旨也。 封於九天之上，大有宫中琼房之内，皆以西华玉女、素灵宫金晨紫童典卫之。 西龟之山，一曰龙山，乃九天之根纽，万气之渊府，在天西北之角，周回四十万里，高与玉清连界。 东南则接通阳之霞，上承青宫神虎之门； 西北则交寒穴之野，上通金阙神仙之庭； 南则极於太丹浮黎之乡，气协洞阳之光； 北则指於钩陈，交关华盖，气践广灵； 中央直冲玉京八达交风山顶。 平天三万里，悉涌金为墙，结玉为门，金台玉楼，十二神宫。 上有自然流精紫阙金华之堂，琼瑶之室，傍通九穴之洞，自生紫气之云，交带凤文，九色落陈。 崖生紫桂，岭秀琼林，结瑚为条，植玉为根，骞树含实，赤子白环，三华耀葩於朱景，反香流芳於太玄，八气扇飙以长执，玉籁空唱而成音，龙嗥云楼，凤啸绝岭，毒兽万罗，长蛇千寻，神宫堂堂，云仙纷纷，巍巍元馆，触类吐津，盖元始之妙化，寔天元之灵根。 金华之堂，北窗上有自生紫气，结成玄文，字方一丈，垂芒焕明，天书宛妙，非可寻详。 九天丈人，昔上甲元年清斋云宫，宴景龟山，仍刻金简，缮书玄文，解其宿滞，演其灵音，记曰龟山丹皇飞玄紫文。 西王母以开皇元年正月上寅之日，乘虚泛灵，逸遨九霄，静斋龟山，上登自然流精紫阙金华琼堂，游观北窗，朝礼玄文，瞻崖思灵，心想上真。 於是妙感玄觉，丹心表明，时忽有天真大神，挟日带月，项负圆光，从群仙羽盖，乘飞舆紫云九精流霄，垂跪王母前称：九天凤宫领仙王，姓上玄，字开明，奉元始天王命，使赍九天金书紫字青金丹皇之文，降授於王母焉。 锡号西元九灵上真仙母，封西龟之岳。 又授素书一卷，上真始生变化元录，总领仙籍，承统玉清。 又以青琼之板，给九天凤衣飞青羽裯，晨婴玉冠凤云之舄，神凤紫轮飞行羽盖二十四乘，五色仗幡命灵之节。 又以上宫金华玉女七百人，侍卫於仙母焉。 使治流精紫阙金华琼堂，一月三登玉清，再宴昆仑，五校众仙。 於是天真大神启授事毕，悉反驾玉宫。 仙母於是受命登座，告斋琼堂，命侍女王子登、董双成等，以神光锦巾，盛受金书紫字青琼之板，青金丹皇锡文，上真始生变化元录，飞玄紫文，凡四事，封以丹皇之章，藏之於琼瑶之室。 命金华玉女、紫晨玉童各三十人，侍卫灵文。 依三天旧典俯仰之格，申告五帝五岳灵山河海正神，咸令一月五条至学人名，功过区别，随品奏言。 仙母常以八节之日，又一月五过，宴景云宫，时适五岳，历观河源，游盻八极。

**The Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Primordial Transformations and Treasured Perfections: The Nine Numinous and Most Wondrous Mysterious Register of Mount Tortoise**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Primordial Transformations and Treasured Perfections: The Nine Numinous and Most Wondrous Mysterious Register of Mount Tortoise* (abbreviated as *The Mysterious Register of Mount Tortoise*).
**Author:** Unknown, approximately dated to the Northern and Southern Dynasties period. A foundational scripture of the early Supreme Clarity (Shangqing) tradition. Three scrolls in length.

**Source of Base Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity Tradition*, First Section.
**Collated with:** Dunhuang manuscript P.3435 (fragmentary).

---

### *The Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Primordial Transformations and Treasured Perfections: The Nine Numinous and Most Wondrous Mysterious Register of Mount Tortoise, Scroll One*

The treasured scriptures of Supreme Clarity arose at the very inception of the Nine Heavens, born of spontaneity and coexisting with *qi*. The Three Radiant Ones shone in unison, manifesting above the Nine Heavens and within the Great Void. At times, they coalesced into soaring, mysterious purple *qi*, forming numinous texts—celestial writings of subtle wonder, their strokes sinuous and intricate, each character a full *zhang* in breadth, their depths beyond easy comprehension. None but the True Kings of the Nine Heavens could fathom their profound resonance.

In the first year of the *Above-Void* era, the True Kings of the Nine Heavens commanded the Supreme Perfected Ones of the Mysterious Capital to cast gold into tablets. The assembled sages, enlightened to the luminous meanings and the supreme oral transmissions, compiled the numinous chapters. The Jade Emperor inscribed the brushstrokes, engraving the tablets into scripture. Their postures and rhythms—whether rising or descending—followed a hierarchy of ranks and prohibitions, each category derived from the esoteric intentions of the exalted sages. These were sealed above the Nine Heavens, within the Jade Chambers of the Grand Existence Palace, guarded by the Jade Maidens of the Western Florescence and the Purple Lads of the Golden Dawn of the Primordial Numinous Palace.

The Mountain of the Western Tortoise, also called Dragon Mountain, serves as the root and pivot of the Nine Heavens, the abyssal repository of the myriad *qi*. Located at the northwest corner of the heavens, it spans four hundred thousand *li* in circumference, its height bordering the Jade Clarity Heaven. To the southeast, it connects with the rosy clouds of the *Through-Yang* realm, ascending to the Gate of the Divine Tiger of the Azure Palace. To the northwest, it intersects the wilds of the *Cold Cavern*, rising to the Court of the Immortals of the Golden Portal. To the south, it extends to the Crimson Floating-Ripple Land, its *qi* harmonizing with the radiance of the *Cavern-Yang*. To the north, it points toward the *Curved Array*, linking with the *Flourishing Canopy*, its *qi* treading the vast numinous expanse. At its center, it soars directly toward the Eightfold Crossroads of the Jade Capital atop the summit of the Intersecting Winds Mountain. Thirty thousand *li* of level heavens are encircled by walls of surging gold and gates of wrought jade, adorned with golden terraces, jade towers, and twelve divine palaces.

Above stand halls of naturally flowing essence, the Purple Portal and Golden Florescence Chambers, and chambers of jasper and jade, flanked by nine cavernous grottoes. Spontaneously arising purple clouds interweave with phoenix-script patterns, their nine hues cascading in array. Cliffs bear purple cassia, ridges flourish with jade groves, coral branches intertwine, and jade roots take hold. The *Kan* trees bear fruit, the *Red Children* and *White Rings* gleam, the *Three Florals* radiate blossoms upon the crimson radiance, and *reverse fragrance* flows through the *Great Mystery*. The eight *qi* fan the winds in ceaseless motion, jade flutes resound in the void to form celestial music. Dragons roar from cloud towers, phoenixes cry atop distant peaks. Venomous beasts gather in the thousands, serpents coil a thousand *xun* in length. Divine palaces stand majestic, cloud-borne immortals swarm in multitudes. The towering primordial halls brim with emanations of every kind—such are the wondrous transformations of the Primordial Beginning, the true numinous root of the Celestial Origin.

Within the Hall of the Golden Florescence, above the northern window, a spontaneously arising purple *qi* coalesces into mysterious script, each character a full *zhang* in breadth, its rays cascading in luminous splendor. The celestial writing is of subtle wonder, its depths beyond easy comprehension. In the first year of the *Shangjia* era, the Venerable of the Nine Heavens ascended to the Cloud Palace to perform the purification fast. Gazing upon the radiant scene of Mount Tortoise, he engraved golden tablets and transcribed the mysterious script, dispelling its long-standing obscurities and expounding its numinous resonance. It was recorded as *The Crimson Sovereign’s Flying Mystery and Purple Writ of Mount Tortoise*.

On the first *yin* day of the first month of the first year of the *Kaihuang* era, the Queen Mother of the West rode the void upon a numinous vessel, soaring through the Nine Empyreans. She purified herself upon Mount Tortoise and ascended the naturally flowing essence of the Purple Portal and Golden Florescence Jasper Hall. Wandering to the northern window, she paid homage to the mysterious script, gazing upon the cliffs in contemplation of the numinous and directing her thoughts toward the Supreme Perfected Ones. Thereupon, her wondrous perception awakened to the mystery, and her cinnabar heart revealed itself.

Suddenly, a great celestial perfected one appeared, bearing the sun and moon, a halo encircling his neck, accompanied by a retinue of feather-canopied immortals. He arrived upon a flying chariot of purple clouds and ninefold luminous auroras, prostrating before the Queen Mother. He announced: "I am the Perfected King Governing the Phoenix Palace of the Nine Heavens, surnamed *Supreme Mystery* and styled *Kaiming*. By the command of the Primordial Heavenly King, I have descended to bestow upon you the golden script of the Nine Heavens, the purple characters of the *Azure-Golden Crimson Sovereign’s Writ*." He conferred upon her the title *Supreme Perfected Mother of the Nine Numinous Ones of the Western Origin* and enfeoffed her as the sovereign of the Western Tortoise Peak. He further bestowed a plain scripture scroll, the *Primordial Record of the Supreme Perfected One’s Transformations at Birth*, which oversees the registers of immortals and upholds the lineage of the Jade Clarity.

Additionally, he presented a tablet of azure jasper and granted her the *Flying Azure Feather Robe of the Phoenix Garments of the Nine Heavens*, the *Morning Infant Jade Crown*, the *Phoenix-Cloud Sandals*, the *Divine Phoenix Purple Wheel Flying Feather Canopy* of twenty-four carriages, and the *Five-Colored Command Banners of the Numinous Standards*. He also assigned seven hundred Jade Maidens of the Upper Palace’s Golden Florescence to attend and protect the Perfected Mother. She was charged with governing the Jasper Hall of the Flowing Essence Purple Portal and Golden Florescence, ascending thrice monthly to the Jade Clarity, twice feasting upon Kunlun, and reviewing the multitudes of immortals every five assemblies.

Thereupon, the great celestial perfected one completed his mission and returned to his jade palace. The Perfected Mother, having received her mandate, ascended her throne and addressed the assembly in the Jasper Hall. She commanded her attendants, the Jade Maiden Wang Zideng and Dong Shuangcheng, to receive with reverence the golden script of the purple characters upon the azure jasper tablet, the *Azure-Golden Crimson Sovereign’s Conferral Writ*, the *Primordial Record of the Supreme Perfected One’s Transformations at Birth*, and the *Flying Mystery and Purple Writ*—four items in total—sealing them with the *Crimson Sovereign’s Seal* and entombing them within the Jasper Chamber. She appointed thirty Jade Maidens of the Golden Florescence and thirty Purple Lads of the Golden Dawn to guard the numinous script.

Following the ancient statutes of the Three Heavens regarding postures and rhythms, she proclaimed to the Five Emperors, the Five Peaks, the numinous mountains, rivers, and seas, commanding their divine officials to submit the names of practitioners every five days, distinguishing merits and transgressions, and reporting them according to rank. The Perfected Mother customarily observes the eight solar terms, and every five days, she feasts in the Cloud Palace, traverses the Five Peaks, surveys the sources of the rivers, and roams the eight directions.

chunks.original_text: 当此之时，则五星出分，日月停光，百阳激电，流金焕精，天丁前驱，五老仗幡，仙母常乘九色之辇紫云飞轮，从天仙玉女各五千人。 女则乘凤，男则策龙，飞仙羽服，皆手执华幡，笳箫鼓吹，百和合音，鸾唱凤啸，激朗云陈，华光交焕，三景合明，紫童扬香以却秽，神妃散华以灌真，天钧奏其旌盖，紫烟翳乎虚庭，玉景流盼於太空、神化威制於万灵。 当此之时，六天顺命，群凶束形，祆魔丧眼，天朗气清，盖高仙之妙观，标丹皇之洞灵也。 龟山丹皇飞玄紫文 飞玄紫气凝灵根，纲维玉虚总万神，空中郁勃结自然，上有峻嶒十二传，玉楼峨峨跃景云，流精紫阙带金轩，琼堂玮铄绕八骞，中出青金九灵仙。 丹皇真母号精延，飞青羽晨婴冠，左执玉节，右握灵幡，五色命魔，奉对帝尊，把持符籍当生门，咀月嚼日噏玉泉，离罗吐晖炼五魂，内充外溢绛府欣，金光焕焕形正圆，从朔入金色沌沌。 唯有开明晓此言，日五月十精北元，刻见华盖领仙君，紫气左回与斗运，历度四七入金门。 正是丹皇校万仙，有明此诀加精勤，被形密思每令分，妙景感会得要文。 三年当审保长全，九年乘空致羽裙，凤衣轻翔升龙山，俯仰九灵谒玉晨。 南极上元君曰：此结紫炁飞玄之文，刻书西龟山上，流精紫阙金华琼堂北窗之上。 九天丈人目其篇，记曰《龟山丹皇飞玄紫文》。 西王母常所宝秘，其旨隐奥，皆是九天宛妙之韵，自无仙名，不得钙其篇目。 得者皆九天书录，名题龟山。 九天丈人云：修其道，常以正月、二月、三月、四月、六月、七月、八月、九月、十一月、十二月、一年十月； 月三日、五日、九日、十五日、二十五日，一月五过，清斋诵咏文一徧。 以夜半之后，露出中庭，仰伺北斗华盖之中，有紫云之气，从斗纲左回，历度二十八宿竟，还金门之上。 若在人中天阴无光，当於室内默念内思如上法，每令分明。 思毕，当心拜紫云四过，叩齿三通，仰祝曰： 天夜朗清，幽虚启真，流云徘徊，金华四寨，丹皇敷晖，灵飞紫轩，是夕开陈，青金授仙，成我上愿，体应自然，结命月华，保年日根，三灵合景，永停龙山，密夜情披，请如所言。 毕，便口引紫气二十八咽止。 行此三年，刻有神真降兆寝席也。 身有紫气，映络一形，九天书名，必复上仙也。 九天丈人曰：天书万重，各论其妙，如此一事，亦足致灵真下降，振翮九霄，腾景玉清，游宴云宫也。 自非妙法，西王母亦不秘之於中衿，大有亦不明其禁限也。 南极上元君曰：天有禁气之云，干於日月五〔星〕之分，在其方国，皆有合道之人，得仙之君也。 如此之候，其象自见。 九天丈人云：得见此云，便依文礼祝，不必须其常日也。 勤加在意，刻得云降，升腾有会也。 正可封之於心，不得轻以示人，道泄则灵散，仙无由有感也。 元始锡西王母青金丹皇玉文 高上元始告灵九天太空祖宗。 西王母讳婉衿，寔天九灵之气，混西金之魄，结紫云之胞骨，炼日精之晖，吐纳七曜之华，协晨霞而餐太阳凤髓，噏於月精兰脑，，凝於玉根金藏，结络丹形，入缠紫心，表明於丹皇妙图，高列于帝轩，寝景灵岳，灰心上？ 清，功济万品，惠溢有生，秉节独操，累劫长存，故致高上曲华，元始锡焉。

At this moment, the Five Stars emerge in their stations, the sun and moon halt their radiance, the hundred yang forces surge like lightning, molten metal gleams with refined essence, the Heavenly Warriors march as vanguard, and the Five Elders bear the banners. The Perfected Mother customarily rides her nine-hued chariot of purple clouds and flying wheels, attended by five thousand Heavenly Immortals and Jade Maidens. The women ride phoenixes, the men spur dragons; the Flying Immortals in feathered robes all hold floral banners, their reed pipes and flutes resounding in harmonious chorus. The cries of simurghs and the calls of phoenixes echo through the cloud formations, while radiant lights intertwine, the Three Luminaries merge in brilliance. The Purple Lads waft incense to dispel impurities, the Divine Consorts scatter blossoms to bathe the Perfected; the celestial scales unfurl their canopies, purple mists veil the empty courtyard, jade light streams across the firmament, and numinous transformation commands the myriad spirits. At this time, the Six Heavens obey her command, all malevolent forces bind their forms, demonic perversities lose their sight, the heavens grow bright and the qi pure—such is the wondrous vision of the loftiest immortals, the luminous efficacy of the Crimson Sovereign’s cavern-spirit.

*The Crimson Sovereign’s Flying Mystery Purple Text*
Flying Mystery Purple Qi congeals the numinous root,
The net of Jade Void governs the myriad spirits.
In the emptiness, it billows and coalesces naturally,
Above stand twelve towering peaks,
Jade towers soaring high amid luminous clouds,
Flowing essence and purple pavilions girded with golden portals,
Resplendent jasper halls encircling the Eight Transcendents,
From their midst emerge the Nine Numinous Immortals of Azure Gold.

The Crimson Sovereign Perfected Mother is styled *Essence-Extension*,
Clad in flying azure feathered robes and a morning-infant crown,
In her left hand she holds the Jade Staff, in her right the Numinous Banner,
Commanding the Five-Colored Demons to attend the August Honored One.
She grasps the talismanic registers at the Gate of Life,
Chewing the moon and sipping the sun, inhaling jade springs,
The Net of Separation emits its radiance to refine the five souls,
Internally replete and externally overflowing, the Crimson Palace rejoices.
Golden light shines resplendently, her form perfectly round,
From the new moon she enters the Metal phase, her color murky and profound.

Only the Enlightened One understands these words:
On the fifth day of the fifth month, the essence of the Northern Prime appears,
Engraved in sight is the Floral Canopy leading the Immortal Lords.
Purple Qi revolves leftward with the Dipper’s motion,
Traversing the twenty-eight lunar lodges to enter the Golden Gate.

This is when the Crimson Sovereign reviews the myriad immortals.
Those who illuminate this secret with diligent devotion,
Clothing their forms and concentrating their thoughts to discern its divisions,
Shall perceive the wondrous vision and attain the essential text.
After three years, they shall surely preserve their longevity,
After nine years, they shall ascend the void and don feathered skirts,
Lightly soaring in phoenix robes to ascend Dragon Mountain,
Bowing and rising to pay homage to the Nine Numinous Ones and the Jade Dawn.

The Southern Culmen Supreme Prime Lord states: This is the text of *Congealed Purple Qi and Flying Mystery*, engraved upon the Western Tortoise Mountain, its flowing essence inscribed upon the northern window of the Purple Pavilion, Golden Florescence, and Jasper Hall. The Nine Heavens’ Venerable Elder titled this work *The Crimson Sovereign’s Flying Mystery Purple Text of Tortoise Mountain*. The Queen Mother of the West treasures and conceals it; its purport is profoundly recondite, all being the subtle rhythms of the Nine Heavens. Without an immortal name, one cannot approach its chapters. Those who obtain it are recorded in the Nine Heavens’ registers, their names inscribed upon Tortoise Mountain.

The Nine Heavens’ Venerable Elder says: Cultivate this Dao during the ten months of the year—namely, the first, second, third, fourth, sixth, seventh, eighth, ninth, eleventh, and twelfth months. On the third, fifth, ninth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of each month—five times monthly—purify yourself and recite the text once. After midnight, step into the central courtyard, gaze upward, and observe the Floral Canopy within the Northern Dipper, where Purple Cloud Qi revolves leftward from the Dipper’s net, traversing the twenty-eight lunar lodges before returning above the Golden Gate. If the sky is overcast and devoid of light, perform this inwardly within your chamber, visualizing the method as described. Upon completing the visualization, bow four times toward the Purple Cloud, click your teeth thrice, and raise your gaze to pray:

“The night sky gleams clear, the hidden void reveals the Perfected,
Flowing clouds linger, golden florescence guards the four quarters.
The Crimson Sovereign spreads its radiance, the numinous flies in purple chariots.
This evening, the azure gold bestows immortality,
Fulfilling my supreme aspiration, my body aligns with spontaneity.
I bind my life to the moon’s essence, preserving the root of years and days.
The Three Numinous Ones merge in splendor, eternally abiding on Dragon Mountain.
In the secrecy of night, my devotion is unveiled—may it be as I have spoken.”

Conclude by drawing in Purple Qi twenty-eight times and swallowing it. Practicing this for three years, divine immortals shall manifest signs upon your sleeping mat. Your body shall be enveloped in Purple Qi, your form interwoven with its glow, and your name inscribed in the Nine Heavens’ registers—you shall surely ascend as an immortal.

The Nine Heavens’ Venerable Elder says: Though the celestial scriptures number in the thousands, each expounding its wonders, even this single practice suffices to summon numinous immortals to descend, to spread their wings across the Nine Empyreans, to soar through the Jade Clarity, and to roam and feast in the Cloud Palace. Were this not a wondrous method, the Queen Mother of the West would not have concealed it within her inner robe, nor would the Great Existence have left its prohibitions unspoken.

The Supreme Prime Lord of the Southern Culmen states: The heavens possess clouds of forbidden qi that encroach upon the divisions of the sun, moon, and Five Stars. In those regions and kingdoms, there are those who align with the Dao and attain immortality as lords. When such omens appear, their signs manifest of their own accord.

The Nine Heavens’ Venerable Elder says: Upon witnessing these clouds, perform the rites and prayers as prescribed, not merely on the appointed days. Apply diligent mindfulness, and when the clouds descend, you shall ascend to meet them. Seal this within your heart; do not lightly reveal it to others. If the Dao is divulged, its numinosity disperses, and immortals shall have no means to respond.

*The Highest Primordial Bestows the Azure Gold Crimson Sovereign Jade Text upon the Queen Mother of the West*
The Supreme Primordial addresses the Numinous Nine Heavens and the Ancestral Void: The Queen Mother of the West, named *Graceful Robe*, is the essence of the Nine Numinous Qi of Heaven, the coalescence of the Western Metal’s spirit, the knotting of Purple Cloud’s embryonic bones, the refinement of the sun’s radiance, the inhalation and exhalation of the Seven Luminaries’ splendor. She harmonizes with the morning mist to feast upon the marrow of the Great Yang Phoenix, sips the moon’s essence and orchid brain, congeals within the jade root and golden treasury, binds her cinnabar form, and enfolds her purple heart. Her manifestation is revealed in the Crimson Sovereign’s wondrous chart, her rank exalted among the imperial chariots. She reposes upon the numinous peaks, her heart stilled in the upper clarity, her merits aiding the ten thousand kinds, her beneficence overflowing all life. Holding fast to her singular integrity, she endures through kalpas unending—thus the Highest Primordial bestows upon her the *Curved Florescence*.

chunks.original_text: 以婉衿有金真之德，锡禅西元九灵上真仙母，青金丹皇之号，封掌龟山，总领元录，依俯仰征青琼之板金书玉字，给九天凤衣飞青羽，晨婴玉冠凤云之舄，神凤紫轮飞行羽盖二十四乘，五色仗幡命灵之节，流金火铃夜光之烛，灭魔玉章九天韶信，卫以上宫西华玉女七百人，治西龟之山流精紫阙金华之宫，一月三登玉清，再宴昆仑，五校众仙五岳河海十方灵官，莫不总统，依具以言。 诸应仪轨，悉如瑶台大有旧典三天正文。 施行青琼之板金书玉字 青琼之板金书玉字，青金丹皇锡文，皆出自九天大有宫中俯仰之格，皆结高玄空洞自然之章，以征於上真高圣之官，不施於始学。 如金阙东华方 诸宫亦有仪轨，以召始学飞仙之人也。 此亦悉出大有之格，但品第尊卑，以为高下之异耳。 自非九天有名，方诸有录，终不见其篇目。 得见其文，皆刻简来生，列图帝籍，应得神仙，故逆表於灵格。 道成之日，自当更有天真下降，受其书锡文也。 南极上元君曰：金书玉字，皆刻书青琼板上，或书青玉板上。 板长九寸九分，广二寸四分，以金缕字文，侍板玉童玉女各二人，典香检泄。 依四极明科，百年内有其人，听一传。 南极上元君曰：琼玉非世人所能用，若有名於方诸，得见其文，亦可刻书青木板上，以金缕其字文，盛之青锦之囊，烧香朝礼，九年自当有天真降授琼玉之板也。 南极上元君曰：始生变化元录，与九气元洞俱生。 高上玉皇，上圣帝真，皆结元洞之气以为形名之号，衣冠服彩皆出九天大有俯仰仪轨，乡居里号亦结自然而生。 天有八会之气，四改之运，以钢维玉虚，分理阴阳，玄化治始，成生万品。 高上众圣变形化景，皆随四时政易，顺运应命，与化推迁，无衰老之期，极化长存。 故曰道无常名，此之谓也。 王母德酬高玄，故为万气之母，是致元始锡征丹皇之号，玄授素书元录一卷，使授后圣神仙之徒，知元始之道结自然之号，有变化之气。 得见其篇者，则九天逆书於仙籍，方诸刻名於丹台，加其精思，无出九年，克得与真被颜寝房，随四时变化，飞腾九天也。 南极上元君曰：上清之道高玄宝经，以存思为感，咽气为会，既得参其篇自，便应明其存思元始变化之象，知其形色光气文彩四时改易，将闭眼不 言而自到，咽气不引而自会也。 如此不旬年而睹神，不旬月一而气充也。 后学诸贤，自可勤精其思，则玄空之可明也，接仙之有由也。 南极上元君曰：栽凡修上仙之道，思神念真，服气咽液，而不知元始之号四时变化，改易光象气之根源，徒闭眼於莽莽，空咽而无想，神真何由得降，气液何由得充也。 对颜瞻目，由有晻暧，而况悠悠之中，不别其形气者哉。 谓此徒劳於寝息，无益於空唱也中。 上清始生变化元录 元始皇上丈人，元玉虚之气，讳延世音，字观无觉，形长九千万丈。 常以春三月，则冠九气流精紫曜之冠，衣九光锦袍，身佩九色无缝自然之绶，带六山火玉，常乘碧苍二色之云，坐则九色师子，光明炜晔，在上清之上玉虚之中，思之还长九寸九分。 夏三月，元始皇上丈人则化形一身九头，长七千丈，戴九色之云，衣丹锦百变之光无缝之袍，带九大仙炼之剑，乘丹紫二色之云，坐九色之龙，光明流焕，在玉虚紫云之中，思之还长九寸。
chunks.translated_text:
Lady Wanjin, by virtue of her golden perfection, is granted the title of "Meditation Mistress of the Western Primordial Nine Numinous Supreme Realized Immortal Mother, Azure-Golden Cinnabar Sovereign." She is enfeoffed to govern Tortoise Mountain, overseeing the primordial registers. In accordance with celestial protocol, she receives the azure-jade tablets inscribed with golden script and jade characters, is bestowed the nine-heaven phoenix robes of flying azure plumes, the morning-infant jade crown and phoenix-cloud sandals, twenty-four divine phoenix purple-wheel flying feathered canopies, five-colored ritual banners and spirit-summoning staffs, flowing-gold fire-bells and night-glowing candles, demon-quelling jade talismans and nine-heaven celestial missives. To her defense are assigned seven hundred Jade Maidens of the Upper Palace and Western Florescence, who attend her at the Flowing Essence Purple Pavilion of Golden Florescence within Tortoise Mountain. Thrice monthly she ascends to the Jade Clarity, twice feasts upon Kunlun, and oversees the five assemblies of immortals, the five marchmounts, rivers and seas, and the ten directions’ numinous officials—none are beyond her governance, as fully set forth in the records.

All ritual protocols follow the ancient statutes of the Jade Terrace’s *Great Possession* and the Three Heavens’ orthodox scriptures. The azure-jade tablets inscribed with golden script and jade characters, along with the Azure-Golden Cinnabar Sovereign’s investiture texts, all derive from the celestial norms of the Great Possession Palace’s *Reciprocal Protocol*, composed in the spontaneously arisen chapters of the Highest Mystery’s Empty Cavern. These are conferred upon the palaces of the loftiest realized immortals and exalted sages, not upon neophytes.

As in the Golden Watchtower of the Eastern Florescence and other celestial palaces, there exist protocols for summoning neophytes and fledgling immortals—these too issue from the *Great Possession*’s norms, differing only in rank and dignity. Unless one’s name is recorded in the Nine Heavens or registered in the *Square Cauldron*, one shall never glimpse their contents. Those who do behold their texts are destined for rebirth upon inscribed tablets, their names inscribed in the imperial registers, and shall attain immortality—thus their destiny is foretold in the numinous statutes. On the day of Dao attainment, celestial perfected beings shall descend to receive their texts and investiture.

The Southern Culmen’s Upper Primordial Lord states: The golden script and jade characters are engraved upon azure-jade tablets, or inscribed upon green-jade tablets. Each tablet measures nine inches and nine fen in length, two inches and four fen in width, with characters threaded in gold. Two jade lads and two jade maidens attend each tablet, tending incense and overseeing transmission. According to the *Bright Statutes of the Four Poles*, if a qualified recipient exists within a century, a single transmission is permitted.

The Southern Culmen’s Upper Primordial Lord states: Azure-jade is not within the capacity of mundane persons to employ. If one’s name is recorded in the *Square Cauldron* and one beholds the texts, they may be engraved upon green-wood tablets, with characters threaded in gold, stored in azure-silk pouches. After nine years of burning incense and reverent worship, celestial perfected beings shall descend to bestow the azure-jade tablets.

The Southern Culmen’s Upper Primordial Lord states: The primordial registers of initial transformation and the nine *qi* of the primordial cavern coexist with birth. The Highest Jade Sovereign, supreme sage and imperial perfected, all coalesce the *qi* of the primordial cavern to form their names and titles. Their robes, crowns, and adornments all derive from the *Reciprocal Protocol* of the Nine Heavens’ *Great Possession*, while their dwelling places and village names arise spontaneously. Heaven possesses the *qi* of eight assemblies and the revolutions of four transformations, which, through the brazen canopy and jade emptiness, govern yin and yang, initiate the mysterious workings, and bring forth the ten thousand kinds. The transformations and luminous manifestations of the loftiest sages follow the four seasons’ governance, aligning with the revolutions and responding to destiny, advancing with transformation, without decline or aging, enduring eternally. Thus it is said: the Dao has no constant name—this is what is meant.

As the Queen Mother’s virtue repays the Highest Mystery, she is made the mother of the ten thousand *qi*. Thus the Primordial Beginning bestows upon her the title of Cinnabar Sovereign and confers a scroll of the *Primordial Register of Plain Script*, to be transmitted to later sages and immortals. Through it, they may know that the Dao of the Primordial Beginning coalesces spontaneously arisen names and possesses the *qi* of transformation. Those who behold its chapters shall have their names inscribed in reverse upon the immortal registers of the Nine Heavens, their names engraved upon the Cinnabar Terrace of the *Square Cauldron*. With focused contemplation, within nine years they shall attain union with the perfected, repose in chambers of countenance, and transform with the four seasons, soaring through the Nine Heavens.

The Southern Culmen’s Upper Primordial Lord states: The Dao of the Upper Clarity’s *Highest Mystery’s Precious Scriptures* relies upon visualization for resonance and swallowing *qi* for communion. Once one has accessed its chapters, one should clarify the visualizations of the Primordial Beginning’s transformations, discerning their forms, colors, luminous *qi*, and adornments as they change with the four seasons. Then, with eyes closed and without speech, one shall spontaneously arrive; swallowing *qi* without effort, one shall spontaneously commune. Thus, within ten days one shall behold the divine, and within ten months one’s *qi* shall be replete.

Later learners and worthies may diligently refine their contemplation, thereby illuminating the mysterious emptiness and finding the path to immortality.

The Southern Culmen’s Upper Primordial Lord states: Those who cultivate the Dao of the loftiest immortals—visualizing deities, invoking the perfected, ingesting *qi*, and swallowing saliva—yet remain ignorant of the Primordial Beginning’s names, the four seasons’ transformations, and the root sources of luminous manifestations and *qi*, merely close their eyes in vast obscurity and swallow emptily without intent. How then shall the divine perfected descend? How shall *qi* and saliva be replenished? Gazing upon countenances, one perceives only dimness—how much more so in the boundless expanse, where forms and *qi* remain undiscerned. Such efforts are but vain labor in repose, profitless in empty chanting.

The *Primordial Register of Initial Transformation of the Upper Clarity*:
The Primordial Beginning’s August Supreme Elder, born of the primordial jade emptiness’s *qi*, bears the taboo name *Yanshiyin* and the style *Guanwujue*. His form measures ninety million *zhang* in height. During the three months of spring, he wears the nine-*qi* flowing-essence purple-radiance crown, robes of nine-light brocade, and a sash of nine-colored seamless spontaneous silk. Girded with the six-mountain fire-jade, he rides clouds of azure and deep green. When seated, he rests upon nine-colored lions, their brilliance resplendent in the Upper Clarity’s jade emptiness. When visualized, he returns to a height of nine inches and nine *fen*.

During the three months of summer, the Primordial Beginning’s August Supreme Elder transforms into a single body with nine heads, measuring seven thousand *zhang* in height. He wears a nine-colored cloud crown, a robe of cinnabar brocade woven with boundless radiance, and a girdle of the nine great immortals’ refined swords. He rides clouds of cinnabar and purple, seated upon nine-colored dragons, their luminosity flowing and resplendent in the jade emptiness’s purple clouds. When visualized, he returns to a height of nine inches.

chunks.original_text: 秋三月，皇上丈人则化形一身九凤之头，形长五千丈，九色斑纹虎衣，乘七色之云，华光交焕，在上清之上，思之还长七寸七分。 冬三月，皇上丈人则化形为青黑二色之光，勃勃如月之魄，此则反玉虚之气，更受炼元始之精，思之还复本元真形。 修元始之道，当以立春之日，沐浴入室，东向朝元始皇上丈人九拜毕，还北向叩齿九通，思皇上丈人随四时形像，在上清之上金相宫琼天府八明乡定真里中，回真下映，入兆明堂之中，微祝曰： 皇上开真，九道合明，变练虚无，洞映上清，分形化景，四运顺生，我享其真，与真合灵，内结玉仙，外缠八冥，八景扶翼，运致丹軿，乘云驾烟，策御上清，飞行云房，朝谒帝京。 毕，仰咽九气止。 能知元始变化形景，内讳秘名，则寿九百年。 修之九年，与神交颜，则能变景飞行太空。 高灵九天王，元太虚之气，讳上观洞，字运梵，形长九千万丈。 以秋三月，则头建金华之冠，衣云文锦袍，带九光流铃交灵紫绶，乘丹碧二色之云，坐则九色师子，光明焕耀上清，思之还长七寸。 冬三月，高灵九天王则化形九头，头戴九日，一身衣九色斑文凤衣，常乘青黄二色云，坐则九色师子，光明之辉炜晔，在上清之上，思之还反真形。 春三月，九天王则化形分别为九人，口衔九月，衣凤文羽衣，常乘九色之云，坐则九色之烟，光明焕烂，在上清之上太虚之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，九天王则化形一，为紫青丹红四色之光，光气混沌照九天，此则反形太虚之气，更受炼九天之精，思之还反真形。 凡修九天真王之道，常以冬节之日，沐浴入室，西向九拜朝九天王毕，还北向叩齿九通，思九天王各随四时形象，在上清金兰宫太清府开明乡通真里中，回真下映，入兆上元丹田之中，便微祝曰： 九灵元精，变炼上明，三合齐景，分气散形，出空入玄，上黄下青，历运回晨，参络朱軿、洞游高虚，回映我庭，混合真光，神化来生，能乘云浮，上戏上清。 〔毕〕，仰咽九气止。 修行九年，上感九天，刻得神真下降，授兆真书，自然得乘九色云舆，飞行上清。 玉真九天丈人，元紫虚之气，讳延世明，字系上连，形长九千万丈。 冬三月，则须建飞精百变之冠，九色流光自然锦，佩衣九元通真之策，常乘五色之云，坐则九色之烟，光明炜晔，在上清之上，思之还长九寸。 春三月，玉真九天丈人则化形为凤凰，一身九头，头戴九气玄精，衣九色斑文羽袍，常乘十二飞麟，坐则五色莲华之上，光明流曜百变之色，在上清之上紫虚之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，玉真九天丈人则化形为龙身人头，头戴十二光，衣青黄紫三色羽衣，口衔素绶，常乘九色之云，坐则五色师子，光照上清，思之还反真形。 秋三月，玉真九天丈人则化形为紫绿二色之光，光气相绕如日月相沓，此则反形紫虚之气，更受炼九天之精，思之还反真形。 行玉真九天丈人之道，常以立冬之日，沐浴入室，西北向九拜九天丈人毕，还北向叩齿九通，思九天丈人各随四时形影，在上清丹灵宫开清府三合乡元明里中，回真下映，入兆洞房之中，便微祝曰： 九天上灵，元始自然，含炼八道，九真胎仙，中宝紫元，三素外缠，变景炼气，顺运流迁，洞化入微，我道早分，目招灵晖，心披五云，乘策八景，飞入帝晨。
chunks.translated_text:
In the three months of autumn, the August Supreme Elder transforms into a single body with nine phoenix heads, measuring five thousand *zhang* in height. He wears a nine-colored, striped tiger robe, rides clouds of seven hues, their radiant lights intermingling and resplendent in the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of seven inches and seven *fen*.

During the three months of winter, the August Supreme Elder transforms into a luminous glow of azure and black, its brilliance surging like the moon’s essence. This is the reversal of the jade emptiness’s *qi*, where he refines and receives the essence of the Primordial Beginning. When visualized, he reverts to his original true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Primordial Beginning, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Spring, bathe and enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times to the August Supreme Elder of the Primordial Beginning. Then, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the August Supreme Elder assuming his four seasonal forms in the Golden Radiance Palace of the Upper Clarity’s Jasper Heavenly Court, within the Eightfold Brilliance Precinct of the True Settlement. Let the true light descend and reflect into the adept’s Hall of Light, and softly intone the incantation:

*"August Supreme, opener of truth,
Nine Ways unite in clarity,
Transforming and refining the void,
Illuminating the Upper Clarity.
Shapes divide, radiance shifts,
Four seasons flow in harmony.
I partake of the true,
Merge with truth’s numinous power.
Within, jade immortals coalesce,
Without, the Eight Darknesses entwine.
Eight luminaries lend their wings,
Conveying the cinnabar chariot.
Riding clouds, driving mist,
Whip in hand, I ascend the Upper Clarity,
Soaring through cloud chambers,
To pay homage in the imperial capital."*

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing nine breaths.

One who knows the Primordial Beginning’s transformations of form and radiance, along with his inner secret names, shall live nine hundred years. After nine years of cultivation, one’s countenance shall commune with the divine, enabling the adept to transform and soar through the great void.

The Lofty Numinous Lord of the Nine Heavens, born of the *qi* of the Primordial Void, bears the inner name *Supreme Vision of the Grotto* and the style *Moving Brahma*. His form measures ninety million *zhang* in height. In the three months of autumn, he wears a golden-flowered crown, a cloud-patterned brocade robe, and a girdle of nine luminous, chiming bells interwoven with a purple sash of intersecting numina. He rides clouds of cinnabar and azure, seated upon nine-colored lions, their radiance blazing in the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of seven inches.

In the three months of winter, the Lofty Numinous Lord of the Nine Heavens transforms into nine heads, each crowned with a sun. His single body is clad in a nine-colored, striped phoenix robe. He constantly rides clouds of azure and yellow, seated upon nine-colored lions, their luminous splendor resplendent in the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

During the three months of spring, the Lord of the Nine Heavens divides his form into nine persons, each mouth holding a moon. They wear feathered robes adorned with phoenix patterns, constantly riding nine-colored clouds, seated upon nine-colored mists, their radiance dazzling in the Upper Clarity’s Great Void. When visualized, they revert to their true forms.

In the three months of summer, the Lord of the Nine Heavens unites into a single form, a light of four hues—purple, azure, cinnabar, and red—its *qi* blending and illuminating the nine heavens. This is the reversal of the Great Void’s form, where he refines and receives the essence of the nine heavens. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the True Lord of the Nine Heavens, one should, on the winter solstice, bathe and enter the chamber, face west, and bow nine times to the Lord of the Nine Heavens. Then, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Lord of the Nine Heavens assuming his four seasonal forms in the Golden Orchid Palace of the Upper Clarity’s Grand Clarity Court, within the Open Brilliance Precinct of the Permeating Truth Settlement. Let the true light descend and reflect into the adept’s Upper Cinnabar Field, and softly intone the incantation:

*"Ninefold numinous primordial essence,
Refining and transforming the supreme brilliance,
Three harmonies align in radiance,
*Qi* scatters, forms divide.
Emerging from emptiness, entering mystery,
Above yellow, below azure,
Cycles turn with the dawn,
Interweaving the cinnabar chariot.
Wandering the high void,
Reflecting into my courtyard,
Merging with true light.
Divine transformations arise,
Enabling cloud-borne flight,
To sport in the Upper Clarity."*

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing nine breaths.

After nine years of cultivation, one shall ascend to move the nine heavens, and the divine immortals shall descend to bestow upon the adept the true scriptures. Naturally, one shall ride the nine-colored cloud chariot and soar through the Upper Clarity.

The Jade True Elder of the Nine Heavens, born of the *qi* of the Purple Void, bears the inner name *Prolonging the World’s Brilliance* and the style *Linked Above*. His form measures ninety million *zhang* in height. In the three months of winter, he wears a crown of a hundred shifting essences, a nine-colored, naturally luminous brocade robe, and carries the Nine Primordials’ Permeating Truth talisman. He constantly rides five-colored clouds, seated upon nine-colored mists, their radiance resplendent in the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of nine inches.

During the three months of spring, the Jade True Elder of the Nine Heavens transforms into a phoenix with a single body and nine heads, each crowned with the nine *qi* of dark essence. He wears a nine-colored, striped feathered robe and constantly rides twelve flying *lin* beasts, seated upon five-colored lotus blossoms. Their radiance flows with a hundred shifting hues in the Upper Clarity’s Purple Void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Jade True Elder of the Nine Heavens transforms into a dragon-bodied, human-headed form, crowned with twelve lights. He wears a feathered robe of azure, yellow, and purple, and holds a plain sash in his mouth. He constantly rides nine-colored clouds, seated upon five-colored lions, their light illuminating the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Jade True Elder of the Nine Heavens transforms into a light of purple and green, their *qi* intertwining like the sun and moon overlapping. This is the reversal of the Purple Void’s form, where he refines and receives the essence of the nine heavens. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Jade True Elder of the Nine Heavens, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Winter, bathe and enter the chamber, face northwest, and bow nine times to the Elder of the Nine Heavens. Then, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Elder of the Nine Heavens assuming his four seasonal forms in the Cinnabar Numinous Palace of the Upper Clarity’s Open Clarity Court, within the Threefold Union Precinct of the Primordial Brilliance Settlement. Let the true light descend and reflect into the adept’s Grotto Chamber, and softly intone the incantation:

*"Numinous one of the nine heavens above,
Primordial and self-so,
Containing and refining the eight Ways,
Ninefold true embryonic immortals.
Within, the purple primordial treasure,
Without, the three simplicities entwined.
Transforming radiance, refining *qi*,
Flowing with the seasons’ cycles.
Penetrating transformations, entering subtlety,
My Dao is early apportioned.
Eyes summon divine splendor,
Heart unfolds the five clouds.
Whip in hand, riding the eight luminaries,
I fly into the imperial dawn."*

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing nine breaths.

chunks.original_text: 毕，仰咽九气止。 知九天丈人变化形影，内讳秘字，便名书九天。 修之九年，得见真神，乘空飞行，上升玉清。 道根九天元父，元洞根之气，讳九灵导，字混大真，形长九千万丈。 春三月，头建七称朱玉之帻，无极宝天之冠，着九天凤衣神云凤舄，带素灵之绣，常乘碧霞飞舆，从十二飞龙，坐则九色华光，在玉清之上，光明百变，炜晔太空，思之还长九寸。 夏三月，元父则化形一身九头，头戴九日，衣赤凤斑文虎裘，带十二色绶，乘九色之凤，坐则黄白二气之上，光明焕虚，洞耀玉清之中，思之还反真形。 秋三月，元父则化形分为九人，同衣九色羽袍，带漫延龙渊之剑，虎头鞶囊交灵素绶，坐九气玄空之上，光明变焕，曜玉清细微之内洞根之中，思之还反真形。 冬三月，元父化形为日精之光，与紫晖相沓，此则元父反形道根之气，更受炼洞根之精，与玄母合变混沌二像之光，思之还反真形。 行元父之道，当以太岁之日，沐浴清斋入室，西北向朝九天元父九〔拜〕毕，还北向平坐，闭眼思九天父各随四时形影，在於九天之上，太极琼宫玉宝之府丹灵乡洞元里中，回真下映，入兆上元昆仑之中，便微祝曰： 高上帝尊，元始大神，合真匡气，形秀紫天，乘云驾浮，络景八烟，回轮曲降， 道荫我身，得乘霄軿，奉侍灵辕，今日八会，上愿开陈，所求所乞，靡不如恩，长享元吉，与帝同存，策御八景，飞升玉晨。 毕，仰咽九气止。 行之九年，则睹真形，元父降侧，与兆共言，授兆宝书，九天上录，书名玉简，身登上清。 轻泄此道，没身鬼官，殃及七祖，长充河源。 道极九天玄母，元洞渊之气，讳负沌，字黄大覆，形长七千万丈。 以秋三月，头戴紫元玄黄宝冠，着青精神光锦绣霜罗九色之，华光十二色交灵紫绶，常乘紫云飞轮，从十二凤皇，三十六仙人，坐九色师子，光明流焕、在上清之上，思之还长六寸六分。 冬三月，玄母则化形为人头乌口，口衔月精，衣青精飞罗之，交带流苏紫绶，常乘十二色云，坐则百变之光，洞照上清细微之内，思之还反真形。 春三月，玄母则化形为凤身麟头，七色斑斓十二华光，流精交络，洞映上清细微之内，八冥之裹，思之还反真形。 夏三月，玄母则化形为紫黄二色之光，如月之晖，五色流焕，洞映上清，此则玄母反形洞元之气，更受炼道极九阴之精，雌一合庆，化生万神，思之还反真形，九年则元父负籍於南阳，玄母降形於丹房。 修行玄母之道，当以本命之日，沐浴清斋入室，东南九拜朝玄母毕，还北向平坐，叩齿九通，闭眼思九天玄母随四时形影，在九天之上琼林七映之宫玉宝洞元之府九光乡上清里中，回真下映，入兆脐下命门丹田宫中，便微祝曰： 三合五离，混化二元，气结凝神，神变合魂，雌一含真，胎息生门，阴精玄降，淘灌形源，炼化明景，灵秀自然，今日上告，玄母开陈，十二上愿，保成玉真，五形纳泽，骨炼玉仙，轻身飞腾，乘虚络烟，上造紫极，奉接神颜。 毕，仰咽三九气止。 行之九年，玄母感悦，二景交欢，即动北帝消灭死名，上奉九天记录紫篇，得睹真形，飞行上清。 轻泄我道，死充河源，七祖负役，十苦八难，刀山剑树，万劫不原，得者宝密，自然成仙。

Knowing the Nine Heavens’ Venerable One’s transformations and manifestations, inscribe his inner secret name upon the Nine Heavens. After nine years of cultivation, one may behold the true spirit, ride the void in flight, and ascend to Jade Clarity.

The Dao-root of the Nine Heavens’ Primordial Father is the *qi* of the Primordial Grotto’s root. His secret name is Ninefold Numinous Guide, and his style is Primal Great Perfected. His form spans ninety million *zhang*.

In the three months of spring, he wears a crimson jade headband of seven measures, the Crown of the Treasure Heaven of the Boundless, and dons the Nine Heavens’ Phoenix Robe and Divine Cloud Phoenix Sandals. Girded with the embroidered Sash of Plain Numinosity, he ever rides the Azure Mist Flying Chariot, attended by twelve flying dragons. When seated, nine-colored radiant light emanates from him, high above Jade Clarity, his brilliance shifting a hundredfold to illuminate the vast firmament. In meditation, his form extends to nine *cun*.

In the three months of summer, the Primordial Father transforms into a single body with nine heads, each crowned with a sun. Clad in a tiger-fur robe adorned with red phoenix patterns and girded with twelve-colored ribbons, he rides a nine-hued phoenix. When seated, he rests upon the yellow and white *qi*, his luminosity blazing through the void, illuminating Jade Clarity’s depths. In meditation, one reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Primordial Father divides into nine figures, all identically robed in nine-colored feathered gowns. Each bears the Dragon Abyss Sword at his waist, a tiger-headed pouch, and the intertwined Sash of Plain Numinosity. Seated upon the nine *qi* of the Dark Void, their radiance shifts and gleams, illuminating the subtle intricacies of Jade Clarity’s Grotto Root. In meditation, one reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Primordial Father transforms into the radiance of solar essence, intermingling with the purple brilliance. This is the Primordial Father’s reverted form of the Dao-root’s *qi*, further refined into the essence of the Grotto Root. United with the Mysterious Mother, they merge into the dual lights of primordial chaos. In meditation, one reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Primordial Father, on the day of the Grand Year Star, bathe, purify, and enter the chamber. Facing northwest, prostrate nine times to the Nine Heavens’ Primordial Father. Then, turn north, sit upright, close your eyes, and visualize the Nine Heavens’ Father in his seasonal forms above the Nine Heavens, within the Jade Treasure Precinct of the Supreme Ultimate’s Jeweled Palace, the Cinnabar Numinosity Precinct of the Grotto Primordial Settlement. Let the true light descend and reflect into the adept’s Upper Primordial Kunlun. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Exalted Lord of the Highest,
Primordial Great Spirit,
Uniting true *qi* to rectify the form,
Your splendor graces the Purple Heavens.
Riding clouds, driving the floating,
Interlacing radiance with the eight mists,
Turning the wheel in sinuous descent,
Your Dao shades my body.
Grant me the cloud carriage,
To attend the numinous axle.
Today at the Eight Assemblies,
I humbly present my supreme wishes.
All I seek, all I beg,
Shall be as your grace decrees.
Ever abiding in primal fortune,
Abiding with the Emperor,
Whip in hand, riding the eight luminaries,
I fly into the Jade Dawn."*

Upon completion, gaze upward and swallow nine breaths to conclude.

After nine years of practice, one may witness his true form. The Primordial Father descends to your side, converses with you, and bestows the precious scripture, the Nine Heavens’ Upper Register, inscribed on jade tablets. Your body ascends to Upper Clarity.

To recklessly divulge this Way is to consign oneself to the offices of the ghostly bureaucracy, bringing calamity upon seven generations, who shall forever toil in the River’s source.

The Dao-apex of the Nine Heavens’ Mysterious Mother is the *qi* of the Grotto Abyss. Her secret name is Bearing Chaos, and her style is Yellow Great Cover. Her form spans seventy million *zhang*.

In the three months of autumn, she wears the Purple Primordial Dark-Yellow Treasure Crown and dons the Frosty Gauze Robe of Nine Colors, woven with luminous green spirit-light brocade. Adorned with twelve-colored intertwined ribbons of numinous purple, she ever rides the Purple Cloud Flying Wheel, attended by twelve phoenixes and thirty-six immortals. When seated, she rests upon nine-colored lions, her radiance flowing and gleaming high above Upper Clarity. In meditation, her form extends to six *cun* and six *fen*.

In the three months of winter, the Mysterious Mother transforms into a human-headed crow-mouthed figure, her beak holding the essence of the moon. Clad in a flying gauze robe of green essence, girded with flowing tassels and the purple sash, she ever rides twelve-colored clouds. When seated, her hundredfold radiance illuminates the subtle intricacies of Upper Clarity. In meditation, one reverts to her true form.

In the three months of spring, the Mysterious Mother transforms into a phoenix-bodied, unicorn-headed figure, her seven-colored splendor adorned with twelve radiant lights, their luminous essence interlacing to illuminate the subtle intricacies of Upper Clarity’s eightfold obscurity. In meditation, one reverts to her true form.

In the three months of summer, the Mysterious Mother transforms into the dual radiance of purple and yellow, like the moon’s brilliance, its five colors flowing and gleaming to illuminate Upper Clarity. This is the Mysterious Mother’s reverted form of the Grotto Primordial’s *qi*, further refined into the essence of the Nine Yin’s Dao-apex. United as the Feminine One, she rejoices in harmony, giving birth to the myriad spirits. In meditation, one reverts to her true form. After nine years, the Primordial Father presents the register in Nanyang, while the Mysterious Mother descends in the Cinnabar Chamber.

To practice the Way of the Mysterious Mother, on the day of one’s life-destiny, bathe, purify, and enter the chamber. Facing southeast, prostrate nine times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth nine times. Close your eyes and visualize the Nine Heavens’ Mysterious Mother in her seasonal forms above the Nine Heavens, within the Jeweled Forest’s Sevenfold Radiance Palace, the Jade Treasure Precinct of the Grotto Primordial’s Ninefold Brilliance Settlement. Let the true light descend and reflect into the adept’s Gate of Life below the navel, within the Cinnabar Field Palace. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Triple union, quintuple separation,
Primal chaos merging the dual origins.
*Qi* congeals to form spirit,
Spirit transforms to unite the hun-soul.
The Feminine One embraces the true,
Embryonic breathing births the gate.
Yin essence darkly descends,
Washing and irrigating the wellspring of form.
Refining and transforming luminous radiance,
Numinous splendor arises naturally.
Today I humbly present my plea,
Mysterious Mother, reveal your grace.
Twelve supreme wishes,
Preserve and perfect the Jade Perfected.
Five forms receive the effulgence,
Bones refined into jade immortals.
Lightened body, soaring flight,
Riding the void, interlacing mists,
Ascending to the Purple Ultimate,
To attend and behold the divine countenance."*

Upon completion, gaze upward and swallow twenty-seven breaths to conclude.

After nine years of practice, the Mysterious Mother is moved to joy, as the dual radiance harmonizes. The Northern Emperor is stirred to erase one’s name from the register of death, and the Nine Heavens’ Record of the Purple Scroll is bestowed. One may behold her true form and ascend to Upper Clarity in flight.

To recklessly divulge this Way is to die and be consigned to the River’s source, with seven generations bearing servitude, enduring ten sufferings and eight hardships—blade mountains, sword trees—through ten thousand kalpas without reprieve. Those who obtain it must treasure its secrecy, for they shall naturally attain immortality.

chunks.original_text: 皇老三天丈人，元洞虚之气，讳上定拔，字明梵宗，形长三十万丈。 以春三月，头建通精七宝珠冠，衣飞云流光紫锦之袍，佩单皇命神之章，常坐五色百变之光，炜烨奕奕，在上清之上洞虚之中，思之还长三寸三分。 夏三月，皇老三天丈人则化形为三头一躯，戴青黄绿三色之云，衣五色斑文之袍，坐十二华光之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，皇老三天丈人则化形通身黄金之色，项负十二色圆光，衣须臾百变之光锦袍，带金虎凤文之绶，坐三素景云之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，皇老三天丈人则化形为苍绿紫三色之光，混合相缠如月之魄，此则三天丈人反洞虚之气，更受炼皇老三天之精，思之还反真形。 修行三天丈人之道，当以甲子、庚申之日，沐浴清斋入室，西向心拜三过，朝皇老三天丈人毕，还北向平坐，叩齿九通，闭眼思三天丈人各随四时形影，在上清玉演宫金融府上开乡正元里，回真下映，入兆华盖之中，便微祝曰： 三灵变化，五神混通，内含金仙，外炼真容，玉池华露，泽流紫房，回真曲荫，映彻五宫，内香外洁，骨兰胃芳，九孔纳灵，仙光逸充，得乘飞云，升入帝堂。 毕，咽气三九止。 此九天秘文，玄授以成真人。 修行九年，得与真交颜，名书帝录，列图三元。 轻泄漏慢，九天刺奸，罚以风刀，九祖充役，不得入仙。 虚上三天玉童，元玄虚之气，讳高玉肾，字元常在，形长三千万丈。 以夏三月，头建三华宝曜洞天玉冠，衣青黄七变锦袍，带朱精禁天之章，坐十二色之云，百变之光，流焕上清之上，思之还长三寸二分。 秋三月，三天玉童则化形为三童子，头戴日象，衣五色斑文虎衣，手把五色之幡，坐莲华之中，光明洞耀太清之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，三天玉童则化形为老翁，头建三角黄巾，衣黄锦之裘，手把九节金杖，坐五色云上，光明洞耀玉清之中，思之还反真形。 春三月，三天玉童则化形为青黄白三色之光，更相缠绕如日月之辉，此则反玄虚之气，更受炼三天元生之精，思之还反真形。 修行三天玉童之道，当以太岁之日，清斋入室，南向三拜三过，朝三天玉童毕，还北向平坐，叩齿三通，闭眼内思三天玉童各随四时形影，在上清琼上宫丹明府三素乡元正里，回真下映，入兆两眉中间，便微祝曰： 三光朗明，六气郁清，含真固景，气秀华生，金仙父母，养育胎婴，百神哺饴，玄灌我形，使我景飞，骨升肉轻，徘徊云宫，出入八冥，与道齐真，三元同龄。 毕，仰咽三气止。 此三天秘道，正一玉文，秘在三宝之宫，不得妄传。 见其篇目，修行九年，与真合景，飞行玉清。 轻泄天宝，罚以风刀，九天刺奸，七祖充役，不得入仙。 高上玉宝九霄丈人，元六虚之气，讳上开，字通大明，形长九千万丈。 以秋三月，头建紫元流光九变之冠，衣丹锦七色文光之，带三宝启灵之策，佩豁落七曜元章，立九色师子之上，光明焕烂，洞照玉清，思之还长九寸九分。 冬三月，九霄丈人则变形一身九头童子，衣九彩云光锦衣，坐绛云之上，手执华幡，光明焕烂，洞照玉清，思之还反真形。 春三月，九霄丈人则变形九人，状如童子，各衣一色之衣，口衔日象，坐九色云上，光明流焕，映照玉清，思之还反真形。

The August Elder of the Three Heavens, Person of Ten Thousand Zhang, is the primordial qi of the Void Cavern. His taboo name is Shang Dingba, and his style is Ming Fanzong. His form measures three hundred thousand zhang in height. In the three months of spring, he wears a crown of Seven Treasures adorned with penetrating essence, dons a robe of flying clouds and flowing-light purple brocade, and bears the divine seal of the Single August Mandate. Ever seated amidst the shifting radiance of five colors and a hundred hues, resplendent and luminous, he abides above Upper Clarity within the Void Cavern. When visualized, he returns to a height of three inches and three fen.

In the three months of summer, the August Elder of the Three Heavens, Person of Ten Thousand Zhang, transforms his form into one body with three heads, wearing clouds of blue, yellow, and green. He dons a robe of five-colored variegated patterns and sits upon the Twelve Flowery Radiance. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the August Elder of the Three Heavens, Person of Ten Thousand Zhang, transforms his entire body into the hue of golden yellow, his neck bearing a twelve-colored halo. He wears a robe of brocade that shifts a hundred times in an instant, girded with a sash of golden tiger and phoenix patterns. Seated upon the Three Pure Radiant Clouds, when visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the August Elder of the Three Heavens, Person of Ten Thousand Zhang, transforms into a mingling of azure, green, and purple lights, entwined like the orb of the moon. This is the August Elder of the Three Heavens reverting to the qi of the Void Cavern, further refining the essence of the August Elder of the Three Heavens. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the August Elder of the Three Heavens, Person of Ten Thousand Zhang, one must on the days of *jiazi* and *gengshen*, bathe, purify, and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow thrice in reverence. After paying homage to the August Elder of the Three Heavens, Person of Ten Thousand Zhang, turn north and sit upright. Knock the teeth nine times, close the eyes, and visualize the August Elder of the Three Heavens in his four seasonal forms, residing in the Jade Flow Palace of Upper Clarity, within the Golden Fusion Prefecture at the Open Village of Primordial Rectitude. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters the canopy of the practitioner’s radiance. Then softly intone:

*"Three Spirits transform and change,
Five gods intermingle and commune.
Within, I contain the Golden Immortal;
Without, I refine my true visage.
Jade Pool’s flowery dew
Moistens the Purple Chamber.
The returning true form casts its shade,
Illuminating the Five Palaces.
Inner fragrance and outer purity,
Bones like orchid, stomach like musk.
Nine apertures receive the numinous,
Immortal light overflows and fills.
I ascend upon flying clouds,
Rising into the Emperor’s Hall."*

Upon completion, swallow twenty-seven breaths to conclude.

This is the secret scripture of the Nine Heavens, mystically transmitted to perfect the Realized One. After nine years of cultivation, one may meet the True One face to face, have their name inscribed in the Emperor’s register, and be listed in the charts of the Three Primordials. To recklessly divulge or slight this Way is to be punished by the Nine Heavens’ Blade of Wind, with nine generations condemned to servitude, barred from entering immortality.

The Jade Lad of the Supreme Three Heavens is the primordial qi of the Mysterious Void. His taboo name is Gao Yushen, and his style is Yuan Changzai. His form measures thirty million zhang in height. In the three months of summer, he wears a crown of Three Flowery Treasures and Cavern Heaven Jade, dons a robe of blue and yellow brocade that shifts seven times, and bears the vermilion seal of the Forbidden Heaven. Seated upon twelve-colored clouds and a hundred shifting lights, his radiance flows and gleams above Upper Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of three inches and two fen.

In the three months of autumn, the Jade Lad of the Three Heavens transforms into three lads, each wearing a sun upon his head, dressed in five-colored variegated tiger robes, and holding five-colored banners. Seated within a lotus blossom, their light shines brilliantly above the Grand Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Jade Lad of the Three Heavens transforms into an old man, wearing a three-cornered yellow kerchief, a yellow brocade robe, and holding a nine-jointed golden staff. Seated upon five-colored clouds, his light shines brilliantly within the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Jade Lad of the Three Heavens transforms into a mingling of blue, yellow, and white lights, entwined like the radiance of the sun and moon. This is the reversion to the qi of the Mysterious Void, further refining the essence of the primordial life of the Three Heavens. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Jade Lad of the Three Heavens, one must on the day of the Great Year Star, purify, and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow thrice in reverence. After paying homage to the Jade Lad of the Three Heavens, turn north and sit upright. Knock the teeth three times, close the eyes, and visualize the Jade Lad of the Three Heavens in his four seasonal forms, residing in the Jasper Upper Palace of Upper Clarity, within the Cinnabar Bright Prefecture at the Primordial Rectitude Village of the Three Pure Realms. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters between the practitioner’s brows. Then softly intone:

*"Three Lights shine brightly,
Six qi rise in purity.
Containing the true, I solidify my radiance;
Qi flourishes, and flowery life is born.
Golden Immortal parents
Nurture the fetal infant.
A hundred spirits feed and nourish,
Mystically bathing my form.
May my radiance take flight,
Bones ascend, flesh grow light.
Wandering the cloud palaces,
I traverse the Eight Darknesses.
With the Dao, I equal the true;
The Three Primordials share my age."*

Upon completion, swallow three breaths to conclude.

This is the secret Way of the Three Heavens, the Jade Scripture of the Orthodox Unity, concealed within the Palace of the Three Treasures. It must not be recklessly transmitted. Merely seeing its title and cultivating for nine years, one merges with the True One in radiance and soars through the Jade Clarity. To recklessly divulge the Heavenly Treasure is to be punished by the Blade of Wind, with the Nine Heavens piercing the traitor. Seven generations are condemned to servitude, barred from entering immortality.

The Supreme Jade Treasure Person of the Nine Empyreans is the primordial qi of the Six Voids. His taboo name is Shang Kai, and his style is Tong Daming. His form measures ninety million zhang in height. In the three months of autumn, he wears a crown of Nine Shifting Purple Primordial Flowing Light, dons a cinnabar brocade robe of seven-colored patterned light, bears the Three Treasures’ Initiating Numinous Staff, and is girded with the Seven Luminaries’ Primordial Seal of the Vast and Falling. Standing upon a nine-colored lion, his light shines brilliantly, illuminating the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of nine inches and nine fen.

In the three months of winter, the Person of the Nine Empyreans transforms into one body with nine heads, all lads, wearing nine-colored cloud-light brocade robes. Seated upon crimson clouds, holding flowery banners, their light shines brilliantly, illuminating the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Person of the Nine Empyreans transforms into nine figures, each resembling a lad, wearing robes of a single color and holding a sun in their mouths. Seated upon nine-colored clouds, their light flows and gleams, reflecting upon the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To recklessly divulge this Way is to die and be consigned to the River’s source, with seven generations bearing servitude, enduring ten sufferings and eight hardships—blade mountains, sword trees—through ten thousand kalpas without reprieve. chunks.original_text: 夏三月，九霄丈人则变为九色之光，更相缠绕如云之升，此则丈人反六虚之气，更受炼高上玉宝之精，思之还反真形。 修行九霄丈人之道，当以立秋、本命之日，清斋入室，西向九拜朝丈人毕，还北向叩齿三通，闭眼思丈人各随四时形影，在玉清启金宫重冥府上合乡六会里，回真下映，入兆九孔之户，便微祝曰： 玉霄九回，神真散灵，六虚灌元，高上流精，混合反胎，受炼化生，四度回周，我道莹明，太一勒录，元君记生，五符参差，布养我形，三部八景，运致紫軿，飞仙羽服，翠裙锦青，双珰结带，金符玉铃，真人降授，使我升清，乘空步虚，上谒帝庭。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此九天上道，秘於玉房，万劫一出。 上灵紫映九霄真王，元玉皇之气，讳灵瑞，字应观世，形长九千万丈。 以冬三月，头建金华飞天冠，衣日生流精文袍，佩流金凤玺，带百变交金之剑，立九色莲花紫云之中，光明洞照玉清之上，思之还长九寸九分。 春三月，九霄真王则变形，头戴九星，口衔金铃，手执日象，衣服如法，立紫云之上，光明焕焕，洞照上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，九霄真王则变形为九人，并衣青羽之衣，头各戴一月，各执九色麾幢，在紫云之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，九霄真王变为青白玄三色之光，更相缠绕如云之升，光明奕奕，洞照上清，此则反玉皇之气，更受炼上虚紫映之精，思之还反真形。 修行九霄真王之道，当以秋分、太岁之日，清斋入室，西北向九拜朝真王毕，还北向叩齿九通，闭眼思真王各随四时形影，在玉清七映宫凤生府上虚乡化仙里，回真下映，入兆九户，伏源上关之中，便微祝曰： 九道映明，紫霄分流，三气混沌，合真冥枢。 玄灵布元，散化上虚，无英携老，白元度符，司命检生，五神灌躯，道合成真，元皇同侪，上参玄图，飞升太无。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此皇上秘道，藏於瑶台九曲玄房，依太真科万劫一传，自非玄挺妙质，名书九天，不得参知。 见是篇目，寿同劫年，修之九年，升飞上清，轻泄灵文，身死失仙。 高上虚皇君，元上皇之气，讳幽造，字大法朗，形长七千万丈。 以冬三月，头建无上七曜宝冠，衣明光飞锦珠袍，佩丹皇玉章，常乘九色之云，坐九色师子，光明焕曜，在玉清之上，思之还长七寸二分。 春三月，高上虚皇君则化形为人头龙身，九色斑斓，戴日捧月，坐十二华光，光明焕曜，在玉清之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，高上虚皇君则化形为上皇仙形，项负圆光七十二色，衣百变光明锦衣，光明焕照千亿万重，思之还反真形。 秋三月，高上虚皇君则化形玄黄绿三色之光，更相缠绕如太素之行云，此则高上反上皇之气，更受炼高上之精，思之还反真形。 修行高上虚皇之道，当以九月九日、三月三日，沐浴清斋入室，北向平坐，心拜九过止。 还北向坐，叩齿九通，闭跟内思高上虚皇随四时形影，在上清元宝宫金上府离合乡明光里，回真下映，入兆上元血液之府，便微祝曰： 九元离合，飞根结真，洞景上灵，黄云内缠，宝明齐映，落华生烟，镇固上元，映照我身，三宫保炼，六府光津，策御八景，玄老周旋，乘空步虚，出入无间，上辅高上，虚皇帝臣，八会庆纳，请如所陈。
chunks.translated_text:
In the three months of summer, the Person of the Nine Empyreans transforms into nine-colored lights, intertwining and ascending like clouds. This is when the Person reverts to the qi of the Six Voids, further receiving the refined essence of the exalted Jade Treasure. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Person of the Nine Empyreans, one should on the day of the Beginning of Autumn and one’s own life-destiny day, purify oneself with a fast and enter the chamber. Facing west, perform nine prostrations to the Person, then turn north, click the teeth three times, and with eyes closed, visualize the Person’s form as it changes with the four seasons, residing in the Golden Palace of the Jade Clarity’s Mystic Darkness Prefecture, within the Convergence of the Six Assemblies. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters the nine apertures of the adept’s body. Then softly intone:

"Ninefold radiance of the Jade Empyrean, divine spirits scatter their numen,
The Six Voids pour forth primordial essence, the exalted flow with refined power.
Merging and returning to the womb, receiving refinement and transformation,
Four cycles complete their revolutions, my Dao gleams with clarity.
The Great One inscribes the record, the Primordial Lord notes my birth.
Five talismans interweave, nourishing my form,
The Three Palaces and Eight Effulgences convey the purple chariot.
I ascend as a flying immortal in feathered robes, emerald skirts and azure brocade,
With paired pendants tied at the waist, golden talismans and jade bells.
The Perfected descends to bestow, enabling my ascent to the Clarity,
Riding the void, treading emptiness, I ascend to pay homage at the Imperial Court."

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow the nine qi.

This is the supreme Dao of the Nine Heavens, concealed within the Jade Chamber, revealed but once in ten thousand kalpas.

The Supreme Numinous Purple Radiance of the Nine Empyreans, True King, is the qi of the Primordial Jade Emperor. His taboo name is Lingrui, his style name Yingguanshi, and his form measures ninety million zhang in height.

In the three months of winter, he wears a Golden Flower Flying Heaven Crown, a robe embroidered with the flowing essence of the sun’s radiance, the Imperial Seal of the Flowing Gold Phoenix, and the Hundred-Transformations Interwoven Gold Sword. Standing amidst nine-colored lotus flowers and purple clouds, his light shines brilliantly, illuminating the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of nine inches and nine fen.

In the three months of spring, the Nine Empyreans True King transforms his form, wearing the Nine Stars upon his head, holding a golden bell in his mouth, and grasping the sun’s image in his hand. His robes follow the proper ritual attire. Standing upon purple clouds, his light shines resplendently, illuminating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Nine Empyreans True King transforms into nine figures, each clad in azure feathered robes, each wearing a moon upon their head, and each holding a nine-colored banner. They stand upon purple clouds. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Nine Empyreans True King transforms into three-colored lights—azure, white, and mysterious—intertwining and ascending like clouds. His light shines brilliantly, illuminating the Highest Clarity. This is when he reverts to the qi of the Jade Emperor, further receiving the refined essence of the Supreme Void’s Purple Radiance. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Nine Empyreans True King, one should on the Autumn Equinox and the day of the Great Year Star, purify oneself with a fast and enter the chamber. Facing northwest, perform nine prostrations to the True King, then turn north, click the teeth nine times, and with eyes closed, visualize the True King’s form as it changes with the four seasons, residing in the Sevenfold Radiance Palace of the Jade Clarity’s Phoenix Birth Prefecture, within the Transcendent Transformation Village of the Upper Void. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters the nine apertures of the adept’s body, settling at the Upper Pass of the Hidden Source. Then softly intone:

"Ninefold Dao radiates brilliance, the Purple Empyrean divides its flow,
Three qi merge in chaos, uniting with the Mystic Pivot of the True.
The Dark Numen spreads primordial essence, dispersing and transforming the Upper Void.
The Peerless leads the Aged, the White Prime transmits the talisman,
The Controller of Destinies inspects life, the Five Spirits bathe the body.
The Dao coalesces into truth, the Primordial Emperor joins the ranks,
Ascending to partake in the Mystic Chart, flying upward into the Great Void."

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow the nine qi.

This is the supreme secret Dao of the Emperor, concealed within the Ninefold Mystic Chamber of the Jasper Terrace. According to the statutes of the Supreme Perfected, it is transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. Only those of wondrous and transcendent quality, whose names are inscribed in the Nine Heavens, may partake in its knowledge. Whoever beholds this text shall have a lifespan equal to a kalpa. After nine years of cultivation, one ascends and flies to the Highest Clarity. To recklessly divulge these sacred writings is to invite death and forfeit immortality.

The Supreme Void Emperor Lord is the qi of the Primordial Supreme Emperor. His taboo name is Youzao, his style name Dafalang, and his form measures seventy million zhang in height.

In the three months of winter, he wears the Supreme Seven Luminaries Treasure Crown, a robe of luminous flying brocade adorned with pearls, and the Cinnabar August Jade Seal. He constantly rides nine-colored clouds and sits upon a nine-colored lion. His light shines resplendently, illuminating the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of seven inches and two fen.

In the three months of spring, the Supreme Void Emperor Lord transforms his form into a human-headed dragon body, nine-colored and iridescent, wearing the sun and holding the moon. Seated upon the Twelve Flowery Radiance, his light shines resplendently, illuminating the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Supreme Void Emperor Lord transforms into the form of the Supreme Emperor Immortal, his neck bearing a halo of seventy-two colors. He wears a robe of hundredfold-transforming luminous brocade, his light shining brilliantly through a thousand myriad layers. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Supreme Void Emperor Lord transforms into three-colored lights—mysterious yellow and azure—intertwining and ascending like the primordial clouds of the Great Simplicity. This is when the Supreme Lord reverts to the qi of the Supreme Emperor, further receiving the refined essence of the exalted. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Void Emperor, one should on the ninth day of the ninth month and the third day of the third month, bathe, purify oneself with a fast, and enter the chamber. Facing north, sit upright and perform nine prostrations with the heart. Then, facing north, sit and click the teeth nine times. With eyes closed, visualize the Supreme Void Emperor’s form as it changes with the four seasons, residing in the Primordial Treasure Palace of the Highest Clarity’s Golden Upper Prefecture, within the Bright Radiance Village of the Convergence of Separation. As the true form descends and reflects, it enters the Upper Prime Blood and Fluid Mansion of the adept’s body. Then softly intone:

"Ninefold Primordials converge and separate, flying roots bind the true,
The cavernous radiance of the Supreme Numen, yellow clouds coil within.
Treasure and brightness shine in unison, falling flowers birth mist,
Securing and stabilizing the Upper Prime, illuminating my body.
The Three Palaces refine and protect, the Six Mansions gleam with essence,
Commanding the Eight Effulgences, the Dark Aged revolves in cycles.
Riding the void, treading emptiness, entering and exiting without hindrance,
I ascend to assist the Supreme Void Emperor Lord as his servant.
The Eight Assemblies rejoice and receive, may it be as I have declared."

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow the nine qi.

chunks.original_text: 毕，仰咽九气止。 此高上秘道，变化混生，知者与高上齐真、修之九年，飞行玉清。 轻泄七祖充责，身役河源，依九天之科，不得入仙。 紫虚高上元皇道君，元明皇之气，讳明上基，字飞冥范，形长五千万丈。 以春三月，头建紫元通天宝冠，衣青黄绿三色锦袍，佩招真玉策，带流光凤章，常乘紫碧二色之云，坐十二色莲华之上，光明炜晔，在上清之中紫虚之内，思之还长五寸五分。 夏三月，高上元皇道君则变形，色如黄金，项负圆轮十二光，衣七十二条九彩飞天之衣，坐九色师子之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，高上元皇道君则变形为凤头人躯，衣九色斑文虎衣，坐五色云上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，高上元皇道君则变形为碧皂黄三色之光，更相缠绕，在紫虚之中，此则反明皇之气，更受炼紫虚之精，思之还反真形。 修行高上元皇之道，当以太岁之日，沐浴入室，南向心拜三过，朝元皇毕，还北向叩齿十二通，闭眼内思高上元皇道君随四时形影，在上清金灵宫丹神府元洞乡通耀里，回真下映，入兆通神之户，便微祝曰： 明皇元道，高上紫元，三变九合，结成洞门，朱精烂绮，飞生黄云，五符固死，保命长存，回真混合，使我成神， 三宫安镇，九孔结仙，四时变化，与帝合真。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此高上秘密之道，三变九炼，自然成真，得行其法，九年飞行，与神合形。 轻泄漏慢，九祖充责，身没幽泉，长谢四极，不得入仙。 上皇玉虚君，元紫皇之气，讳明世兰，字曲常清，形长三千万丈。 以夏三月，头建通精七宝华冠，衣九色飞云锦，佩丹文紫章，常立紫气之云，七色莲华，光明炜晔，洞照上清，思之还长三寸三分。 秋三月，上皇玉虚君则变形一面四眼，身为凤躯，九色斓斑，在黄白红三气之中，立五色师子之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，上皇玉虚君则变形为男子，手执五色之华，衣五色之衣，在紫云芝之上，思之还反真形。 春三月，上皇玉虚君则变形为黄赤青三色之光，混沌状如浮云，在紫虚之内，此则上皇反玉虚之气，更受炼紫皇之精，思之还反真形。 凡修行玉虚君之道，当以八节之日，清斋东向三拜，朝玉虚毕，还北向叩齿三通，闭眼内思上虚皇玉君随四时形影，在上清朱精宫生真府太丹乡三宝里，回真下映，入兆泥丸后门之中，便微祝曰： 玄明紫皇，八气飞空，幽幽冥冥，混化十方，敷灵演真，焕曜金光，紫微炼精，结成仙容，八景腾飞，乘云驾空，控辔太虚，逍遥上宫。 毕，仰咽七气止。 此上皇金匮秘道，有名书紫简，刻图丹台，当得此文，修行九年，飞行上清。 轻泄秘要，身没鬼官，不得入仙。 三元太明上皇君，元虚皇之气，讳寂欣平，字灵劫化，形长七千万丈。 秋三月，头建丹华紫曜飞天冠，衣五色云罗之袍，佩流金火铃，带神虎玉章，常立紫云之上，光明炜晔，七十二变，照明上清，思之还长七寸二分。 太明上皇君，以冬三月，则化形人头龙身，五色玄黄，在紫虚之上，立九色云光绝空之中，思之还反真形。 太明上皇君，以春三月，则化形为三月之晖，流光爓照上清之中紫虚之内，思之还反真形。 太明上皇君，以夏三月，则化形为赤白二色之光，如太素之云，在紫虚之中，此则太明上皇君反三元之气，更受炼虚皇之精，思之还反真形。
