This is the secret Dao of the Supreme Highest, where transformations merge and life arises. Those who comprehend it align their truth with the Supreme Highest. After nine years of practice, they ascend to fly through the Jade Clarity. Should one lightly disclose it, seven generations of ancestors will bear the burden, and the adept’s body will be consigned to the Yellow Springs. By the statutes of the Nine Heavens, they shall not attain immortality.

The Purple Void Supreme Highest Primordial Sovereign of the Dao, the qi of the Primordial Radiance Sovereign, bears the taboo name *Mingshangji* and the style *Feimingfan*. His form spans fifty million *zhang*. In the third month of spring, he wears the Purple Primordial Heaven-Penetrating Treasure Crown upon his head, dons a brocade robe of azure, yellow, and green, carries the Jade Scepter for Summoning Perfection, and girds the Flowing Light Phoenix Insignia. He perpetually rides upon clouds of purple and azure, seated upon a twelve-colored lotus, his radiance resplendent, dwelling within the Purple Void of the Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the third month of summer, the Supreme Highest Primordial Sovereign of the Dao transforms his form, his color like molten gold, his neck bearing a twelve-rayed circular halo. He wears a seventy-two-striped robe of nine-colored flying celestial patterns and sits upon a nine-colored lion. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, the Supreme Highest Primordial Sovereign of the Dao transforms into a phoenix-headed, human-bodied figure, clad in a nine-colored tiger-patterned robe, seated upon five-colored clouds. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Supreme Highest Primordial Sovereign of the Dao transforms into intertwining lights of azure, black, and yellow, dwelling within the Purple Void. This is the reversion of the Primordial Radiance’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Purple Void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Supreme Highest Primordial Sovereign, on the day of the Great Year Star, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow thrice in reverence, then complete the audience with the Primordial Sovereign. Turn north, click the teeth twelve times, close the eyes, and inwardly visualize the Supreme Highest Primordial Sovereign of the Dao, his form shifting with the four seasons, dwelling in the Golden Numen Palace of the Supreme Clarity, within the Cinnabar Spirit Mansion of the Primordial Cavern Realm of the Radiant Luminance. As his true essence reflects downward, it enters the adept’s Gate of Spiritual Communication. Then softly intone:

"Radiant Sovereign of the Primordial Dao, Supreme Purple Primordial,
Three transformations, nine unions, conjoining to form the Cavern Gate.
Vermilion essence gleams like brocade, flying to birth yellow clouds.
Five talismans secure deathlessness, preserving life for eternal endurance.
Reverting truth to merge as one, enabling me to become a spirit.
Three Palaces securely settled, nine apertures conjoin as immortals.
Four seasons’ transformations align me with the Emperor in truth."

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow the nine qi to conclude.

This is the supreme secret Dao, where three transformations and nine refinements naturally perfect truth. Those who attain and practice its method will, after nine years, fly through the heavens, their form merging with the divine. Should one lightly disclose or neglect it, nine generations of ancestors will bear the burden, the body will sink into the Dark Springs, forever parting from the four extremities, and they shall not attain immortality.

The Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Void, the qi of the Primordial Purple Sovereign, bears the taboo name *Mingshilan* and the style *Quchangqing*. His form spans thirty million *zhang*. In the third month of summer, he wears the Seven Treasures Flowered Crown of Penetrating Essence upon his head, dons a nine-colored flying-cloud brocade robe, carries the Vermilion-Script Purple Insignia, and perpetually stands upon purple qi clouds and seven-colored lotuses. His radiance blazes brilliantly, illuminating the Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, the Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Void transforms into a one-faced, four-eyed figure with a phoenix’s body, nine-colored and variegated, standing amidst the three qi of yellow, white, and red, upon a five-colored lion. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Void transforms into a man holding five-colored flowers, clad in five-colored robes, standing upon purple cloud mushrooms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Supreme Sovereign of the Jade Void transforms into intertwining lights of yellow, red, and azure, chaotic as drifting clouds, dwelling within the Purple Void. This is the reversion of the Jade Void’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Purple Sovereign. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Jade Void Sovereign, on the days of the eight solar terms, purify oneself and face east to bow thrice. After completing the audience with the Jade Void, turn north, click the teeth three times, close the eyes, and inwardly visualize the Supreme Jade Sovereign of the Upper Void, his form shifting with the four seasons, dwelling in the Vermilion Essence Palace of the Supreme Clarity, within the Life-Truth Mansion of the Great Cinnabar Realm of the Three Treasures. As his true essence reflects downward, it enters the adept’s posterior Gate of the Muddy Pellet. Then softly intone:

"Mysterious Radiance of the Purple Sovereign, eight qi flying through the void,
Profound and obscure, transforming the ten directions.
Unfolding numen to evolve truth, blazing with golden radiance.
Purple Tenuity refines essence, congealing into an immortal’s countenance.
Eight Effulgences soar and fly, riding clouds to drive through the void,
Guiding the reins of the Great Void, carefree in the Upper Palace."

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow the seven qi to conclude.

This is the secret Dao of the Supreme Sovereign’s Golden Casket, inscribed upon purple slips and engraved upon the Cinnabar Terrace. Those who obtain this text and practice it for nine years will ascend to fly through the Supreme Clarity. Should one lightly disclose its essentials, the body will be consigned to the Bureau of Ghosts, and they shall not attain immortality.

The Three Primordials Supreme Radiance Sovereign, the qi of the Primordial Void Sovereign, bears the taboo name *Jixinping* and the style *Lingjiehua*. His form spans seventy million *zhang*. In the third month of autumn, he wears the Vermilion Flowered Purple Radiance Flying Heaven Crown upon his head, dons a five-colored cloud-silk robe, carries the Flowing Gold Fire Bell, and girds the Divine Tiger Jade Insignia. He perpetually stands upon purple clouds, his radiance blazing brilliantly, undergoing seventy-two transformations to illuminate the Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of seven *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of winter, the Supreme Radiance Sovereign transforms into a human-headed, dragon-bodied figure, five-colored and dark yellow, standing upon the Purple Void amidst nine-colored cloud lights suspended in the void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Supreme Radiance Sovereign transforms into the radiance of the third month, its flowing light blazing within the Purple Void of the Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, the Supreme Radiance Sovereign transforms into intertwining lights of red and white, like clouds of primordial simplicity, dwelling within the Purple Void. This is the reversion of the Three Primordials’ qi, where he further refines the essence of the Void Sovereign. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

chunks.original_text: 修行上皇君之道，常以本命、太岁之日，沐浴入室，南向心拜太明上皇君毕，还北向叩齿三通，闭眼思太明上皇君随四时形影，在上清紫融宫生真府七相乡六元里中，回真下映，入兆左方融生宫中，便微祝曰： 三元太明，洞景朱灵，玄气散真，混合元精，帝一变化，保命黄宁，八气飞腾，六宫常生，玄老同符，我道已明，三光翼景，羽服郁青，策辔丹舆，飞入月庭。 毕，仰咽十二气止。 得修此道，则名书九天，上真降席，飞行玉清。 轻慢泄漏，身没鬼官，不得入仙。 皇上万始先生，元上皇之气，讳幽朗兰，字通大范，形长九千万丈。 冬三月，头建丹阳日精之冠，衣赤云明光锦袍，佩金虎凤丈，带丹皇紫章，常乘白素之云，坐五色师子，光明流焕，照映上清，思之还长二寸一分。 春三月，万始先生则变形为人躯三头凤凰，衣九色斑文虎衣，常立十二华光，思之还反真形。 夏三月，万始先生则变形为三日之晖，紫光八芒，烂映焕明，在上清之上，十二色莲华之中，思之还反真形。 秋三月，万始先生则化为青赤紫三色之光，更相缠绕如日之轮，此则反皇上之气，更受炼上皇之精，思之还反真形。 修行万始先生之道，常以本命、八节之日，沐浴入室，北向心拜先生毕，叩齿三通，闭跟思先生随四时形影，在上清融华宫金魂府明灵乡上张里中，回真下映，入兆右方阴极宫中，微祝曰： 万始三精，散气九微，上景登正，明道四飞，玄母开愿，八间解怀，保录中元，帝真徘徊，变化三形，体无常衰，混合光象，日月齐晖，飞登玄宫，升入紫微。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此高玄妙秘黄房宝文，得见其篇，书名九天，修行飞仙，白偶升天。 上皇先生紫晨君，元高元之气，讳欣平渊，字道元极，身长九千万丈。 春三月，建通天宝晨冠，衣七色流明云光珠袍，佩上相制灵之符，带混真东蒙之策，坐九色苍龙，在青云之上，光明流曜，洞照上情，思之还长九寸九分。 夏三月，化形龙头人身，五色斑斓，文彩焕曜，在紫云之中，光明彻照，映朗十方，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形人头龙身，九色斑斓，文彩光明，洞照上清，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形青黑二色之光，更相混合，光明洞曜，映照上清，此则反上皇之气，更受炼元高元之精，思之还反真形。 修行紫晨君之道，常以立春之日，东向九拜朝紫晨君毕，还向叩齿九通，思紫晨君随四．时形影，在玉清紫玄上宫朱映府金精乡化灵里中，回真下映，入兆肝之上门，微祝曰： 上皇散灵，紫晨纳精，三华洞发，四度鲜明，流真交庆，回映我庭，三元混合，我道以成，仙衣羽服，锦裳飞青，九龙策辔，飞行上灵。 〔毕〕，仰咽九气止。 紫虚皇上太帝君，元洞元之气，讳灵明谷，字大范宗，长八千万丈。 夏三月，建九气流精紫曜之冠，衣九色无缝自然之，佩七元交光之章，带元皇命真之策，坐神凤之上绛云之内，光明炜晔，洞照上清，思之还长八寸八分。 秋三月，化形凤头人形，九色斑斓，文彩光朋，〔立〕莲华之上，在素云之中，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形人头凤身，口衔火铃，文彩焕烂，洞照上清，思之还反真形。 春三月，化形为青赤二色之光，光明赫赫，照明上清，此则反紫虚之气，更受炼元洞精之精，思之还反真形。

To practice the Way of the Sovereign of the Supreme Radiance, regularly on one’s life-day and the day of the Great Year-Star, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow with the heart to the Supreme Radiance Sovereign. Upon completion, turn north, knock the teeth thrice, and with eyes closed, visualize the Supreme Radiance Sovereign assuming his four seasonal forms and shadows within the True Capital of the Seven Phases Precinct of the Six Primordials in the Purple Fusion Palace of Supreme Clarity. As the true reverts and descends to reflect, he enters the left side of the adept’s Fusional Life Palace. Then softly intone:

The Three Primordials’ Supreme Radiance,
Crimson Spirit of Cavernous Splendor,
Mysterious qi disperses the true,
Merging with the essence of the Primordial.
The Thearch’s singular transformation
Preserves life in yellow tranquility.
Eight qi soar and ascend,
Six palaces ever flourish.
Mysterious Elder in shared resonance—
My Way is now illuminated.
Three luminaries wing the radiance,
Feathered robes lush and verdant,
Whipping the reins of the cinnabar chariot,
Flying into the lunar court.

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow twelve breaths to conclude.

Those who cultivate this Way shall have their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens. The Supreme Perfected descend to their mats, and they soar through the Jade Clarity. Those who treat it lightly or leak its secrets shall be consigned to the offices of ghosts and barred from attaining immortality.

The Venerable Lord of the Myriad Beginnings, emanation of the Primordial Sovereign’s qi, bears the taboo name Youlang Lan and the style Tong Da Fan. His form measures ninety million zhang in height.

In the third month of winter, he wears the Vermilion Yang Solar Essence Crown, a robe of luminous red-cloud brocade, and girds the Golden Tiger Phoenix Sash with the Cinnabar Thearch’s Purple Seal. He constantly rides clouds of white simplicity, seated upon a five-colored lion. His radiance flows and shines, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of two cun and one fen.

In the third month of spring, the Venerable Lord of the Myriad Beginnings transforms into a human-bodied figure with three heads and a phoenix’s form, clad in a nine-colored, striped tiger robe. He constantly stands amidst twelve radiant blossoms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, the Venerable Lord of the Myriad Beginnings transforms into the radiance of three suns, with eight rays of purple light, resplendent and blazing, dwelling above Supreme Clarity amidst twelve-colored lotus blossoms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, the Venerable Lord of the Myriad Beginnings transforms into intertwining lights of blue, red, and purple, coiling like the wheel of the sun. This is the reversion of the Primordial Sovereign’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Supreme Sovereign. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Venerable Lord of the Myriad Beginnings, regularly on one’s life-day and the days of the Eight Nodal Points, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing north, bow with the heart to the Venerable Lord. Upon completion, knock the teeth thrice, and with eyes closed, visualize the Venerable Lord assuming his four seasonal forms and shadows within the Golden Soul Precinct of the Bright Numinous Precinct of the Upper Zhang Ward in the Fusional Florescence Palace of Supreme Clarity. As the true reverts and descends to reflect, he enters the right side of the adept’s Palace of Yin Extremity. Then softly intone:

The Myriad Beginnings’ Three Essences,
Dispersing qi of the Nine Subtleties,
Ascending the Supreme Radiance to rectitude,
The luminous Way soars in four directions.
Mysterious Mother unfolds her vow,
Eight intervals unbind their cares.
Preserving the records of the Middle Primordial,
The Thearch’s Perfected wander in cycles.
Transforming into three forms,
The body knows no constant decay.
Merging with the radiant image,
Sun and moon shine in unison.
Flying to ascend the Mysterious Palace,
Rising into the Purple Tenuity.

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths to conclude.

This is the wondrous and arcane treasure-script of the Yellow Chamber. Those who behold its chapters shall have their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens. Through cultivation, they ascend as flying immortals, their white souls ascending to heaven.

The Purple Dawn Sovereign, emanation of the Primordial Highest’s qi, bears the taboo name Xin Ping Yuan and the style Dao Yuan Ji. His body measures ninety million zhang in height.

In the third month of spring, he wears the Heaven-Penetrating Treasure Dawn Crown, a robe of seven-colored, flowing luminous cloud-light pearls, and girds the Talisman of the Supreme Minister’s Numinous Control with the Staff of Primal Fusion’s East. Seated upon a nine-colored azure dragon amidst blue clouds, his radiance flows and shines, penetrating and illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of nine cun and nine fen.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a dragon-headed, human-bodied figure, five-colored and striped, with patterns resplendent and radiant, dwelling amidst purple clouds. His light penetrates and illuminates the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a human-headed, dragon-bodied figure, nine-colored and striped, with patterns luminous and bright, penetrating and illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into intertwining lights of blue and black, merging and blending. His radiance penetrates and illuminates Supreme Clarity. This is the reversion of the Supreme Sovereign’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Highest. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Purple Dawn Sovereign, regularly on the day of the Beginning of Spring, face east and bow nine times to the Purple Dawn Sovereign. Upon completion, turn and knock the teeth nine times. Visualize the Purple Dawn Sovereign assuming his four seasonal forms and shadows within the Golden Essence Precinct of the Transmutative Numinous Ward in the Vermilion Radiance Precinct of the Purple Mystery Upper Palace of Jade Clarity. As the true reverts and descends to reflect, he enters the Gate above the adept’s liver. Then softly intone:

The Supreme Sovereign disperses the numinous,
Purple Dawn receives the essence.
Three blossoms unfold in cavernous radiance,
Four measures shine with fresh brilliance.
Flowing true in mutual celebration,
Reverting to reflect within my court.
The Three Primordials merge and blend—
My Way is now accomplished.
Immortal robes and feathered garments,
Brocaded skirts soaring in verdancy.
Nine dragons whip the reins,
Flying through the Supreme Numinous.

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths to conclude.

The Supreme Thearch of the Purple Void, emanation of the Primordial Cavern’s qi, bears the taboo name Ling Ming Gu and the style Da Fan Zong. His body measures eighty million zhang in height.

In the third month of summer, he wears the Nine Qi Flowing Essence Purple Radiance Crown, a nine-colored, seamless, spontaneous robe, and girds the Seven Primordials’ Intertwining Radiance Seal with the Staff of the Primordial Thearch’s Mandate. Seated upon a divine phoenix amidst crimson clouds, his radiance blazes and shines, penetrating and illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of eight cun and eight fen.

chunks.original_text: 修行太帝君之道，常以立夏之日，入室南向八拜，朝太帝君，还北向叩齿九通，思太帝君随四时形影，在玉清变云宫中丹曜府金华乡日精里中，回真下映，入兆心房上关，微祝曰： 紫虚吐精，皇上纳气，二元交庆，混合齐契，流津濯灌，泽洒九外，是日上吉，我享元泰，玉华流溢，洗尘扫秽，六腑开清，身无毫翳，明道八景，辅成仙位，仰咽灵芝，还童反艾，肉轻骨飞，升入无际。 〔毕〕，仰咽八气止。 紫虚皇老上帝君，元洞精之气，讳虚盈，字元衡豁，长六千万丈。 秋三月，建金华七曜之冠，衣云文日精锦袍，佩皇天杖幡，带九光灵章绶，立素云之中，坐七色师子，光明流焕，洞映上清，思之还长六寸六分。 冬三月，化形虎头人身，黄白锦袍，文彩明曜，立玄云之中，坐九色，灵照十方，思之还反真形。 春三月，化形人头虎身，九色斑斓，光彩焕焕，照明上清，在紫虚上清之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形为赤白二色之光，光明奕奕，照明四方，此则反紫虚之气，更受炼元洞之精，思之还反真形。 修行上帝君之道，常以立秋之日，入室西向六拜，朝帝君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，思上帝君随四时形影，在玉清金门官治精府三炼乡九变里中，回真下映，入兆胇宫中节间，微祝曰： 皇老开张，四运改灵，炼度三关，变化饰形，是日庆合，万气交并，太上度符，司命典生，削灭死根，勒录上清，上享元吉，靡不利贞，寿同三光，与真齐灵，得乘飞景，上造帝庭。 毕，仰咽十二气止。 玄虚太真洞景君，元洞融之气，讳游上飞，字玄开梁，长五千万丈。 冬三月，建无上七曜宝冠，衣朱玉文明光飞锦，佩丹皇玉章，带招仙之剑，在玄虚之中，立五色师子之上，光明曜映照上清，思之还长五寸五分。 春三月，化形为仙人，色如金刚，项负宝圆，衣龟文大衣，光照十方，在青云之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形为灵龟，三百六十文章，口衔七星，坐华盖之下玄云之上，光明奕奕，照映上清，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形为白黑二色 之光，光色沌沌如玉之精，此则反玄虚之气，更受炼元洞融之精，思之还反真形。 修行洞景君之道，常以立冬之日，入室北向五拜，朝洞景君，叩齿三通，思洞景君在玉清琼容宫太丹府朱雀乡崖中里中，回真下映，入兆肾府双阙之内，微祝曰： 洞真高清，四运炼仙，道合中元，变化自然，流津玄洒，庆布我身，上享元吉，利贞受恩，太一度符，元君科山，绝灭死尸，斩断胞根，八景辅翼，总录万神，降致云舆，运我升晨。 毕，仰咽五气止。 行之八年，刻得玄升，中真降见，授兆真经宝章。 皇上玉帝，元高晨之气，讳大宁，字大幽始，长三千万丈。 春三月，建七宝珠冠，衣九色虎衣，佩金虎凤文，带神虎玉章，乘七元之精，立朱雀之上，十二华光，焕明玉清洞虚之中，思之还长三寸三分。 夏三月，化形项负七色宝盖，两手斗星，立日晖之中，光明炜晔，在上清之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形人头，为朱雀口，衔日象，立紫云之上华盖之下，光昕奕奕，映照上清，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形为玄黄苍三色之光，更相缠绕，在紫虚之中，则玉帝反皇上之气，更受炼高晨之精，思之还反真形。

To practice the Way of the Supreme Thearch Lord, on the day of *Lixia* (Beginning of Summer), enter the chamber, face south, and bow eight times in homage to the Supreme Thearch Lord. Then turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Supreme Thearch Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Clarity’s Transforming Cloud Palace, within the Cinnabar Radiance Prefecture’s Golden Florescence Village and Solar Essence Precinct. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s heart chamber and upper pass. Softly intone the incantation:

*"The Purple Void exhales essence,
The August Supreme inhales qi.
The Two Primordials rejoice in union,
Harmonizing as one in perfect accord.
Flowing nectar washes and irrigates,
Blessings shower the nine extremities.
This day is supremely auspicious—
I partake of primordial peace.
Jade radiance overflows,
Washing away dust and defilement.
The six viscera open to clarity,
The body free of the slightest obscurity.
Illuminating the Eightfold Luminous Dao,
Assisting in the attainment of immortality.
Gazing upward, I swallow numinous mushrooms,
Reverting to youth and reversing age.
Flesh lightens, bones take flight,
Ascending into boundless realms."*

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing eight breaths.

The Purple Void August Elder Supreme Thearch Lord is the qi of the Primordial Cavern’s essence. His taboo name is *Xuying* (Void-Full), and his style is *Yuanhenghuo* (Primordial Balance and Vastness). His height spans sixty million *zhang*.

In the third month of autumn, he dons a Sevenfold Radiance crown of golden florescence, wears a cloud-patterned, solar-essence brocade robe, bears the August Heaven Staff Banner, and girds the Ninefold Luminous Spirit Seal Ribbon. Standing amidst white clouds, seated upon a seven-colored lion, his radiance flows and shines, penetrating and illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of six *cun* and six *fen*.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a tiger-headed, human-bodied figure, clad in a yellow-and-white brocade robe, with patterns luminous and bright. Standing amidst dark clouds, seated upon a nine-colored [beast], his numinous radiance illuminates the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a human-headed, tiger-bodied figure, nine-colored and striped, with radiance resplendent and blazing, illuminating Supreme Clarity. He resides within the Purple Void’s Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into intertwining lights of red and white, their radiance brilliant and gleaming, illuminating the four directions. This is the reversion of the Purple Void’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Cavern. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Supreme Thearch Lord, on the day of *Liqiu* (Beginning of Autumn), enter the chamber, face west, and bow six times in homage to the Thearch Lord. Conclude the obeisance, then turn north and click the teeth twelve times. Visualize the Supreme Thearch Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Clarity’s Golden Gate Palace, within the Essence Prefecture’s Threefold Refinement Village and Ninefold Transformation Precinct. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s diaphragm palace and central node. Softly intone the incantation:

*"The August Elder unfolds,
The four seasons renew their numen.
Refining and crossing the Three Passes,
Transforming and adorning the form.
This day is one of joyous union—
Myriad qi converge and merge.
The Supreme bestows the talisman,
The Controller of Destiny records life.
Severing the roots of death,
Inscribing the register of Supreme Clarity.
Supremely partaking of primordial auspiciousness,
All is favorable and upright.
Lifespan matches the Three Luminaries,
Spirit equal to the perfected.
Attaining the flying luminous chariot,
Ascending to the Thearch’s court."*

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing twelve breaths.

The Mysterious Void Supreme Perfected Cavern Radiance Lord is the qi of the Primordial Cavern’s fusion. His taboo name is *Youshangfei* (Wandering Above in Flight), and his style is *Xuankailiang* (Mysterious Opening Beam). His height spans fifty million *zhang*.

In the third month of winter, he dons an unsurpassed Sevenfold Radiance treasure crown, wears a vermilion-jade-patterned, luminous flying brocade robe, bears the Cinnabar August Jade Seal, and girds the Sword of Immortal Summoning. Within the Mysterious Void, standing upon a five-colored lion, his radiance shines and illuminates Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into an immortal, his complexion like vajra, his neck bearing a precious wheel. Clad in a tortoise-patterned great robe, his light illuminates the ten directions. Amidst blue-green clouds, when visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a numinous tortoise, its three hundred and sixty patterns inscribed, mouth holding the Seven Stars. Seated beneath a flowered canopy atop dark clouds, his radiance gleams and shines, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into intertwining lights of white and black, their hue turbid and lustrous like jade essence. This is the reversion of the Mysterious Void’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Cavern’s fusion. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Cavern Radiance Lord, on the day of *Lidong* (Beginning of Winter), enter the chamber, face north, and bow five times in homage to the Cavern Radiance Lord. Click the teeth three times and visualize the Cavern Radiance Lord residing in the Jade Clarity’s Jasper Countenance Palace, within the Great Cinnabar Prefecture’s Vermilion Bird Village and Cliff Precinct. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s kidney palace and the double gates within. Softly intone the incantation:

*"The Cavern Perfected, lofty and pure,
The four seasons refine the immortal.
The Dao harmonizes with the Middle Primordial,
Transformations arise naturally.
Flowing nectar and mysterious showers
Bless and suffuse my body.
Supremely partaking of primordial auspiciousness,
Favorably and uprightly receiving grace.
The Supreme bestows the talisman,
The Primordial Lord inscribes the mountain.
Extinguishing the corpse of death,
Severing the roots of the womb.
The Eight Luminous Ones assist as wings,
Summoning the myriad spirits.
Descending with cloud chariots,
Conveying me to ascend the dawn."*

Conclude by gazing upward and swallowing five breaths.

After eight years of practice, one may attain the mysterious ascent, where the Median Perfected descends to appear and bestow upon the adept the true scriptures and treasure talismans.

The August Supreme Jade Thearch is the qi of the Lofty Dawn. His taboo name is *Daning* (Great Peace), and his style is *Dayoushi* (Great Dark Beginning). His height spans thirty million *zhang*.

In the third month of spring, he dons a Seven Treasures Pearl Crown, wears a nine-colored tiger robe, bears the Golden Tiger Phoenix Seal, and girds the Spirit Tiger Jade Seal. Riding the essence of the Seven Primordials, standing upon the Vermilion Bird, his twelvefold flowery radiance shines resplendently within the Jade Clarity’s Cavernous Void. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a figure with a seven-colored precious canopy upon his neck, both hands holding the Dipper Star. Standing amidst solar brilliance, his radiance blazes and shines, above Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a human-headed figure with the beak of a Vermilion Bird, holding a solar emblem. Standing upon purple clouds beneath a flowered canopy, his light gleams and shines, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into intertwining lights of dark, yellow, and blue-green, coiling and entwining within the Purple Void. This is the August Thearch’s reversion of the August Supreme’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Lofty Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

chunks.original_text: 修行玉帝之道，常以月一日、十五日，沐浴入室，东向心拜，朝玉帝毕，还北向叩齿十二通，闭眼思皇上玉帝随四时形影，在上清洞云宫雾仙府仙变乡定微里中，回真下映，入兆两眉中间，微祝曰： 明上帝皇，腾景高微，九变紫元，四气炼晖，三合中宫，五化徘徊，混合帝一，万气总归，安灵元室，镇固九扉，三部八景，齐真相随，共乘云龙，升我高飞，长享帝籍，亿亿不衰。 〔毕〕，仰咽九气止。 此皇上之道，紫房中秘言，授於金名玉字合真之人，得者飞仙，与帝合形，轻泄身死，七祖充责，万劫不得入仙。 太素高虚上极紫皇君，元明晨之气，讳宗梵怜，字玄上门，长#1五千万丈。 夏三月，建天元七宝冠，衣九色珠绛云光锦，佩六山火玉，带灵飞紫绶，立五色师子莲华之上，焕明上清七十四方，思之还长五寸二分。 秋三月，化形人头虎躯，玄黄斑文，文彩焕烂，光照十方，在紫气之中，立五芝之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形通身金光，项负华盖，衣三十二色，有如天仙之象，光明奕奕，照朗上清，思之还反真形。 春三月，化形为紫黄绿三色之光，更相缠绕，三气混沌，在上清之中，此则紫皇反太素之气，更受炼明晨之精，思之还反真形。 修行紫皇君之道，常以庚申之日，情斋入室，南向心拜紫皇君毕，还北向叩齿三通，闭眼思紫皇道君随四时形影，在上清金耀宫紫曜府七元乡华盖里中，回真下映，入兆紫房宫中，微祝曰： 明晨散灵，紫皇纳晖，太素九变，四炼洞微，太一监命，公子保哀，帝君理命，三元齐回，与真并契，福祚巍巍，策龙飞升，上造云扉。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此金房秘要，传上清真人，得者飞仙，位齐高真。 轻泄漏慢，身役河源， 七祖谢责，不得入仙。 虚明紫兰中元高嵉君，元太晨之气，讳惠智，字通大业，长三千万丈。 秋三月，建三华宝冠，衣神精七色之袍，带流金紫章，佩石精金光之剑，立碧霞之上，七色虎辇，光明焕焕，三十二色，思之还长三寸三分。 冬三月，化形虎身龙头，五色斑文，光明奕奕，在碧云之中五色莲华之上，思之还反真形。 春三月，变形三头凤皇，九色文彩光明焕烂，照映上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形为紫碧二色之光，更相缠绕，如日之升，此则高嵉君紫兰之气，更受炼元明太晨之精，思之还反真形。 修行中元高嵉君之道，常以立秋之日，清斋入室，西向拜朝高嵉君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，闭眼思高嵉君随四时形影，在上清灵映宫神变府三轮乡成真里中，回真下映，入兆五藏五城之宫，微祝曰： 太晨回景虚明分，变合九炼三真轮，津灵灌溉五城门，镇神固气塞死源，上招高虚致仙群，飞行羽步升金门，世享帝席命长全，七叶同欢离五根。 毕，仰咽三气止。 此紫兰宝诀，万劫一宣，得者飞行，上升玉清。 紫虚玉皇先生紫晨君，元玉晨之气，讳灵会消，字度众光，长七千万丈。 冬三月，建七宝飞华冠，衣九色紫锦华裙，佩龙景七变虎符，立五色师子之上，十二华光明照十方，思之还长七寸七分。 春三月，化形为九色之凤，口衔素绶，文身斑斓，光耀上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形人躯九头之乌，九色文彩，光明炜晔，映照上清，思之还反真形。

To practice the Dao of the Jade Thearch, regularly on the first and fifteenth days of the lunar month, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow in reverence, and upon completing the homage to the Jade Thearch, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and with eyes closed, visualize the August Supreme Jade Thearch’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Cloud Palace of Supreme Clarity within the Misty Immortal Court of the Transcendent Metamorphosis Realm of Subtle Perfection. As his true form descends and reflects, let it enter between your brows. Silently invoke:

*"Radiant August Thearch, soaring in the lofty subtle,
Nine transformations of the Purple Origin, four qi refining brilliance,
Three harmonies in the Central Palace, five metamorphoses lingering,
Merging with the Thearch’s Unity, myriad qi converge in return.
Pacify the spirit in the Primordial Chamber, secure the nine gates,
Three divisions and eight luminaries, all true forms follow,
Together riding cloud-dragons, ascending in high flight,
Eternally partaking of the Thearch’s register, boundless and undiminished."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths of qi to conclude.

This is the secret teaching of the August Supreme’s Dao, concealed within the Purple Chamber. It is transmitted only to those whose golden names and jade characters align with the True. Those who receive it ascend as immortals, merging their form with the Thearch. To recklessly divulge it brings death, and seven generations of ancestors shall bear the burden, barred from immortality for ten thousand kalpas.

The Supreme Primordial Purple August Lord of the Loftiest Void, the qi of the Primordial Luminous Dawn, is named Zong Fanlian, styled Xuanshangmen, and stands fifty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of summer, he wears the Heavenly Origin Seven-Treasures Crown, a robe of nine-colored pearl and crimson cloud-light brocade, a girdle of Six-Mountain Fire Jade, and a sash of Spirit-Flight Purple Ribbon. Standing upon a five-colored lion atop a lotus, his radiance illumines the seventy-four directions of Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of five *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a human-headed figure with a tiger’s body, adorned with dark and yellow striations, his patterned splendor resplendent, his light illuminating the ten directions. Amidst purple qi, he stands upon the Five Mushrooms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a figure wreathed in golden light, a floral canopy upon his neck, clad in thirty-two colors, resembling a celestial immortal. His luminosity gleams and shines, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into intertwining lights of purple, yellow, and green, the three qi merging in primordial chaos within Supreme Clarity. This is the Purple August Lord’s reversion of the Supreme Primordial’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Luminous Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Purple August Lord, regularly on the day of *gengshen*, purify the heart and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow in reverence to the Purple August Lord, then turn north and click the teeth three times. With eyes closed, visualize the Purple August Dao Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Golden Radiance Palace of Supreme Clarity within the Purple Luminance Court of the Seven Origins Realm of the Floral Canopy. As his true form descends and reflects, let it enter the Purple Chamber Palace within you. Silently invoke:

*"Luminous Dawn scatters spirit, the Purple August absorbs brilliance,
Nine transformations of the Supreme Primordial, four refinements penetrating the subtle,
The Great Unity oversees destiny, the Duke’s Son preserves grace,
The Thearch-Lord governs life, the Three Origins harmonize in return,
In union with the True, blessings towering and majestic,
Spurring dragons to ascend, reaching the cloud gates above."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths of qi to conclude.

This is the secret essential of the Golden Chamber, transmitted to the Perfected of Supreme Clarity. Those who receive it ascend as immortals, their rank equal to the Lofty Perfected. To recklessly divulge or slight it brings servitude in the River Source, and seven generations of ancestors shall bear the burden, barred from immortality.

The Middle Origin Lofty Ridge Lord of the Purple Orchid Void, the qi of the Primordial Great Dawn, is named Huizhi, styled Tongdaye, and stands thirty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of autumn, he wears the Three-Flowered Treasure Crown, a robe of divine essence in seven colors, a girdle of flowing gold and purple insignia, and a sword of stone essence and golden light. Standing upon azure mist, his seven-colored tiger chariot radiates brilliance in thirty-two hues. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a tiger-bodied figure with a dragon’s head, adorned with five-colored striations. His luminosity gleams and shines, amidst azure clouds upon a five-colored lotus. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a three-headed phoenix, its nine-colored patterns resplendent, its light illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into intertwining lights of purple and azure, coiling like the rising sun. This is the Lofty Ridge Lord’s reversion of the Purple Orchid’s qi, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Luminous Great Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Middle Origin Lofty Ridge Lord, regularly on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, purify the heart and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow in homage to the Lofty Ridge Lord, then turn north and click the teeth twelve times. With eyes closed, visualize the Lofty Ridge Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Spirit Radiance Palace of Supreme Clarity within the Divine Metamorphosis Court of the Three Wheels Realm of Perfected Completion. Securing the spirit and consolidating qi to seal the source of death.
Above, summoning the Lofty Void to gather the immortal host,
Soaring on feathered steps to ascend the Golden Gate,
Eternally partaking of the Thearch’s seat, life preserved in full,
Seven generations rejoicing together, freed from the Five Roots."*

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a human-bodied figure with nine raven heads, its nine-colored patterns radiant, its brilliance blazing and shining, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

chunks.original_text: 秋三月，化形为紫苍赤三色之光，混沌相绕如云之交，此则紫晨君反紫虚玉皇之气，更受炼玉晨之精，思之还反真形。 修行紫晨君之道，常以太岁之日，清斋入室，北向心拜J 朝紫晨君，叩齿三通，闭眼思紫晨君随四时形影，在上清变光宫九合府自然乡永康里中，回真下映，入兆左腋下，微祝曰： 九玄生紫晨，皇景发琼华，三炼洞神府，七入金离沙，吐纳餐童阳，含漱引日葩，四改随运生，妙景保朱霞，有能明此诀，携手步北阿。 毕，仰咽七气止。 此金房宝文，得修真道，飞行玉清。 紫虚三元紫精君，元紫晨之气，讳明上耀，字朋大光，长九千万丈。 春三月，建九元飞晨婴冠，衣丹锦飞裙，佩九天龙文虎书，带日精育延之剑，立五色莲华之上，项负七宝之光，思之还长九寸九分。 夏三月，紫精君化形为童子，颓云角髻，衣五色彩衣，手执华幢，光明，焕烂，照映上清，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形龙头蛇躯，青黄焕烂，光曜玉虚，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形为紫青白三色之光，沌沌如日月之晖，此则反紫虚三元之气，更受炼紫晨之精，思之还反真形。 修行紫精君之道，常以春分之日，清斋入室，东向心拜，朝紫精君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，闭眼思紫精君随四时形影，在上清玉宝宫洞灵府金相乡升乐里中，回真下映，入兆心房之中，微祝曰： 紫霄散朱灵，丹霄焕玉清，三元踊飞盖，徘徊紫阶庭，反我自然气，受炼莹玉形，养味月中水，仰吸朱日精，三华齐明景，策气迅八軿。 毕，仰咽七气止。 此九天秘祝，玉房宝文，得行其道，飞腾玉清。 轻泄漏慢，身役河源，不得入仙。 真阳九老玄一君，元洞晨之气，讳明流烂，字宣通勃，长五千万丈。 夏三月，建宝晨通精冠，衣九色云文锦袍，佩太上命神之章龙景丹文，立紫云之上，坐七色莲华，光明焕焕，思之还长五寸五分。 秋三月，化形为婴儿，坐紫虚之中，戴五色华盖，把五芝华幡，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形为月光，青色郁郁，在紫云之中青华之上，光明流照，洞映上清，思之还反真形。 春三月，化形为青绿玄三色之光，混沌相缠如云之交，郁勃上清之中，此则反真阳元老之气，更受炼元洞晨之精，思之还反真形。 修元老玄一之道，常以立夏之日，清斋入室，西向三拜朝元老毕，还北向平坐，叩齿十二通，思元老玄一君随四时形影，在上清飞玄宫洞太府九元乡三关里中，回真下映，入兆命门之处，微祝曰： 洞晨炼真阳，玄老乘虚发，四化变妙根，蕾买景曜朗月，迅虚亭丹衢，策辔之朱律，曲引冥乡交，同集九灵阙，微哉保劫功，谁测浮与没。 毕，仰咽九过止。 有知玄一四时变化，修之九年，则见真形下降寝房，能变形太虚，飞行上清。 太微天帝君，元洞元之气，讳大崇属，字元洞度，长三千万丈。 秋三月，建九元飞婴冠，衣七色凤云之袍，带夜光宝章交灵素绶，立五色师子之上，身生三十二色宝光，在上清之上，思之还长三寸二分。 冬三月，化形为无量真人，身负金光，照明十方，立九色之华，手执金铃，思之还反真形。 春三月，化形为日光，紫芒焕映玉虚之上，照明十方，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形为白苍绿三色光，更相缠绕如云之沓，此则帝君反太微之气，更受炼洞元之精，思之还反真形。

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a radiance of purple, azure, and crimson hues, their primordial chaos entwined like intersecting clouds—this is when the Purple Aurora Lord reverts to the qi of the Purple Void Jade Sovereign, further receiving the refined essence of the Jade Aurora. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Purple Aurora Lord, one must on the day of the Great Year, enter seclusion in purity, face north, and bow with reverence in the heart to the Purple Aurora Lord. Knock the teeth thrice, close the eyes, and visualize the Purple Aurora Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Ninefold Palace of the Radiant Light Court within the Natural Realm of the Eternal Peace Ward in Supreme Clarity. As his true essence descends and reflects, it enters beneath the adept’s left armpit. Silently recite:

*"Nine Mysteries birth the Purple Aurora,
Imperial radiance blooms with jade splendor.
Thrice refined, it illumines the Spirit Palace,
Sevenfold it enters the golden sands of Li.
Exhaling and inhaling, I feast on youthful yang,
Rinsing and swallowing, I draw the sun’s blossoms.
Four transformations follow the turning seasons,
Wondrous visions guard the vermilion clouds.
Whoever masters this secret
Shall hand in hand ascend the Northern Peak."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow seven breaths to conclude.

This is the Golden Chamber’s treasured scripture—those who practice the true Way shall ascend and soar through Jade Clarity.

---

The Purple Void Three Primes Purple Essence Lord, primordial qi of the Purple Aurora, bears the taboo name *Ming Shangyao* and the style *Peng Daguang*, standing ninety million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of spring, he wears the Nine Primes Flying Aurora Infant Crown, a robe of cinnabar brocade and flying skirts, and bears the Nine Heavens’ Dragon-Script Tiger Tally. Girded with the Sun Essence’s *Yuyan* Sword, he stands upon a five-colored lotus, his neck adorned with seven-jeweled radiance. When visualized, he reverts to a height of nine *cun* and nine *fen*.

In the third month of summer, the Purple Essence Lord transforms into a youth with cloud-like topknots, clad in five-colored robes, holding a floral banner. His light blazes brilliantly, illuminating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a dragon-headed serpent-bodied figure, its azure and yellow hues resplendent, its radiance shining upon the Jade Void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a radiance of purple, azure, and white hues, their chaos like the mingled brilliance of sun and moon—this is when he reverts to the qi of the Purple Void Three Primes, further receiving the refined essence of the Purple Aurora. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Purple Essence Lord, one must on the day of the Spring Equinox, enter seclusion in purity, face east, and bow with reverence in the heart to the Purple Essence Lord. Then turn north, knock the teeth twelve times, close the eyes, and visualize the Purple Essence Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Treasure Palace of Supreme Clarity’s Cavernous Spirit Court within the Golden Phase Ward of the Ascending Joy Ward. As his true essence descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s heart chamber. Silently recite:

*"Purple Empyrean scatters vermilion spirits,
Cinnabar Empyrean gleams with jade clarity.
Three Primes surge with flying canopies,
Wandering the purple courtyards of the steps.
Return my natural qi,
Receive refinement to polish my jade form.
Nourish my taste with the moon’s waters,
Draw upward the essence of the vermilion sun.
Three blossoms unite in radiant vision,
Harnessing qi to hasten the eight steeds."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow seven breaths to conclude.

This is the Nine Heavens’ secret incantation, the Jade Chamber’s treasured scripture—those who practice its Way shall ascend and soar through Jade Clarity. To lightly disclose or neglect it is to consign oneself to the River’s source, barred from attaining immortality.

---

The True Yang Nine Elders Mysterious Unity Lord, primordial qi of the Cavernous Aurora, bears the taboo name *Ming Liulan* and the style *Xuantongbo*, standing fifty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of summer, he wears the Precious Aurora Permeating Essence Crown, a nine-colored cloud-patterned brocade robe, and bears the Supreme Lord’s Life-Spirit Seal and Dragon Radiance Cinnabar Script. Standing upon purple clouds, seated upon a seven-colored lotus, his light blazes brilliantly. When visualized, he reverts to a height of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into an infant seated within the Purple Void, crowned with a five-colored floral canopy, holding a banner of five sacred mushrooms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into moonlight, its azure hue dense and luxuriant, resting upon the azure blossoms above the purple clouds. His radiance flows and illuminates, penetrating Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a radiance of azure, green, and mysterious hues, their primordial chaos entwined like intersecting clouds, their luxuriance surging through Supreme Clarity—this is when he reverts to the qi of the True Yang Elders, further receiving the refined essence of the Cavernous Aurora. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Mysterious Unity of the Elders, one must on the day of the Beginning of Summer, enter seclusion in purity, face west, and thrice bow to the Elders. Then turn north, sit upright, knock the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Mysterious Unity Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Flying Mystery Palace of Supreme Clarity’s Cavernous Supreme Court within the Three Passes Ward of the Nine Primes Realm. As his true essence descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s Gate of Life. Silently recite:

*"Cavernous Aurora refines true yang,
Mysterious Elders arise upon the void.
Four transformations alter the wondrous root,
Budding to bloom with the radiance of the bright moon.
Swift as the void, it halts at the cinnabar thoroughfare,
Harnessing the reins of the vermilion rhythm.
Bending to guide the exchanges of the dark realm,
Together they gather at the Ninefold Numinous Gate.
Subtle indeed is the merit of preserving the kalpa—
Who can fathom the floating and the submerged?"*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths to conclude.

Those who know the Mysterious Unity’s four seasonal transformations and cultivate them for nine years shall witness his true form descend into their chamber, enabling them to transform into the Great Void and ascend to soar through Supreme Clarity.

---

The Supreme Microcosm Heavenly Thearch, primordial qi of the Cavernous Origin, bears the taboo name *Da Chongshu* and the style *Yuandongdu*, standing thirty million *zhang* tall.

In the third month of autumn, he wears the Nine Primes Flying Infant Crown, a seven-colored phoenix-cloud robe, and a belt of Night Radiance Treasure Seals with intertwined numinous white ribbons. Standing upon a five-colored lion, his body emits thirty-two hues of jeweled radiance, dwelling above Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into an immeasurable perfected one, his body wreathed in golden light, illuminating the ten directions. Standing upon nine-colored blossoms, he holds a golden bell. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into sunlight, its purple rays blazing upon the Jade Void, illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a radiance of white, azure, and green hues, their interwoven chaos like layered clouds—this is when the Thearch reverts to the qi of the Supreme Microcosm, further receiving the refined essence of the Cavernous Origin. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

chunks.original_text: 修天帝君之道，常以春分之日，沐浴入室，东向再拜朝帝君毕，还北向平坐叩齿三通，思帝君随四时形影、在上清云霞宫八朗府三真乡五晨里中，回真下映，入兆右腋下，微祝曰： 洞源变灵，九色明鲜，回合太微，四化成真，玉虚郁勃，景曜朱烟，含华漱泉，飞芳八缠，仰餐流晖，炼灌我身，我身变化，升入九天，上书仙籍，与帝结缘。 毕，仰咽九过止。 有知帝君四时之变，寿同二一光，修行其道，飞行上清，轻泄漏慢，七祖充责。 青灵阳安君，元洞浩之气，讳度众法，字大开明，长五千万丈。 冬三月，建三精芙蓉晨冠，衣云文丹锦飞裘，履九色师子，佩流金火铃，交带七元，身生七变之光，炜晔玉清之上细微之内，思之还长三寸三分。 春三月，化形为老公，头戴飞龙，口衔月，身衣羽衣，手持紫绶，在丹霞之上，照明玉清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形为虎头人身，五色斑斓，光照十方，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形为黄绿紫三色之光，混沌上清，如日之晖，此则反青灵之气，更受炼洞浩之精，思之还反真形。 修行阳安君之道，常以立春之日，沐浴入室，东向再拜朝阳安君毕，还北向叩齿九通，思阳安君随四时形影，在上清招摇宫六合府广灵乡洞泉里中，回真下映，入兆两丸之间车轴下户，微祝曰： 洞浩峙五华，神晖灌青灵，混合帝一气，变化随运生，通朗始神堂，发幽炼丹形，玄玄九元内，寥寥中有精，真景耀云宫，奕奕照三清，回映细微中，表尔形与名，气入神寂房，回宴紫霄軿。 毕，咽气三过止。 有知阳安四化之形，寿同天地，修之九年，白日飞行。 上元太素三元君，元晨华之气，讳云育瑛，字勃芝，长三千万丈。 春三月，建宝玄扶晨羽冠，服紫气浮云锦帔，九色龙锦羽裙，腰带流金火铃虎符龙书，坐於太空之中，膝下常有丹绿青三素之云，光明炜晔，映照十方，在九天之上细微之内，思之还长七寸。 夏三月，化形一身三头，戴七称宝冠，服三素飞云锦衣，立九色凤凰，上照十方，思之还反真形。 秋三月、化形为七曜华精玉光，炜晔紫云之上，光色郁郁如日之晖，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形为紫白黄色之光，蓊蓊勃勃如金之精，此则反上元太素之气，更受炼晨华之精，思之还反真形。 修行三元之道，常以本命、太岁之日，沐浴入室，西向三拜朝三元君毕，还北向平坐叩齿九通，思三元君随四时形影，在上清宝素宫九玄府晨华乡玉皇里中，回真下映，入兆九孔之户，微祝曰： 三素回天元，流霄翼玉灵，靡靡乘玄散，飘飘虚上清，把我自然运，改化岂常名，妙觉始玄旦，欣我万劫龄，太霞虽云辽，洞映监有情，相与携玉契，同期九天軿，咽三气止。 此紫元六合宫中秘道，有知三元四时之化不死，修行其道，飞行上清。 高上太素君，元洞观之气，讳宝洞通，字明世宗，长#2三千万丈。 夏三月，头建紫元宝冠，衣丹锦七色之，佩豁落七曜元章，带三宝招仙之策，立五色莲华之上，光明焕照，思之还长七寸。 秋三月，太素君则变形龙头人身，五色斑斓，光明流曜，映照十方，思之还反真形。 冬三月，太素君则变形三日之象，光映混沌，照明上清，思之还反真形。 春三月太素君则变形苍白二色之光，奕奕在元气之中，紫霄之上，此则反高上太素之气，更受炼元洞观之精，思之还反真形。

To cultivate the Way of the Heavenly Thearch Lord, one should, on the day of the Spring Equinox, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow twice and pay homage to the Thearch Lord. Then, turn north, sit upright, and click the teeth thrice. Visualize the Thearch Lord, who transforms with the four seasons in form and shadow, residing in the Cloud Radiance Palace of the Eight Luminaries Prefecture within the Three Perfected Realm of the Five Mornings in the Supreme Clarity. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters beneath the adept’s right armpit. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Cavernous Origin, transmuting numinous,
Nine-hued brilliance, resplendent and bright,
Revolving to merge with the Supreme Microcosm,
Four transformations perfect the true.
Jade Void, dense and flourishing,
Radiance blazes as crimson mist.
Embracing blossoms, rinsing in springs,
Fragrance soars in eightfold coils.
Gaze upward to feast on streaming splendor,
Refining and bathing my body.
My body transmutes and ascends,
Rising into the Nine Heavens,
Inscribed in the immortal registers,
Bound in affinity with the Thearch."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow nine times.

Those who comprehend the Thearch Lord’s four seasonal transformations shall have a lifespan equal to the dual unity of light. By cultivating his Way, one soars into the Supreme Clarity. Careless leaks or sloth will implicate seven generations of ancestors.

The Azure Numinous Yang Pacified Lord is the *qi* of the Vast Cavernous Origin. His tabooed name is "Degree of All Methods," and his style is "Great Illumination." His stature spans fifty million *zhang*.

In the third month of winter, he dons a crown of threefold essence and morning hibiscus, robes of cloud-patterned cinnabar brocade with flying feathers, and rides nine-colored lion steeds. He wears flowing golden fire bells, a sash of the Seven Origins, and his body emanates sevenfold transmuting light, resplendent within the subtle depths above the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into an elder, his head crowned with a flying dragon, mouth holding the moon, body clad in feathered robes, and hands grasping a purple sash. Upon the cinnabar clouds, he illuminates the Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a tiger-headed human, five-colored and variegated, his light illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a radiance of yellow, green, and purple hues, chaotic and ascending into the Supreme Clarity like the sun’s brilliance. This is when he reverts to the *qi* of the Azure Numinous and further receives the refined essence of the Cavernous Vastness. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Yang Pacified Lord, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Spring, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow twice and pay homage to the Yang Pacified Lord. Then, turn north and click the teeth nine times. Visualize the Yang Pacified Lord, who transforms with the four seasons in form and shadow, residing in the Grand Tenuity Palace of the Six Harmonies Prefecture within the Vast Numinous Realm of the Cavernous Springs in the Supreme Clarity. As his true form descends and reflects, it enters the space between the adept’s two pellets beneath the axle of the chariot gate. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Cavernous Vastness erects the Five Blossoms,
Divine radiance bathes the Azure Numinous.
Merging with the Thearch’s unified *qi*,
Transformations follow the course of arising.
Penetrating and luminous, the primal spirit hall,
Unveiling the obscure to refine the cinnabar form.
Within the profound profundity of the Nine Origins,
In the vast emptiness, essence abides.
True effulgences illuminate the cloud palaces,
Resplendent, they shine upon the Three Clarities.
Revolving to reflect within the subtle depths,
Manifesting your form and name.
*Qi* enters the tranquil chamber of spirit,
Revolving to feast in the purple auroral chariot."*

Upon completion, swallow the *qi* thrice.

Those who comprehend the Yang Pacified Lord’s four seasonal transformations shall have a lifespan equal to heaven and earth. By cultivating his Way for nine years, one ascends in broad daylight.

The Supreme Primordial Three Origin Lords are the *qi* of the Morn Radiance. Their tabooed name is "Cloud Nurtures Jade," and their style is "Flourishing Mushroom." Their stature spans thirty million *zhang*.

In the third month of spring, they don a feathered crown of precious mystery and morning support, wear a purple *qi* floating-cloud brocade mantle, a nine-colored dragon brocade feathered skirt, and a waistband of flowing golden fire bells, tiger talismans, and dragon scripts. Seated amidst the Great Void, beneath their knees ever flow cinnabar, green, and white primordial clouds. Their light shines brilliantly, illuminating the ten directions. Within the subtle depths above the Nine Heavens, when visualized, they revert to a height of seven *cun*.

In the third month of summer, they transform into a single body with three heads, crowned with seven-tiered precious diadems, clad in three primordial flying-cloud brocade robes, and stand upon nine-colored phoenixes, their light illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, they revert to their true form.

In the third month of autumn, they transform into the seven luminaries’ radiant essence and jade light, resplendent upon the purple clouds, their luminous hues dense and flourishing like the sun’s brilliance. When visualized, they revert to their true form.

In the third month of winter, they transform into a radiance of purple, white, and yellow hues, luxuriant and flourishing like the essence of gold. This is when they revert to the *qi* of the Supreme Primordial and further receive the refined essence of the Morn Radiance. When visualized, they revert to their true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Three Origins, one should, on the days of one’s life destiny and the Grand Year Star, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow thrice and pay homage to the Three Origin Lords. Then, turn north, sit upright, and click the teeth nine times. As their true form descends and reflects, it enters the adept’s nine apertures. Softly intone the incantation:

*"Three Primordials revolve the celestial origin,
Flowing auroras wing the Jade Numinous.
Vastly they ride the mysterious dispersal,
Wafting into the void of the Supreme Clarity.
Grasping my natural course,
How could transformations bear constant names?
Wondrous awakening begins the primal dawn,
Rejoicing in my myriad kalpas’ span.
Though the Great Auroras seem distant,
Their cavernous reflections oversee the sentient.
Together we hold the jade covenant,
Bound for the Nine Heavens’ chariot.
Swallow the three *qi* and cease."*

This is the secret Way of the Purple Origin Six Harmonies Palace. Those who comprehend the Three Origins’ four seasonal transformations shall not die. By cultivating their Way, one soars into the Supreme Clarity.

The Highest Supreme Primordial Lord is the *qi* of the Cavernous Contemplation. His tabooed name is "Precious Cavernous Penetration," and his style is "Illustrious Lineage of the World." His stature spans twenty-three million *zhang*.

In the third month of summer, he dons a crown of the Purple Origin, robes of cinnabar brocade with seven-colored *qi*, and wears the seven luminaries’ primordial talismans of the Vast Opening. He bears the three treasures’ summons to transcendence and stands upon five-colored lotuses, his light blazing and illuminating. When visualized, he reverts to a height of seven *cun*.

In the third month of autumn, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into a dragon-headed human, five-colored and variegated, his light streaming and illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into the image of three suns, their light reflecting the chaos and illuminating the Supreme Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into a radiance of azure and white hues, resplendent within the primordial *qi* and above the purple auroras. This is when he reverts to the *qi* of the Highest Supreme Primordial and further receives the refined essence of the Cavernous Contemplation. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

chunks.original_text: 修行太素君之道，常以甲子日，沐浴入室，西北向再拜朝太素君毕，还北向平坐叩齿三通，思太素君随四时形影，在上清无量宫映天府七相乡九转里中，回真下映，入兆背中骨节之府，微祝曰： 太素策运，四景虚飞，通精散气，炼变紫晖，三宝华盖，绿軿徘徊，流映霞庭，光曜高微，来变我神，生我羽衣，轻翔毛服，八气齐飞。 毕，咽气八过止。 知太素随四时之变，则寿万年，修行其道，飞行上清，轻泄灵文，身死失仙。 上清紫精三素君，元洞阳之气，讳霄华，字法灵曜，长七千万丈。 秋三月，头建通精晨冠，衣五色斑文虎衣，佩交灵素绶，带招仙之剑，立九色师子之上，项生圆光，照明上清，思之还长七寸。 冬三月，紫精三素元君则变形为凤头人身，衣苍碧紫三色羽衣，光明流焕上清之中，思之还反真形。 春三月，紫精三素元君则变形人头龙身，文彩焕曜，照明上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，紫精三素元君则变形为黄黑二色之光，混沌相缠如云之升，此则反紫精之气，更受炼洞阳之精，思之还反真形。 修行三元君之道，常以庚申之日，沐浴入室，西向再拜朝元君毕，还北向平坐叩齿三通，思元君随四时形影，在上清玉皇官宝云府三气乡交灵里中，回真下映，入兆大槌骨首之户，便微祝 曰： 紫精散景晖，变炼九气庭，方圆三便府，离合改运生，吐津灌日根，皇华曜紫清，寻我高上道，微中有至灵，谁能回我舆，与尔结玄名。 毕，咽气三过止。 有知此道，三素降真形，修行九年，飞行上清。 皇清洞真君，元明皓灵之气，讳元宝琮，字理玄赜，长五千万丈。 冬三月，冠三梁玉晨之冠，衣七色虎文之裘，带流金火铃七色杖幡，立三素飞云之上，光明炜晔玉虚之内，思之还长五寸五分。 春三月，洞真君变形，头巾黄巾，衣四十二条法衣，手执华幡，在紫云之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，洞真君则变形，冥目闭视，头戴华盖，足履莲华，思之还反真形。 秋三月，洞真君则变形为黄白二色之光，光明流焕在太空之中，照明十天，此则反皇清之气，更受炼明皓灵之精，思之还反真形。 修行洞真君之道，以立冬之日，沐浴入室，北向三拜，朝洞真君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿十二通，思洞真君随四时形影，在上清洞玄宫清微府玉相乡金婴里中，回真下映，入兆口之四际中，微祝曰： 皇清标晨晖，灵气翼虚迁，飘飘九元上，靡靡入帝晨，仰吸月中水，俯引曰华根，洞炼广灵气，流芳灌我真、乘运寻帝景，意合致玉仙。 毕，咽气七过止。 有知洞真四变之道，三年则与神交言，修行九年，飞行玉清。 皇上四老道中君，元洞虚之气，讳镜际，字浩元，长七千万丈。 春三月，头建明真七宝玉冠，衣凤文斑袍，佩豁落流铃，带招真之剑，立于九色师子之上，十二华光在上清之上，紫虚之中，思之还长七寸。 夏三月，道中君则变形为小儿，衣五彩之衣，口衔七星，立白云之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，道中君则变形为人头蛇身，五色斑斓，在玉虚之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，道中君则变形为青赤白主色之云，更相缠绕，在玄空之中，此则反皇上之气，更受炼洞虚之精，思之还反真形。 修行道中君之道，常以冬至日，沐浴入室，东南向四拜，朝道中君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿十二通，思道中君随四时形影，在上清流精宫会明府太仙乡三清里中，回真下映，入兆背穷骨地户，微祝曰：

To cultivate the Way of the Supreme Primordial Lord, always on the day of *jiazi*, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing northwest, bow twice and pay homage to the Supreme Primordial Lord. Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the Supreme Primordial Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Boundless Palace of Supreme Clarity, within the Heavenly Prefecture’s Sevenfold Phase and Ninefold Cycle, his true radiance descending to illuminate and enter the adept’s spinal repository of bone and joint. Softly recite:

*"The Supreme Primordial’s strategy moves,
Four seasons soar in emptiness,
Refining essence, dispersing *qi*,
Transforming into purple radiance.
Triple Treasure’s floral canopy,
Green chariots drift and hover,
Streaming light through rosy courts,
Illuminating the lofty subtle.
Come, transform my spirit,
Grow my feathered robe,
Lightly soaring in plumed attire,
Eight *qi* ascending in unison."*

When finished, swallow *qi* eight times and cease.

Knowing the Supreme Primordial’s seasonal transformations grants longevity of ten thousand years. Cultivating this Way allows flight to Supreme Clarity. Revealing its sacred script lightly brings death and loss of immortality.

---

In the third month of summer, the Cavernous Perfected Lord transforms, his eyes closed in darkness, a floral canopy crowning his head, his feet treading upon lotus blossoms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Cavernous Perfected Lord, on the day of the Beginning of Winter, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing north, bow three times and pay homage to the Cavernous Perfected Lord. Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth twelve times. Visualize the Cavernous Perfected Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Cavernous Mysterious Palace of Supreme Clarity, within the Jade Phase Precinct’s Golden Infant Quarter of the Pure Tenuity Prefecture. His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the four boundaries of the adept’s mouth. Softly recite:

*"August Clarity’s standard dawns in radiance,
Numinous *qi* wings its ethereal ascent,
Drifting above the Ninefold Primordial,
Gently entering the Emperor’s dawn.
Gazing up, I draw the moon’s water,
Bowing down, I guide the sun’s root.
Cavernously refining the vast spirit *qi*,
Flowing fragrance to irrigate my true self.
Riding the course to seek the Emperor’s splendor,
My intent harmonizes to attain Jade Immortality."*

When finished, swallow *qi* seven times and cease.

Knowing the Cavernous Perfected Lord’s fourfold seasonal transformations, one may converse with spirits in three years. Cultivating this Way for nine years allows flight to Jade Clarity.

The August Supreme Four Elders’ Way-Middle Lord, the *qi* of Primordial Cavernous Emptiness, is named *Jingji* and styled *Haoyuan*, standing seventy million *zhang* tall.

chunks.original_text: 四老中真，散华云房，回景四陈，变化八方，吐纳三精，流映我宫，仙魂仙魄，髓结玉容，乘虚策霄，飞入太空。 毕，咽气四过止。 有知道中君四变之道，寿享万年，修行致神降，白日升天。 玉晨太上大道君，元虚灵之气，讳嚣献，字波苦渊，长九千万丈。 秋三月，头建百变神光玉冠，披飞森霜珠之袍，七色虎衣，佩九色离罗之章，带晨光月明之铃，坐七色之云，光明流曜上清之中，思之还长九寸。 冬三月，太上道君则变形，头戴七光圆轮，身着三十二色法衣，立九色师子之上，光明炜曜，在上清之上太微之中，思之还反真形。 春三月，太上大道，君变形为老子，头戴角巾，身着虎文之衣，手执金符，在五芝华上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，太上大道君变形为紫黄二色之光，光明奕奕，更相缠绕在紫虚之中，反玉晨之气，更受炼虚灵之精，思之还反真形。 修行大道君之道，常以八节、本命之日，沐浴入室，北向再拜朝玉晨君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿九通，思玉晨君随四时形影，在上清蕊珠宫日阙府紫映乡金光里中，回真下映，入兆颈处十二间梁之中，微祝曰： 玉晨带高灵，总真御八清，玉华披丹房，紫凤曜云营，携致玄都真，同炼朱丹精，随化变五神，营晖明上灵，元道无穷方，微我妙有生，命仙度符籍，表尔形与名。 毕，仰咽五气止。 此高上玉篇，知者寿万年，修之九年，飞升 上清，轻泄至妙，身死不仙。 中央黄老君，元五晖之气，讳无英生，字云九夜，长三千万丈。 夏三月，头建宝琅晨冠，衣九色云文裘，带交灵紫绶，十二色华光，常立五色师子之上，光明流曜上清之中，思之还长三寸三分。 秋三月，中央黄老君则变形为玉童，头戴七精之华，衣飞天羽衣，手执华幡，思之还反真形。 冬三月，中央黄老君则变形为大仙，通身黄金色，衣七色衣，项负圆光，足履莲华，光明流焕，思之还反真形。 春三月，中央黄老君则变形为紫绿青三色之光，更相缠绕在玉虚之上，此则反中央之气，更受炼元五晖之精，思之还反真形。 修行黄老君之道，常以庚申、甲子之日，沐浴入室，东北向三拜朝黄老君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿十二通止，思黄老君随四时形影，在上清空映宫金珠府上精乡昌乐里中，回真下映，入兆胸中四极中，微祝曰： 太清连玉虚，玄云散朱宫，四化分流逝，化化改常容，妙景乘灵恍，混合生空伺，得真在感会，高下玄成双，静念自形丧，心希冥岭峰。 毕，咽气五过止。 得知黄老四变之容，寿享万年，修行其道，飞行上清。 太极大道元景君，元上融之气，讳道大师，字度大明，长三千万丈。 秋三月，头建晨婴宝冠，衣无缝九色单衣，佩神虎上符，带宝仙之剑，项负流金之光，照明七十四方，立玄龟上，思之还长三寸三分。 冬三月，大道元景君则变形为虎头龙身，五色文彩，照明上清，思之还反真形。 春三月，大道元景君则变形为老子，散发至腰，衣飞青羽衣，立紫云上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，大道元景看则变形为青赤二色之光，混混沌沌，更相缠绕在紫虚之上，此则反太极之气，更受炼元上融之精，思之还反真形。 修行元景君之道，常以立秋之日，沐浴入室，西向再拜朝元景君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿三通，思元景君随四时形影，在上清长命宫八缥府上元乡会灵里中，回真下映，入兆胃管之户高膜之中，微祝曰：
chunks.translated_text:
The Four Elders amidst the True Ones scatter flower-cloud chambers,
Their radiance revolving through the four quarters, transforming across the eight directions.
They exhale and absorb the Three Essences, their flowing luminance illuminating my palace.
The immortal soul and immortal spirit congeal, marrow knits, and the jade countenance forms.
Riding the void, they spur the clouds, soaring into the Great Emptiness.
When finished, swallow the *qi* four times and cease.

Those who know the Way-Middle Lord’s fourfold transformations shall enjoy a lifespan of ten thousand years.
Through cultivation, they summon the divine to descend; at noon, they ascend to heaven.

The Jade Dawn Supreme Great Dao Lord, primordial spirit of the Mysterious Void,
bears the taboo name *Xiaoxian* and the style *Bokuyao*, standing ninety million *zhang* tall.
In autumn’s three months, his head is crowned with a hundred-transforming divine-light jade coronet,
clad in a robe of flying frost-pearls, seven-hued tiger garments,
girded with nine-colored *li* silk sashes, and belted with dawn-light moon-bright bells.
Seated upon seven-colored clouds, his radiance streams and shines within Supreme Clarity.
When visualized, he reverts to nine inches in height.

In winter’s three months, the Supreme Dao Lord transforms:
his head wears a seven-light circular wheel, his body dons thirty-two-colored dharma robes,
and he stands atop nine-colored lions, his luminous brilliance blazing within the Supreme Clarity above the Great Tenuity.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In spring’s three months, the Supreme Great Dao Lord transforms into Lord Lao,
his head crowned with a horned kerchief, his body clad in tiger-patterned robes,
holding a golden talisman, standing upon five-blossomed mushrooms.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In summer’s three months, the Supreme Great Dao Lord transforms into a dual radiance of purple and yellow,
its luminous splendor intertwining within the Purple Void.
He reverts to the *qi* of the Jade Dawn and further receives the refined essence of the Numinous Void.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Great Dao Lord, always on the eight solar terms and one’s natal day,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing north, bow twice and pay homage to the Jade Dawn Lord.
Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth nine times.
Visualize the Jade Dawn Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons,
residing in the Supreme Clarity’s Rosy Pearl Palace, Sun Gate Prefecture, Purple Radiance Precinct, Golden Light Quarter.
His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s twelve spinal beams at the neck.

The Jade Dawn bears lofty numina,
governing the Eight Clarities in total truth.
Jade blossoms drape the cinnabar chamber,
purple phoenixes illumine the cloud encampment.
They lead the Perfected of Mysterious Capital,
together refining the cinnabar essence.
Following transformations, the Five Spirits shift,
their luminous radiance brightening the Highest Numinous.
The primordial Dao has no boundless direction,
subtly I am wondrously born.
Command the immortals to bestow talismanic registers,
inscribe your form and name.

Revealing its utmost subtleties results in death without transcendence.

The Central Yellow Elder Lord, primordial *qi* of the Five Luminances,

When visualized, he reverts to three inches and three *fen* in height.

In autumn’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into a jade lad,

In winter’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into a great immortal,

his neck bearing a halo of radiance, his feet treading lotus blossoms.
His luminous brilliance flows and shines.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In spring’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into a triple radiance of purple, green, and blue,
intertwining above the Jade Void.
He reverts to the *qi* of the Center and further receives the refined essence of the Primordial Five Luminances.
When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Yellow Elder Lord, always on *gengshen* and *jiazi* days,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing northeast, bow three times and pay homage to the Yellow Elder Lord.

Softly recite:
Supreme Clarity connects to the Jade Void,
mysterious clouds disperse the cinnabar palace.
Four transformations diverge and flow away,
each metamorphosis alters its constant form.
Wondrous scenes ride the numinous and indistinct,
blending and merging to give birth to the void’s attendants.

Those who know the Yellow Elder’s fourfold transformations shall enjoy a lifespan of ten thousand years.

The Great Ultimate Primordial Radiance Lord, primordial *qi* of the Supreme Fusion,

In winter’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into a tiger-headed dragon-bodied form,

In spring’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into Lord Lao,

In summer’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into a dual radiance of blue and red,
profoundly chaotic, intertwining above the Purple Void.
He reverts to the *qi* of the Great Ultimate and further receives the refined essence of the Primordial Supreme Fusion.

chunks.original_text: 元景洞玄，九微炼形，四运变化，随气改生，生真混合，流映八冥，我乘日吉，上告帝灵，求仙升飞，八景齐并，万倾会集，得御流軿，升入九虚，朝谒三清。 毕，仰咽十二气止。 有知元景四变之道，寿三千岁，修之九年，与真同景，飞行上清。 太清大道君，元景玉融之气，讳负上合，字灵幽会，长#3七千万丈。 冬三月，头建九元通天之冠，衣九色龙衣，佩三气中章，带交灵素绶，足立三素之云，光明焕曜，在上清之上，思之还长三寸二分。 春三月，太清大道君则变形为三头之凤，口衔素绶，一身有九色之羽，文彩焕烂，洞映上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，太清大道君则变形为三月之圆光，色赤沌沌如车之轮，光明洞曜在太清之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，太清大道君则变形为紫白黄三色之光，光明焕焕，洞照上清，此则反太清之气，更受炼元景玉融之精，思之还反真形。 修行太清大道君之道，常以立春之日，沐浴入室，北向三拜朝道君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿三通，思大道君随四时形影，在上清上初宫始生府六合乡风生里中，回真下降，入兆喉内极根之户，微祝曰： 太清散灵，九晖吐津，金光玉符，五色流烟，上化下合，变景九天，万神混炼，内照成仙，入室辅真，飞晨帝庭。 毕，仰咽三气止。 有知此道则不死，修之九年神仙。 皇初紫元君，元融生之气，讳兴劫行，字一气真，长九千万丈。 春三月，头建紫元宝琅神冠，衣三色虎文之裘，佩素灵之绶，立三素之云，光明焕照，洞观十方，在上清之上八微之内，思之还长九寸九分。 夏三月，皇初紫元君则变形为大仙，通身金色，项负圆明，文彩焕烂，光明奕奕，照映十方，思之还反真形。 秋三月，皇初紫元君则变形为三色童子，衣五彩衣，手把华幡，奕奕焕焕，照明上清，思之还反真形。 冬三月，皇初紫元君则变形为苍碧紫三色之光，光明焕曜，照朗上清，此则反皇初之气，更受炼元融生之精，思之还反真形。 修行紫元君之道，常以太岁甲子之日，沐浴入室，南向一拜朝紫元君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿三通止，思紫元君随四时形影，在上清高虚宫重空府霄中乡神汉里中，回真下降，入兆泥丸鼻两孔下源之中，微祝曰： 紫皇元初，道合玄虚，三变九分，混化太初，结精未散，道灵金华，黄上观真，辅明玉书，天魂检气，神升紫虚，飞灵流軿，苍盖绿舆，运致我身，朝谒方诸。 毕，咽气九过止。 此上皇妙道，秘於朱台，得修其法，飞升上清。 轻泄灵文，七祖充责，身负风刀。 无英中真上老君，元玄昱之气，讳景中华，字明炜，长七千万丈。 夏三月，头建通天宝冠，衣七色斑文之衣，佩灵飞紫绶，带通真之剑，立九色师子之上，光明洞照，焕赫上清，思之还长七寸七分。 秋三月，中真上老君则化形为老公，建黄巾，衣黄锦袍，手把金杖，立莲华之上，光明照映十方，思之还反真形。 冬三月，中真上老君则化形为三日之光，光明奕奕，照映十天，三气混合鸡子之黄，思之还反真形。 春三月，中真上老君则化形为紫苍白三色之光，光明焕照，映彻於九天，此则反无英中真之气，更受炼元玄昱之精，思之还反真形。 修中真上老君之道，常以立春、本命、太岁之日，沐浴入室，西向三礼朝老君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿九通止，思上老君随四时形影，在上清飞玄宫紫童府金耀乡苍元里中，回真下降，入兆太仓五腹之口，微祝曰：
chunks.translated_text:
The Primordial Radiance penetrates the Mysterious, refining the form through the Nine Subtleties.
The Four Movements transform and shift, altering with the *qi* to rebirth,
birth merging with the true, flowing to illuminate the Eight Darknesses.
On this auspicious day, I ascend to report to the Divine Spirits,
seeking immortality and ascension, the Eight Effulgences aligned as one,
ten thousand expanses converging, to ride the streaming chariot,
ascending into the Nine Voids, to pay homage to the Three Pures.
Conclude by raising the head and swallowing twelve breaths.

Those who know the Way of the Four Transformations of the Primordial Radiance
shall live three thousand years. Cultivating it for nine years,
they shall share the same effulgence as the Perfected and ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity, the *qi* of Primordial Radiance Jade Fusion,
whose tabooed name is *Fu Shang He* and style *Ling You Hui*,
stands seventy million *zhang* in height.
In the third month of winter, he dons the Nine Origins Penetrating Heaven Crown,
wears the Nine-Colored Dragon Robe, bears the Central Chapter of the Three *Qi*,
girds the Intertwined Numinous White Sash, and stands upon the Threefold Plainness Clouds.
His radiance shines brilliantly, residing above the Upper Clarity.
Visualize him returning to a height of three *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of spring, the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity transforms his form
into a three-headed phoenix, holding a plain sash in its beak,
its body adorned with nine-colored feathers, resplendent in pattern and hue,
illuminating the Upper Clarity. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the third month of summer, the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity transforms his form
into a round light of three months’ span, its color a chaotic red like a chariot’s wheel,
its radiance penetrating and shining above the Grand Clarity.
Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity transforms his form
into a radiance of purple, white, and yellow hues, its brilliance resplendent,
illuminating the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion to the *qi* of the Grand Clarity,
further receiving the refined essence of the Primordial Radiance Jade Fusion.
Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity,
always on the day of the Beginning of Spring,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing north, bow thrice and pay homage to the Dao Lord.
Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth three times.
Visualize the Great Dao Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons,
residing in the Upper Clarity’s Initial Palace, Origin Birth Prefecture, Six Harmonies Precinct, Wind Birth Quarter.
His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s throat at the root of the extreme limit.
Softly recite:
*Grand Clarity disperses the numinous,
Nine Glows spout essence,
Golden Light and Jade Talisman,
Five Colors flow as mist,
Above transforms, below merges,
Effulgence shifts the Nine Heavens,
Myriad spirits refine in fusion,
Inner illumination achieves immortality,
Entering the chamber to assist the true,
Flying at dawn to the Imperial Court.*
Conclude by raising the head and swallowing three breaths.

Those who know this Way shall not die; cultivating it for nine years, they shall become divine immortals.

The August Primordial Purple Origin Lord, the *qi* of Primordial Fusion Birth,
whose tabooed name is *Xing Jie Xing* and style *One Qi Perfected*,
stands ninety million *zhang* in height.
In the third month of spring, he dons the Purple Origin Precious Jade Crown,
wears the Three-Colored Tiger-Patterned Robe, bears the Plain Numinous Sash,
and stands upon the Threefold Plainness Clouds. His radiance shines brilliantly,
penetrating to observe the ten directions, within the Eight Subtleties above the Upper Clarity.
Visualize him returning to a height of nine *cun* and nine *fen*.

In the third month of summer, the August Primordial Purple Origin Lord transforms his form
into a great immortal, his entire body golden, bearing a round luminosity upon his neck,
resplendent in pattern and hue, his radiance shining brightly,
illuminating the ten directions. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the third month of autumn, the August Primordial Purple Origin Lord transforms his form
into a three-colored youth, clad in five-colored robes, holding a floral banner,
resplendent and brilliant, illuminating the Upper Clarity.
Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the August Primordial Purple Origin Lord transforms his form
into a radiance of azure, purple, and violet hues, its brilliance shining brightly,
illuminating the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion to the *qi* of the August Primordial,
further receiving the refined essence of the Primordial Fusion Birth.
Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Purple Origin Lord,
always on the day of the *jiazi* year of the Great Year,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow once and pay homage to the Purple Origin Lord.
Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth three times.
Visualize the Purple Origin Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons,
residing in the Upper Clarity’s Lofty Void Palace, Double Emptiness Prefecture, Cloudy Middle Precinct, Divine Han Quarter.
His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s Muddy Pellet at the source beneath the two nostrils.
Softly recite:
*Purple August Primordial Origin,
Dao merges with the Mysterious Void,
Three transformations, nine divisions,
Fusing and transforming the Grand Primordial,
Essence congealed, undispersed,
Dao numinous, golden blossom,
Yellow ascends to observe the true,
Assisting the luminous Jade Writ,
Heavenly soul inspects the qi,
Spirit ascends the Purple Void,
Flying numinous streaming chariot,
Azure canopy, green carriage,
Conveying to my body,
To pay homage at the Square Reservoirs.*
Conclude by swallowing nine breaths.

This is the August Wondrous Way, concealed within the Vermilion Terrace.
Those who cultivate its method shall ascend to the Upper Clarity.
Revealing the numinous writ lightly shall implicate seven generations,
and the body shall bear the Wind Blade’s burden.

The Middle Perfected Supreme Elder Lord of the Nameless, the *qi* of Primordial Mysterious Brilliance,
whose tabooed name is *Jing Zhong Hua* and style *Ming Wei*,
stands seventy million *zhang* in height.
In the third month of summer, he dons the Penetrating Heaven Precious Crown,
wears the Seven-Colored Mottled Robe, bears the Numinous Flying Purple Sash,
girds the Sword of Penetrating the True, and stands upon the Nine-Colored Lion.
His radiance shines penetratingly, resplendent above the Upper Clarity.
Visualize him returning to a height of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, the Middle Perfected Supreme Elder Lord transforms his form
into an old man, donning a yellow kerchief, clad in a yellow brocade robe,
holding a golden staff, standing upon a lotus flower.
His radiance illuminates the ten directions. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the third month of winter, the Middle Perfected Supreme Elder Lord transforms his form
into the light of three suns, its radiance shining brightly,
illuminating the ten heavens. The three *qi* merge like the yolk of an egg.
Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the third month of spring, the Middle Perfected Supreme Elder Lord transforms his form
into a radiance of purple, azure, and white hues, its brilliance shining brightly,
illuminating the Nine Heavens. This is the reversion to the *qi* of the Nameless Middle Perfected,
further receiving the refined essence of the Primordial Mysterious Brilliance.
Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Middle Perfected Supreme Elder Lord,
always on the day of the Beginning of Spring, the Life Mandate, or the Great Year,
bathe and enter the chamber. Facing west, perform three bows and pay homage to the Elder Lord.
Then turn north, sit upright, and knock the teeth nine times.
Visualize the Supreme Elder Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons,
residing in the Upper Clarity’s Flying Mystery Palace, Purple Youth Prefecture, Golden Radiance Precinct, Azure Origin Quarter.
His true radiance descends to illuminate and enter the adept’s Great Granary at the mouth of the five viscera.
