chunks.original_text: 冬三月，九老仙皇君则变形为人头龙身，五色斑烂，在紫虚之上碧云之中，思之还反真形。 春三月，九老仙皇君则变形为碧苍玄三色之光，更相累沓在上清之上，此则反扶桑青浩之炁，更受炼元源谷之精，思之还反真形。 修行九炁仙皇君之道，当以春分之日，及本命、四月八日，入室东北向三拜，朝仙皇君毕，还北向叩齿二十四通，思仙皇君随四时形像，在上清清元宫旸谷府溟涬乡扶桑里中，回真下映，入兆本命之根胞胎大结中，便咒曰： 太帝变景，扶晨理元，四气练易，百变千分，入兆胞胎，斩断死根，太一守户，玉真护门，拔度三界，体宝金仙，神律发溢，合羽扬轮，书札玉位，世保福原，祸死绝沉，更生仙魂，七玄同飞，升化帝门。 毕，仰咽二气止。 此太帝玄秘之文，藏於玉房，万劫一行，得者长存，修之致仙，轻泄祸伐，没命河源。 小有玉真万华先生主图玉君，元纳真之炁，形长三千万丈。 秋三月，头建远游宝冠，衣飞仙羽衣，带宝真洞章，手执华幡，在青云之中五色师子之上，光明奕奕，照明上清，思之还长三寸三分。 冬三月，主图玉君则变形为人身鸟口，口衔玉符，身衣羽衣，手执三炁之华，光明落落，照明上清，思之还反真形。 春三月，主图玉君则变形为人身，两手为凤翅，通身衣黄羽之衣，足立七星，在紫虚之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，主图玉君则变形为青黄二色之光，如云之沓，在上清之上，此则反小有玉真之炁，更受炼元纳真之精，思之还反真形。 修行主图玉真君之道，当以立秋及本命之日，入室西北向一拜，朝玉真君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，思玉真君随四时形像，在上清金云宫通炁府招摇乡玉真里中，回真下映，入兆鼻下人中，便咒曰： 小有结真，合精练神，大回变化，六混七分，帝一理命，无英保魂，七华生朽，沉景起烟，奉籍帝尊，庆拔七玄，形合日月，三光相连，乘羽驾游，升入高晨。 毕，仰咽三气止。 此小有天中金格玉文，得者寿同天地，修行上为真人。 妄传轻露，罪及七玄，身死负考，万劫不原。 玄州二十九真伯上帝司禁君，元仙演之气，形长五千万丈。 冬三月，头建三玄通天宝冠，衣九色虎衣，班文之裘，飞青羽，腰带虎书，佩流金火铃，在紫虚之上太清之中，光明焕焕，思之还长五寸五分。 春三月，上帝司禁君则变形为人身兽头，状麒麟，或通身麟形，青黄文彩斑斓，立三色云炁之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，上帝司禁君则变形为童子，头戴飞龙，身衣紫黄羽，乘凤皇在清虚之中，或游宴五岳，手执青无之录，思之还反真形。 秋三月，上帝司禁君则变形为百变之光，混沌乱色更相缠绕，在上清之中，此则反玄州二十九真之炁，更受炼元仙演之精，思之还反真形。 修行上帝司禁君之道，当以立夏之日，及秋分、甲子日，入室东向九拜，朝司禁君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，思司禁君随四时形像，在上清司空宫仙都府玄阴乡总正里中，回真下映，入兆阴茎之端，便咒曰： 玄真辅仙，上帝监籍，神王练炁，五云敷席，符命四司，检简精魄，太一授录，保兆仙格，还童观容，停年止白，身飞玄都，与天同宅，五帝携提，长享玄伯。 毕，仰咽九气止。
chunks.translated_text:
In the three months of winter, the Nine Elder Immortal Sovereigns transform into beings with human heads and dragon bodies, their forms resplendent in five dazzling colors. They dwell amidst the purple void above the azure clouds. Envision them reverting to their true form.

In the three months of spring, the Nine Elder Immortal Sovereigns transform into a tri-colored radiance of azure, dark, and mystic hues, layering and intertwining above the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion of the qi of the Azure Vastness of Fusang, where they further refine the essence of the Primordial Source Valley. Envision them reverting to their true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Nine Qi Immortal Sovereigns, one should, on the day of the Spring Equinox, as well as on one’s own life-destiny day and the eighth day of the fourth month, enter the chamber, face the northeast, and bow three times. After paying homage to the Immortal Sovereigns, turn north, click the teeth twenty-four times, and envision the Immortal Sovereigns assuming their seasonal forms within the Upper Clarity’s Pure Primordial Palace, the Court of the Sunlit Valley in the Mingjing Village of Fusang. Their reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the root of one’s life-destiny within the great knot of the womb. Then recite the incantation:

*"The Supreme Thearch transforms the luminous,
The Dawn Upholder governs the primordial,
The four qi refine and transmute,
A hundred changes, a thousand divisions,
Entering the womb of the destined,
Severing the roots of death.
The Great One guards the gate,
The Jade Perfected protects the portal.
Delivered from the Three Realms,
The body becomes a Golden Immortal of treasure.
Divine laws overflow,
Feathered wheels unite and ascend.
Inscribed upon the jade register,
The world preserves the source of fortune.
Calamitous death is extinguished,
Reborn as an immortal soul.
The Seven Mysteries soar together,
Ascending to transform at the Gate of the Thearch."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi twice, then cease.

This is the arcane and secret text of the Supreme Thearch, concealed within the Jade Chamber. Once in ten thousand kalpas it is practiced. Those who attain it endure forever; cultivating it leads to immortality. To recklessly divulge it invites misfortune and punishment, drowning one’s life in the River of Origins.

The Lord of the Jade Diagram of Xiaoyou, the Jade Perfected of Ten Thousand Flowers, embodies the qi of the Primordial Receptive True, his form extending thirty million *zhang*. In the three months of autumn, he wears the Far-Wandering Treasure Crown upon his head, robes of flying immortal feathers, and the Precious True Cavern Sash. In hand, he holds a flowered banner, standing amidst azure clouds upon a five-colored lion. His radiance shines brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Envision him reverting to a length of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the three months of winter, the Lord of the Jade Diagram transforms into a being with a human body and a bird’s beak, the beak holding a jade talisman. His body is clad in feathered robes, and in hand, he holds the three-qi flower. His radiance glows resplendently, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Lord of the Jade Diagram transforms into a human form, his two hands becoming phoenix wings. His entire body is clad in robes of yellow feathers, his feet standing upon the Seven Stars, above the purple void. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Lord of the Jade Diagram transforms into a dual radiance of azure and yellow, layered like clouds above the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion of the qi of the Jade Perfected of Xiaoyou, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Receptive True. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Lord of the Jade Diagram, the Jade Perfected, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, as well as on one’s own life-destiny day, enter the chamber, face the northwest, and bow once. After paying homage to the Jade Perfected, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and envision the Jade Perfected assuming his seasonal forms within the Upper Clarity’s Golden Cloud Palace, the Qi-Uniting Court in the Zhaoyao Village of the Jade Perfected. His reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the philtrum beneath one’s nose. Then recite the incantation:

*"The Lesser Existence knots the true,
Conjoining essence and refining spirit.
The great reversion transforms,
Six harmonies, seven divisions.
The Thearch of Unity governs life,
The Peerless guards the soul.
Seven flowers bloom from decay,
Sinking light rises as mist.
Offering the register to the August Honored,
Celebrating the deliverance of the Seven Mysteries.
The form unites with sun and moon,
The Three Luminaries link as one.
Riding feathered chariots and roaming,
Ascending into the lofty dawn."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi three times, then cease.

This is the Golden Standard and Jade Text of the Central Heaven of Xiaoyou. Those who attain it enjoy a lifespan equal to heaven and earth; through cultivation, they ascend to become Perfected Ones. To recklessly transmit or reveal it brings guilt upon the Seven Mysteries, the body dies under punishment, and for ten thousand kalpas, there is no redemption.

The August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions of the Twenty-Nine Perfected Lords of the Mystic Continent embodies the qi of the Primordial Immortal Evolution, his form extending fifty million *zhang*. In the three months of winter, he wears the Three Mysteries Penetrating Heaven Treasure Crown upon his head, robes of nine-colored tiger patterns, a variegated fur cloak, and flying azure feathered garments. His waist is girded with the Tiger Script, and he bears the Flowing Gold Fire Bells. He dwells above the purple void amidst the Great Clarity. His radiance shines brilliantly. Envision him reverting to a length of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions transforms into a being with a human body and an animal head, resembling a qilin, or entirely in qilin form, his body adorned with azure and yellow patterns in dazzling array. He stands amidst the three-colored cloud qi. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions transforms into a youth, his head crowned with a flying dragon, his body clad in purple and yellow feathered garments. He rides a phoenix amidst the Clear Void or roams and feasts upon the Five Peaks, holding the Green Non-Existent Record in hand. Envision him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions transforms into a radiance of a hundred changes, chaotic and variegated hues intertwining above the Upper Clarity. This is the reversion of the qi of the Twenty-Nine Perfected of the Mystic Continent, where he further refines the essence of the Primordial Immortal Evolution. Envision him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the August Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions, one should, on the day of the Beginning of Summer, as well as on the Autumn Equinox and the *jiazi* day, enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Thearch Who Governs Prohibitions, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and envision the Thearch assuming his seasonal forms within the Upper Clarity’s Controller of Emptiness Palace, the Court of the Immortal Capital in the Dark Yin Village of the General Rectification Hamlet. His reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the tip of one’s yin organ. Then recite the incantation:

*"The Mystic Perfected assists the immortals,
The August Thearch oversees the register.
Divine kings refine qi,
Five clouds spread as a mat.
Talismanic commands govern the Four Controllers,
Examining and ordering the essence and soul.
The Great One bestows the record,
Preserving the immortal rank of the destined.
Returning to youth, beholding the countenance,
Halting the years, stopping the white.
The body flies to the Mystic Capital,
Dwelling with heaven as one.
The Five Thearchs carry and lift,
Forever enjoying the rank of the Mystic Elder."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi nine times, then cease.

chunks.original_text: 此玄洲练仙秘道，藏之大有之房，万年一出，得者仙伯书名，长生无极，修之飞行，上升仙庭。 轻泄者身死，谢罪鬼官。 太无晨中君，元玉户之炁，形长七千万丈。 冬三月，头建金华七宝冠，衣朱文羽衣，九色之绶，腰带金章，手执虎符，〔立〕紫云之上太清之中，光明焕焕，照映十方，思之还长七寸七分。 春三月，太无晨中君则变形为童子，坐生莲花之中，手执五色华幡，在上清紫云之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，太无晨中君则变形为三人，悉建远游冠，衣飞青羽，腰带素绶，手执杀魔之律，或乘飞凤，在上清之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，太无晨中君则变形为白青黄三色之光，更相缠绕在上清之上，此则反太元之炁，更相受炼元玉户之精，思之还反真形。 修行晨中君之道，当以立秋、秋分、庚申之日，入室西北向三拜，朝晨中君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，思晨中君随四时形像，在上清玄洞宫六生府开仙乡玉户里中，回真下映，入兆丹田宫本命帝室，便咒曰： 仙灵散晖，浩晨四布，混合九玄，三五流注，结真成仙，仙练升度，元父解形，玄母养护，五神辅翼，飞升霄路，三元保录，帝真饴哺，呼吸自然，五华坚固，长享无穷，天地同祚。 毕，仰咽三炁止。 此太素上道，得者延年亿万，修之成真人，九天书名。 不得轻宣，露泄灵音，身死失仙。 龟山九灵真仙母，元混西金之炁，形长七千万丈。 春三月，头建宝琅扶晨羽冠，服紫炁浮云，身披九色龙锦羽裙，腰带流金火铃虎符龙书，坐太空之中丹绿青三色云之上，光照焕曜，洞映紫清，思之还长七寸七分。 夏三月，仙母则变形为九色之凤，一体九头，文彩焕烂，光明奕奕，洞照太虚，思之还反真形。 秋三月，仙母则变形为人形凤头，衣九色飞云锦，腰带交灵紫绶，立九色之云，光明焕焕，洞明上清，思之还反真形。 冬三月，仙母则变形为紫青黄三色之光，更相累沓，沌沌混混，光明洞发，此则反九灵之炁，更受炼元混西金之精，思之还反真形。 修行仙母之道，当以九月九日，及秋分之日，入室西向九拜，朝仙母毕，还北向叩齿九通，思仙母随四时形像，在上清宝素宫九玄府玉皇乡西龙里中，回真下降，入兆明堂中，便咒曰： 灵化通玄，飞景九元，凝精结神，上为金仙，混合成一，散形亿分，上造太晨，策空蹑云，保命黄箓，长灵劫年，金简素籍，名刊帝轩，永享太华，与天同存。 毕，仰咽九炁止。 此九灵上道，秘於九天之上大有之房，万劫一传，得者不死，修之飞仙。 东方上始少阳青帝君，元九霞之炁，形长九千万丈。 春三月，头建九元通天冠，衣青锦飞裙，佩太上九炁命魔之章，带翠羽交灵之绶，常立碧云之上，思之还长九寸九分。 夏三月，青帝君则变形一身九头，通身衣朱衣，腰带素绶，足立苍龙之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，青帝君则变形人身龙头，通身青免，立碧云之上，手执阳霞之符，思之还反真形。 冬三月，青帝君则变形为黑光，光色奕奕，照明北方，此则反上始之气，更受练元九霞之精，思之还反真形。 修行东方青帝君之道，常以立春、春分之日，入室东向九拜，朝青帝君毕，还北向叩齿九通，思青帝君随四时形像，在上清常阳宫九生府东蒙乡青谷里中，回真下降，入兆肝府之中，便咒曰：
chunks.translated_text:
This secret Dao of refining immortality on the Mystic Continent is concealed within the Chamber of Great Possession, revealed but once in ten thousand years. Those who obtain it have their names inscribed by the Immortal Elders, attaining boundless longevity. Through cultivation, one soars in flight, ascending to the Immortal Courts. Those who lightly disclose it shall perish, their offenses handed to the ghostly officials.

The Lord of the Supreme Void at Dawn, born of the qi of the Primordial Jade Portal, assumes a form seventy million *zhang* in length. In the three months of winter, he wears a seven-jeweled crown of golden radiance, robes of vermilion script and feathered patterns, a nine-colored sash, a belt with a golden seal, and holds a tiger tally. He stands upon purple clouds within the Great Clarity, his luminous brilliance illuminating the ten directions. Visualize him returning to a length of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Lord of the Supreme Void at Dawn transforms into a youth seated within a blooming lotus, holding a five-colored floral banner. He resides above the purple clouds of the Highest Clarity. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Lord of the Supreme Void at Dawn transforms into three figures, each wearing a far-traveling crown and robes of flying azure feathers, with white sashes at their waists. They wield the statutes for slaying demons, sometimes riding flying phoenixes above the Highest Clarity. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Lord of the Supreme Void at Dawn transforms into intertwining lights of white, azure, and yellow above the Highest Clarity. This is the reversion to the qi of the Supreme Origin, mutually refining the essence of the Primordial Jade Portal. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Lord of the Supreme Void at Dawn, on the days of the Beginning of Autumn, the Autumn Equinox, or *gengshen*, enter the chamber, face the northwest, and bow three times. After paying homage to the Lord of the Dawn, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Lord of the Dawn in his seasonal forms, residing in the Jade Portal Hamlet of the Open Immortal Village within the Sixfold Life Mansion of the Mystic Cavern Palace of the Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends and illuminates, entering the Palace of the Cinnabar Field within one’s original destiny chamber. Then recite the incantation:

*"The immortal spirits scatter their radiance,
The vast dawn spreads in the four directions.
Merging with the Nine Mysteries,
The Three and Five flow and infuse.
Congealing the true to become immortal,
Refining the immortal to ascend and transcend.
The Primordial Father releases the form,
The Mystic Mother nurtures and protects.
The Five Spirits assist as wings,
Soaring upon the paths of the clouds.
The Three Origins safeguard the record,
The Imperial Perfected nourish and sustain.
Breathing naturally,
The Five Radiances solidify.
Endlessly enjoying boundless existence,
Sharing the same lifespan as heaven and earth."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi three times, then cease. This is the supreme Dao of the Great Simplicity. Those who obtain it extend their years by millions, and through cultivation, become Perfected Ones, their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens. It must not be lightly disclosed; revealing its sacred sounds brings death and the loss of immortality.

The Ninefold Numinous True Immortal Mother of Tortoise Mountain, born of the qi of the Primordial Chaos and Western Metal, assumes a form seventy million *zhang* in length. In the three months of spring, she wears a feathered crown of precious coral and dawn’s support, robes of purple qi and floating clouds, and a nine-colored dragon-brocade feathered skirt. Her waist is girded with a belt of flowing gold, fire bells, tiger tallies, and dragon scripts. She sits within the Great Void upon clouds of cinnabar, green, and azure, her radiant brilliance illuminating the Purple Clarity. Visualize her returning to a length of seven *cun* and seven *fen*.

In the three months of summer, the Immortal Mother transforms into a nine-colored phoenix with one body and nine heads, its patterns resplendent and luminous, its light pervading the Great Void. Visualize her reverting to her true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Immortal Mother transforms into a human form with a phoenix head, wearing nine-colored flying cloud brocade robes and a belt of intertwined numinous purple sashes. She stands upon nine-colored clouds, her luminous brilliance illuminating the Highest Clarity. Visualize her reverting to her true form.

In the three months of winter, the Immortal Mother transforms into intertwining lights of purple, azure, and yellow, chaotic and indistinct, their brilliance pervading all. This is the reversion to the qi of the Nine Numinous, mutually refining the essence of the Primordial Chaos and Western Metal. Visualize her reverting to her true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Immortal Mother, on the ninth day of the ninth month or the Autumn Equinox, enter the chamber, face west, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Immortal Mother, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Immortal Mother in her seasonal forms, residing in the Western Dragon Hamlet of the Jade Emperor Village within the Ninefold Mystery Mansion of the Precious Simplicity Palace of the Highest Clarity. Her reverted true essence descends, entering one’s Hall of Light. Then recite the incantation:

*"Numinous transformation pervades the mysterious,
Flying radiance of the Nine Origins.
Congealing essence and coalescing spirit,
Ascending as a Golden Immortal.
Merging to become one,
Dispersing the form into myriad parts.
Ascending to the Great Dawn,
Treading the void and mounting the clouds.
Preserving life in the Yellow Register,
Enduring through kalpas of years.
Inscribed on golden tablets and plain records,
Names recorded in the imperial archives.
Forever enjoying the Great Flower,
Abiding with heaven in perpetuity."*

Upon completion, tilt the head back and swallow the qi nine times, then cease. This is the supreme Dao of the Nine Numinous, concealed within the Chamber of Great Possession above the Nine Heavens, transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. Those who obtain it shall not die, and through cultivation, ascend as flying immortals.

The Lord of the Lesser Yang of the Eastern Origin, the Azure Thearch, born of the qi of the Nine Radiances, assumes a form ninety million *zhang* in length. In the three months of spring, he wears a Nine Origins Heaven-Penetrating Crown, robes of azure brocade and flying skirts, and bears the seal of the Supreme Nine Qi for commanding demons. His waist is girded with a sash of intertwined numinous azure feathers. He constantly stands upon azure clouds. Visualize him returning to a length of nine *cun* and nine *fen*.

In the three months of summer, the Azure Thearch transforms into a single body with nine heads, clad entirely in vermilion robes with a white sash at the waist. His feet stand upon a verdant dragon. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Azure Thearch transforms into a human body with a dragon head, clad entirely in azure, standing upon azure clouds and holding the talisman of the Yang Radiance. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Azure Thearch transforms into black light, its color resplendent, illuminating the northern direction. This is the reversion to the qi of the Eastern Origin, mutually refining the essence of the Nine Radiances. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Azure Thearch of the East, on the days of the Beginning of Spring or the Spring Equinox, enter the chamber, face east, and bow nine times. After paying homage to the Azure Thearch, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Azure Thearch in his seasonal forms, residing in the Azure Valley Hamlet of the Eastern Meng Village within the Ninefold Life Mansion of the Eternal Yang Palace of the Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends, entering one’s Liver Mansion. Then recite the incantation:

Talismanic commands govern the Four Controllers,
Examining and ordering the essence and soul.
The Great One bestows the record,

chunks.original_text: 上阳回元，元变入仙，练青受化，合成我神，神真入玄，欻化万分，千乘万骑，辅翼我身，苍龙碧霞，锦帔飞裙，运形上升，朝谒帝晨，列简东华，灭迹河源，长居仙籍，与日同轩。 毕，仰咽九炁止。 南方通阳纳阴赤帝君，元入丹之炁，形长八千万丈。 夏三月，头建三炁玄梁宝冠，衣绯云锦袍，丹文之裙，佩南极制阳之符，带朱宫入光之剑，常立赤霞之上，思之还长八寸八分。 秋三月，赤帝君则变形为朱鸟，口衔赤绶，足立赤云之上，光明焕赫，洞照太虚，思之还反真形。 冬三月，赤帝君则变形为人头鸟躯，头戴日精，口衔火铃，在紫云之中，思之还反真形。 春三月，赤帝君则变形为青光，光色郁郁，照明东方，此则反通阳之炁、更受练元八丹之精，思之还反真形。 修行赤帝君之道，常以立夏、夏至之日，入室南向八拜，朝赤君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，思赤帝君随四时形像，在上清洞阳宫朱陵府南极乡八炎里中，回真下降，入兆心府之中，便咒曰： 三炁回灵，八帝九清，飞天洞微，丹阳映明，混合中真，练变自生，四度改化，反我真形，随炁运行，与天合灵，飞空乘虚，上入帝庭，长享元吉，南极齐并。 〔毕〕，仰咽八炁止。 西方少阴西金白帝君，元六素之炁，形长六千万丈。 秋三月，头建七炁明光宝冠，衣白锦云光之袍，素锦飞裙，佩素云之绶，〔带〕龙渊漫延之剑，常立素霞之上，思之还长六寸六分。 冬三月，白帝君则变形人头虎身，日光奕奕，照明太空，思之还反真形。 春三月，白帝君则变形虎头人身，头戴月精，口衔素绶，身衣虎文，足立师子之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，白帝君则变形为黄光，光色洞彻，照明中央，此则反少阴之炁，更受练元六素之精，思之还反真形。 修行白帝君之道，常以立秋、秋分之日，入室西向六拜，朝白帝君毕，还北向叩齿三通，思白帝君随四时形像，在上清金门宫通光府素水乡金元里中，回真下降，入兆肺府之中，便咒曰： 日月回度，三合七成，西金混魄，治练化形，虎变九道，七炁飞精，帝君开真，万物化成，玄虚与化，炁入幽冥，道合元契，升造玉庭，与天同符，与帝同灵，长存吉祚，亿亿不倾。 毕，仰咽六炁止。 北方通阴太阳黑帝君，元五灵之炁，形长五千万丈。 冬三月，头建五炁玄晨之冠，衣玄锦之袍，五色飞裙，佩七元流铃，带文身通神之剑，常立玄云之上，思之还长五寸五分。 春三月，黑帝君则变形为人头蛇身，五色斑烂，口衔金符，头带七星，光明焕曜，洞映上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，黑帝君则变形一身五头，头戴五星，身衣玄羽之衣，足蹑玄龟，手执火铃，思之还反真形。 秋三月，黑帝君则变形为白光，光色奕奕，照明西方，此则反通阴太阳之炁，更受炼元五灵之精，思之还反真形。 修行黑帝君之道，常以立冬、冬节之日，入室北向五拜，朝黑帝君毕，叩齿十二通，思黑帝君随四时形像，在上清广灵宫北黄府玄阴乡五灵里中，回真下映，入兆肾府之中，便咒曰： 五行演真，阴阳合符，玄炁回运，四改交周，反形元虚，乘空入无，太一翼命，帝君受符，保仙紫相，录字丹书，五道并真，合我形躯，驾景策云，飞升玉都。
chunks.translated_text:
The Yang of the Upper Realm reverts to the Origin, the Origin transforms into immortality. Refining the azure, receiving transformation, it merges to complete my spirit. The spirit’s truth enters the Mystery, suddenly transforming into myriad forms. A thousand chariots and ten thousand riders assist and flank my body. Azure dragon and jade-green radiance, brocade mantle and flying skirt—conveying the form upward, ascending to pay court to the Imperial Dawn. Arrayed in the registers of the Eastern Florescence, erasing traces at the River’s source, dwelling long in the immortal ledgers, equal in splendor to the sun.

Conclude by raising the head, swallowing nine qi, and ceasing.

The Vermilion Thearch of the South, who penetrates Yang and receives Yin, embodies the primordial qi of cinnabar. His form measures eighty million *zhang*. In the three months of summer, he wears the Three Qi Mystic Beam Precious Crown, a scarlet cloud-brocade robe, a cinnabar-patterned skirt, bears the Southern Culmen’s Yang-Restraining Talisman, and girds the Crimson Palace’s Light-Entering Sword. He constantly stands atop crimson radiance; visualize him reverting to a height of eight *cun* and eight *fen*.

In the three months of autumn, the Vermilion Thearch transforms into a vermilion bird, holding a crimson sash in its beak, standing upon crimson clouds. Its radiance blazes brilliantly, illuminating the Great Void; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Vermilion Thearch transforms into a being with a human head and avian body, wearing the Essence of the Sun upon his head, holding a fire-bell in his beak, and dwelling amid purple clouds; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Vermilion Thearch transforms into azure light, its color lush and luxuriant, illuminating the eastern direction. This is the reversion to the qi of Penetrating Yang, mutually refining the essence of the Eight Cinnabars; visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Vermilion Thearch, on the days of the Beginning of Summer or the Summer Solstice, enter the chamber, face south, and bow eight times. After paying homage to the Vermilion Thearch, turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Vermilion Thearch in his seasonal forms, residing in the Vermilion Mound Prefecture’s Southern Culmen Hamlet of the Eight Flames within the Cavern Yang Palace of the Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends, entering one’s Heart Mansion. Then recite the incantation:

The Three Qi revert to the numinous, the Eight Thearchs and Nine Clarities. Flying heaven, penetrating the subtle, cinnabar Yang illumines brilliantly. Blending and merging the central truth, refining and transforming of itself, fourfold transmutations alter and change, reverting to my true form. Following the qi’s movement, uniting with heaven’s numen, flying through space, riding the void, ascending to the Imperial Court, long enjoying primordial auspiciousness, equal in rank to the Southern Culmen.

Conclude by raising the head, swallowing eight qi, and ceasing.

The White Thearch of the West, Lesser Yin and Western Metal, embodies the primordial qi of the Six Essences. His form measures sixty million *zhang*. In the three months of autumn, he wears the Seven Qi Bright Light Precious Crown, a white brocade cloud-light robe, a plain silk flying skirt, bears a plain cloud sash, and girds the Dragon Abyss’ Overflowing Sword. He constantly stands atop plain radiance; visualize him reverting to a height of six *cun* and six *fen*.

In the three months of winter, the White Thearch transforms into a being with a human head and tiger’s body, his solar radiance resplendent, illuminating the Great Empyrean; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the White Thearch transforms into a being with a tiger’s head and human body, wearing the Essence of the Moon upon his head, holding a plain sash in his mouth, clad in tiger-patterned robes, and standing upon a lion; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the White Thearch transforms into yellow light, its color penetrating and clear, illuminating the central direction. This is the reversion to the qi of Lesser Yin, mutually refining the essence of the Six Essences; visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the White Thearch, on the days of the Beginning of Autumn or the Autumn Equinox, enter the chamber, face west, and bow six times. After paying homage to the White Thearch, turn north, click the teeth three times, and visualize the White Thearch in his seasonal forms, residing in the Metal Origin Hamlet of the Plain Water Village within the Cavern Light Prefecture of the Golden Gate Palace of the Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends, entering one’s Lung Mansion. Then recite the incantation:

The revolutions of sun and moon, threefold union and sevenfold completion. Western Metal blends the po, governing and refining the transformation of form. The tiger transforms through the Nine Paths, the Seven Qi fly as essence. The Thearch opens the truth, the myriad things transform and complete. The Mystery and Void unite with transformation, qi enters the hidden depths. The Dao accords with the primordial contract, ascending to create the Jade Court. Equal in tally with heaven, equal in numen with the Thearch, long abiding in auspicious fortune, steadfast for billions upon billions without end.

Conclude by raising the head, swallowing six qi, and ceasing.

The Black Thearch of the North, who penetrates Yin and embodies Grand Yang, embodies the primordial qi of the Five Numinous. His form measures fifty million *zhang*. In the three months of winter, he wears the Five Qi Mystic Dawn Crown, a black brocade robe, a five-colored flying skirt, bears the Seven Origins Flowing Bells, and girds the Patterned-Body Spirit-Communing Sword. He constantly stands atop dark clouds; visualize him reverting to a height of five *cun* and five *fen*.

In the three months of spring, the Black Thearch transforms into a being with a human head and serpent’s body, its five colors resplendent and variegated, holding a golden talisman in its mouth, wearing the Seven Stars upon its head. Its radiance blazes brilliantly, penetrating and illuminating the Highest Clarity; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Black Thearch transforms into a being with one body and five heads, wearing the Five Stars upon its heads, clad in dark-feathered robes, treading upon a dark turtle, and holding fire-bells; visualize him reverting to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Black Thearch transforms into white light, its color resplendent, illuminating the western direction. This is the reversion to the qi of Penetrating Yin and Grand Yang, mutually refining the essence of the Five Numinous; visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Black Thearch, on the days of the Beginning of Winter or the Winter Solstice, enter the chamber, face north, and bow five times. After paying homage to the Black Thearch, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Black Thearch in his seasonal forms, residing in the Five Numinous Hamlet of the Dark Yin Village within the Northern Yellow Prefecture of the Vast Numinous Palace of the Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends and illumines, entering one’s Kidney Mansion. Then recite the incantation:

The Five Phases unfold the truth, Yin and Yang unite in tally. The dark qi revolves and moves, fourfold changes intermingle and cycle. Reverting the form to the primordial void, riding space to enter non-being. The Grand Unity assists destiny, the Thearch receives the talisman. Preserving the purple semblance of immortality, recording the name in cinnabar script. The Five Paths unite in truth, merging with my bodily form. Driving the light, spurring the clouds, flying upward to the Jade Capital.

chunks.original_text: 毕，仰咽五炁止。 中央总灵高皇黄帝君，元黄生之炁，形长三千万丈。 以〔四〕季〔之〕月，头建黄晨通天玉冠，衣黄锦之袍，玄黄飞云锦裙，佩黄神越元之策，带灵飞紫绶，常立五色师子黄云之上，思之还长三寸三分。 秋三月，白炁玉黄帝君则变形，分为四童子，衣青白赤黑四色锦裳，飞云锦帔，各头戴日精之华，手执五色之幡，立素云之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，黑炁玉黄帝君则变形一身四头朱鸟，毛色斑烂，照明北方，思之还反真形。 春三月，青炁玉黄帝君则变形为皇上老人，通身黄色，头戴圆光如之相轮，手执金铃，足立青云之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，赤炁玉黄帝君则变形为赤光，光色憧憧，照明南方，此则反高皇之炁，更受练元黄生之精，思之还反真形。 修行黄帝君之道，常以太岁、甲子之日，入室向太岁十二拜，朝黄帝君毕，还北向叩齿十二通，思黄帝君随四时形像，在上清黄元宫高皇府中戊乡四圆里中，回真下降，入兆脾府之中，便咒曰： 四刚总真，灵化无方，道合成一，五行开张，随运变号，周圆四乡，是日上吉，乘阴御阳，六甲直符，太一下迎，结我录籍，书名上京，得朝三元，保仙神皇。 毕，仰咽十二炁止。 上清元始变化元录 高上玉皇帝，上圣君，九天玉真，皆禀炁自然，托形琼胎，隐秀紫元，灵和感会，得有人焉。 胤皇流之冑，生而成真，结空洞以为字，合三炁以为名，受号帝位，应化上清，总仙高虚，拊任玄玄，四时改易，推节变通，沐浴冠带，练饰长存，运化形影，应感而生，幽冥恍惚。 故道无常名，深不可测，微难可穷，天地规以得立，太玄协以致清，日月持之以朗耀，五行禀之以致灵，巍巍德宗，荡荡高尊，其道高妙，非可胜焉。 元始记箓，藏之太上六合宫中紫房之内，万劫一传，九天禁书，非鬼神所闻。 得见其篇目，将庆洒上叶，福流玄根，魂升南宫，七祖同欢，名书玉札，死生获仙。 后圣学上真之道，当练悉元始变化之形，随节改易，以通其真，以反其炁，以练其神。 假令元始皇上丈人，以立春之日纳元玉虚之炁，受皇上丈人之号，此皆真形，衣服正色。 竟春三月九十日中，居真临正，至立夏之日，皇上丈人则变其正形，更受节化，沐浴神真，谓变仙易景，通真纳灵，致炁长存。 周夏三月九十日中，仙魂沐浴，神真感通，至立秋之日，皇上丈人则随节化形，冠带五常，谓之仙化，炁通玄玄，内充外溢，光辉发明，变真养炁，致炁无穷。 周秋三月九十日中，冠带九天，仙化成真，至立冬之日，皇上丈人含真胎息，反炁自然，解脱身形，变景入光，还其元始，受练反精，育莹神真，光色混沌，如云之烟。 周冬三月九十日中，结炁凝神，还复正形，四度回周，周而复生。 此元始四改之化，随节易容。 天地之运，皆有盛衰，否泰休息，以应天关，盛则临正，休则育养，冠带练精，不失其常。 故天地长存无穷，此妙化之道，非可胜记。 学真之家，当各随其节，修行存思众真，皆如元始皇上丈人之法，八年之中，不失常节，克致真人下降，目睹神形，能随炁变化，飞升太空也。 凡修四变之道，当随节服四变之符。 假令春三月行道存思，当先服东明通真变景阳霞之符；

When finished, look upward and swallow the five qi to conclude.

The Central Supreme Numinous High August Yellow Thearch, whose primordial yellow qi gives birth to all, stands thirty million zhang in height. In the months of the four seasons, he wears a Yellow Morn Jade Crown that reaches to heaven, a robe of yellow brocade, a skirt of dark-yellow flying-cloud brocade, carries the Yellow Spirit Yueyuan Staff, and girds the Spirit-Flying Purple Sash. He constantly stands atop a five-colored lion amid yellow clouds. Visualize him as returning to a height of three cun and three fen.

In the three autumn months, the White Qi Jade Yellow Thearch transforms his form, dividing into four youths clad in brocade robes of blue, white, red, and black, with flying-cloud brocade capes. Each wears a solar essence blossom upon his head and holds a five-colored banner, standing upon white clouds. Visualize him as reverting to his true form.

In the three winter months, the Black Qi Jade Yellow Thearch transforms into a single body with four heads of vermilion birds, their feathers resplendent and dappled, illuminating the northern quarter. Visualize him as reverting to his true form.

In the three spring months, the Blue Qi Jade Yellow Thearch transforms into a Venerable Elder of the August Above, his entire body yellow, wearing a halo like a wheel of light, holding a golden bell, and standing upon blue clouds. Visualize him as reverting to his true form.

In the three summer months, the Red Qi Jade Yellow Thearch transforms into a crimson radiance, its luminous hue flickering and bright, illuminating the southern quarter. This is the reversion of the High August’s qi, whereupon he receives the refined primordial yellow essence of generation. Visualize him as reverting to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Yellow Thearch, on the day of the Great Year and the first day of the jiazi cycle, enter the chamber and bow twelve times toward the Great Year. When the audience with the Yellow Thearch is complete, turn north, knock the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Yellow Thearch in his seasonal forms, residing in the Fourfold Round Hamlet of the Wu Village within the High August Prefecture of the Yellow Prime Palace of Highest Clarity. His reverted true essence descends and illumines, entering one’s Spleen Mansion. Then recite the incantation:

The Four Rigidities unite in truth, numinous transformations know no bounds. The Dao merges into one, the Five Phases unfold. Following the revolutions, names change; encircling the four quarters. Today is most auspicious, riding Yin and steering Yang. The Six Jia talismans align, the Grand Unity descends to welcome. Bind my register, inscribe my name in the Upper Capital. Attaining audience with the Three Origins, preserving the divine and august immortal.

When finished, look upward and swallow the twelve qi to conclude.

---

The Highest Clarity Primordial Beginning’s Transmutations and Primordial Registers

The High August Jade Emperor, the Supreme Sage Lord, the Nine Heavens Jade Perfected—all receive qi naturally, entrust their forms to jade wombs, conceal their brilliance in the Purple Prime, and through numinous harmony and resonance, attain personhood. Descendants of the imperial lineage, born as perfected beings, they knit the hollow cavern to form their script and unite the Three Qi to compose their names. Receiving the title of Thearch, they respond and transform in Highest Clarity, governing the immortals of the High Void, presiding over the Mysterious Mysteries. With the four seasons’ changes, they adjust the nodes and adapt, bathing, donning crowns and sashes, refining and adorning to endure forever. Their transformations of form and shadow respond to resonance and arise, obscure and indistinct.

Thus the Dao has no constant name; its depths cannot be fathomed, its subtleties cannot be exhausted. Heaven and earth rely upon it to stand, the Grand Mystery harmonizes with it to attain clarity. Sun and moon hold to it to shine brightly; the Five Phases receive it to attain numinosity. Vast is its virtue’s origin, boundless its lofty honor. Its Dao is exalted and wondrous, beyond all comparison.

The Primordial Beginning’s recorded registers are concealed within the Purple Chamber of the Supreme Lord’s Sixfold Union Palace. Transmitted once in ten thousand kalpas, they are the Nine Heavens’ forbidden scriptures, not to be heard by ghosts or spirits.

Those who obtain and behold their chapter titles shall rejoice in the flourishing of their ancestral leaves, their blessings flowing to the mysterious root. Their souls ascend to the Southern Palace, their seven ancestors share in the joy. Their names inscribed on jade tablets, they attain immortality in life and death.

Later sages studying the Way of the Supreme Perfected should refine and master the forms of the Primordial Beginning’s transmutations, adapting with the seasonal nodes to communicate with the true, revert the qi, and refine the spirit.

For instance, the Primordial Beginning’s August Elder of the Above, on the day of the Beginning of Spring, receives the qi of the Primordial Jade Void and assumes the title of August Elder of the Above. These are all true forms, their garments of proper colors. Throughout the ninety days of the three spring months, he resides in truth and presides in rectitude. By the day of the Beginning of Summer, the August Elder of the Above transforms his proper form, receiving the seasonal transmutation. Bathing in the divine and perfected, this is called “transmuting the immortal and exchanging the radiance,” communicating with the true and receiving the numinous, causing the qi to endure forever.

In the ninety days of the three summer months, the immortal soul bathes, the divine and perfected resonate and communicate. By the day of the Beginning of Autumn, the August Elder of the Above transforms his form with the season, donning the Five Constants’ crown and sash, called “immortal transmutation.” The qi communicates with the Mysterious Mysteries, filling within and overflowing without. Radiance and brilliance manifest, transforming the true and nourishing the qi, causing the qi to be inexhaustible.

In the ninety days of the three autumn months, donning the Nine Heavens’ crown and sash, the immortal transmutation is perfected. By the day of the Beginning of Winter, the August Elder of the Above contains the true, embraces fetal breathing, reverts the qi to its natural state, liberates the bodily form, transforms the radiance to enter the light, and returns to his primordial beginning. Receiving refinement and reverting the essence, he nurtures and polishes the divine and true. His radiance and color blend into chaos, like misty clouds.

In the ninety days of the three winter months, he congeals the qi and concentrates the spirit, returning to his proper form. Four revolutions complete the cycle, and the cycle renews. These are the Primordial Beginning’s four seasonal transmutations, adapting appearances with the nodes.

The revolutions of heaven and earth all have flourishing and decline, closure and opening, rest and activity, responding to the Celestial Pass. When flourishing, they preside in rectitude; when resting, they nurture and cultivate. Donning crowns and sashes, refining the essence, they do not lose their constancy. Thus heaven and earth endure forever, and this is the wondrous Way of transmutation, beyond all recording.

Those who study the true should each follow their season, cultivating and visualizing the host of perfected beings, all according to the method of the Primordial Beginning’s August Elder of the Above. Within eight years, without losing the seasonal nodes, they shall surely cause the perfected to descend, behold the divine forms with their own eyes, and by following the qi’s transformations, ascend and fly into the Great Void.

In practicing the Way of the Four Transmutations, one should follow the season and ingest the Four Transmutations’ talismans.

For instance, in the three spring months, when practicing the Way and visualizing, one should first ingest the Talisman of Eastern Brightness Communicating with the True and Transmuting the Yang Radiance...

chunks.original_text: 洞虚金门之上，流津澳注冶练之庭，冶练则有还容之池，练仙芝英，金门则有青金丹台，上有龙山神楼，中有素灵之宫，楼有十二玉仙宫舍，西华真人左侍素灵玉女，右卫金华之童，常乘华山灵兽，策御白虎之王，以秋三月〔上〕导九天之炁，下引肺府中真，二炁应变而交会，变化生乎 西关。 故凝精以成符，结炁以成神，得咽其炁，则能立降神颜，餐其精能飞升金门，啸命五岳，坐召十方，兴云致龙，适意所从，其文高妙，难可称焉。 北玄郁真炼景萧风符 冬三月行道，思神招灵，当以黑书白纸上，北向服之，百日通灵，千日睹真，彻视幽微，与神交颜，役使太玄玉女五人，致五星上妃夫人灵真升中玄图神仙宝文。 又黑书绛缯上，安所坐卧席北面，以玄锦衣之百日，黑帝降席，黑帝神官侍卫神文，营护行符者身，五年则致玄云降覆兆身，升形太空，飞北辰之中也。 其文乃北方郁真玄玄萧风华晨之精，其炁乃阴阳始开之始晖，其晖混沌，乍合乍离，五色玄朗，洞映郁单，分流散漫五千五万五亿万重，其精玄玄而相附，似锦云之沓烟，合金花而不曜，殖五行而立玄，神变明乎 朔阴之野，流真澳於寒水之乡，朔阴则生练仙玉膏，寒水则有制魔之王，上有七晨华盖，中有广灵之堂，华盖荫於玄斗中真堂舍，皇上玉晨右侍太玄玉女，左侍玉晨之童，常乘常山神兽，策御飞龟紫轮，以冬三月上导九天之炁，下引肾府流泉，二炁交於神通，变化生乎 一旬。 故凝精以成文，结炁以成仙，得咽其炁，则致七晨降房，盻接灵颜，得食其精，则能回化阴阳，兴云召龙，飞升华堂，睹灵文之妙化，天地之原宗也。 黄上八维生景玉门符 四季之时行道招灵，当以赤书黄纸上，向季王服之，一百二十日通灵彻视，逆知吉凶，千日天真下降，与神交颜，役使黄素玉女十二人，致黄上八道交真玄录，飞仙凤衣九天灵章。 又黄书黑缯之上，安所坐卧席中央，以黄锦衣之一百日，黄老诣房，黄帝神官侍卫神文，营护行符者身，十二年致黄云降覆兆形，玉舆羽轮升兆飞行，上入太玄之宫也。 其文乃中央黄上坤母玉门生景通明之精，其炁乃天地纲维十二辰化之始晖，其晖映朗八方，其烟飙飙而四飞，光明晃晃而通虚，郁勃卫於太玄之都，维落十二亿万之重，华芒烂耀发乎 九玄，流精溢於四季之乡，上有玉京之府，中有华盖之宫，府有太上道主宫舍，玉晨之君左侍飞仙羽节青华玉女，右直领仙玉郎金灵神童，常乘九号灵兽，策御玄上黄龙，总五炁以辅辰，制命十二勾陈，上导九天之源流，下引脾府之黄神，二炁交於泥丸之上，炼化混合於三丹之房。 故凝精以变神，结炁以炼仙，得咽其炁，黄老降形，得餐其精，色发金刚，身生水火，项有圆光，变化万奇，飞升太空，此灵文之妙用，高化之难量也。 此五老秘文，藏於九天之上五灵玉都金华紫房，侍文五帝灵童、五帝玉华玉女各五十人，烧香散花，侍卫神文。 依九天旧格，万劫一传，皆授上仙以成真人。 凡有玄简帝图，录字三清，应为后圣之人者，得睹灵篇，修行变化，存念思神，服御玉文，不出九年，克致五老降房，天真交颜，洞彻幽虚，坐在立无，变化水火，白日升晨。 轻泄漏慢，殃逮七玄，己身亡命，长没河源。

Above the Cavernous Void’s Golden Gate, the flowing nectar pours into the Smelting Refinement Courtyard. Within this courtyard lies the Pool of Returning Countenance, where immortal lingzhi blossoms are refined. At the Golden Gate stands the Azure-Gold Elixir Terrace, upon which rises the Dragon Mountain’s divine tower. At its center lies the Palace of Primordial Numinosity, and within the tower are twelve Jade Immortal chambers. The Western Florescence Perfected One attends on the left, accompanied by the Primordial Numinosity Jade Maiden, while the Golden Florescence Youth guards on the right. They ever ride the numinous beasts of Mount Hua, driving the White Tiger King. In the third month of autumn, they ascend to guide the qi of the Nine Heavens and descend to draw forth the true essence within the Lung Palace. The two qi respond and transform in mutual convergence, giving rise to life at the Western Pass. Thus, congealing essence forms talismans, and binding qi forms spirits. One who swallows this qi shall instantly summon the divine countenance; one who consumes its essence shall ascend through the Golden Gate, command the Five Peaks, summon the Ten Directions, summon clouds and dragons, and follow their will. Its script is lofty and wondrous, beyond all praise.

The Northern Mystery’s Dark Refinement Radiant Whirlwind Talisman
In the third month of winter, perform the Dao and meditate upon the spirits to summon the numinous. Inscribe in black upon white paper, face north while ingesting it. After a hundred days, one shall attain spiritual communion; after a thousand days, one shall behold the true. Perceiving the subtle and unseen, one shall converse face-to-face with the divine, command the Five Supreme Mystery Jade Maidens, and summon the Five Stars’ High Consorts, the Lady Immortals, and the Numinous Perfected Ones to ascend the Central Mystery’s Chart of Divine Immortals and Treasured Script. Inscribe in black upon crimson silk and place it at the northern side of one’s seat or bed. After a hundred days clad in dark brocade, the Black Emperor shall descend to one’s mat, and the Black Emperor’s divine officials shall attend with protective talismanic script, shielding the practitioner’s body. After five years, the Dark Clouds shall descend to cover one’s form, ascending into the Great Void and flying to the center of the Northern Asterism.

Its script is the essence of the Northern Mystery’s Dark Profundity Whirlwind Florescence Dawn. Its qi is the primordial radiance of the inception of yin and yang, its brilliance chaotic, now merging, now parting. Five-colored and mysteriously luminous, it illumines the Dark Solitary Heavens, flowing and spreading in fifty-five thousand five hundred myriad layers. Its essence is profoundly obscure yet mutually conjoined, resembling layered brocade clouds, merging with golden blossoms yet without glare, engendering the Five Phases and establishing the Mystery. Its divine transformations are manifest in the Northern Darkness’s wilds, its true nectar flowing into the Frigid Waters’ realm. In the Northern Darkness grows the refined immortal jade cream; in the Frigid Waters resides the Demon-Quelling King. Above is the Seven Dawns’ Florid Canopy; at its center lies the Hall of Vast Numinosity. The Florid Canopy shades the Dark Dipper’s True Chamber, where the August Jade Dawn attends on the right with the Supreme Mystery Jade Maiden and on the left with the Jade Dawn Youth. They ever ride the numinous beasts of Mount Chang, driving the Flying Tortoise’s purple wheels. In the third month of winter, they ascend to guide the qi of the Nine Heavens and descend to draw forth the flowing springs of the Kidney Palace. The two qi converge in divine communion, giving rise to transformations within a ten-day cycle. Thus, congealing essence forms scripture, and binding qi refines immortality. One who swallows this qi shall summon the Seven Dawns to descend to their chamber, gazing upon the divine countenance. One who consumes its essence shall reverse the transformations of yin and yang, summon clouds and dragons, ascend the Florid Hall, and witness the wondrous transformations of the divine script—the primordial origin of Heaven and Earth.

The Yellow Center’s Eight Directions Life-Radiance Jade Gate Talisman
During the four seasons, perform the Dao and summon the numinous. Inscribe in red upon yellow paper, face the Seasonal King while ingesting it. After a hundred and twenty days, one shall attain spiritual communion and penetrating vision, foreknowing fortune and misfortune. After a thousand days, the Heavenly Perfected shall descend, and one shall converse face-to-face with the divine, command the Twelve Yellow Simplicity Jade Maidens, and summon the Yellow Center’s Eight Dao Intersecting True Mystery Record, the Flying Immortal’s Phoenix Robe, and the Nine Heavens’ Numinous Chapters. Inscribe in yellow upon black silk and place it at the center of one’s seat or bed. After a hundred days clad in yellow brocade, the Yellow Elder shall visit one’s chamber, and the Yellow Emperor’s divine officials shall attend with protective talismanic script, shielding the practitioner’s body. After twelve years, the Yellow Clouds shall descend to cover one’s form, and a jade chariot with feathered wheels shall ascend one to fly into the Supreme Mystery’s Palace.

Its script is the essence of the Central Yellow Center’s Earth Mother Jade Gate Life-Radiance Illuminating Clarity. Its qi is the primordial radiance of the Heaven and Earth’s warp and weft, the twelve celestial stems’ transformations. Its brilliance illumines the Eight Directions; its mists swirl and scatter in all four directions. Its light shines resplendently, penetrating the Void, flourishing and guarding the Supreme Mystery’s capital. Its layers number twelve hundred myriad myriad. Its splendorous radiance bursts forth in the Nine Mysteries; its flowing essence overflows into the Four Seasons’ realm. Above is the Jade Capital’s mansion; at its center lies the Florid Canopy’s palace. Within the mansion are the Supreme Dao Lord’s chambers, where the Jade Dawn Sovereign attends on the left with the Flying Immortal’s Feathered Staff Azure Florescence Jade Maiden and on the right with the Golden Numinosity Divine Youth, Leading Immortal. They ever ride the Nine-Titled Numinous Beasts, driving the Supreme Mystery’s Yellow Dragon. They govern the Five Qi to assist the celestial stems, commanding the Twelve Celestial Hooks. They ascend to guide the source and flow of the Nine Heavens and descend to draw forth the Yellow Spirit of the Spleen Palace. The two qi converge above the Muddy Pellet, refining and blending within the Three Elixir Chambers. Thus, congealing essence transforms the spirit, and binding qi refines immortality. One who swallows this qi shall summon the Yellow Elder to descend in form; one who consumes its essence shall emit a diamond hue, their body generating water and fire, their neck crowned with a halo of light. Myriad wonders shall transform, and one shall ascend into the Great Void—such is the wondrous efficacy of this numinous script, its lofty transformations beyond measure.

These Five Elders’ secret scriptures are concealed within the Nine Heavens’ Five Numinous Jade Capitals’ Golden Florescence Purple Chambers, attended by the Five Emperors’ Numinous Youths and the Five Emperors’ Jade Florescence Jade Maidens, fifty each, who burn incense, scatter flowers, and guard the divine script. According to the Nine Heavens’ ancient statutes, they are transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas, all bestowed upon the Perfected Immortals to become True Ones. Should any of the Mysterious Simplicity’s Imperial Charts, inscribed with the Three Clarities’ characters, be destined for later sages, they shall behold the numinous scrolls, cultivate and transform, meditate upon and invoke the spirits, and ingest the jade script. Within nine years, they shall summon the Five Elders to descend to their chamber, converse face-to-face with the Heavenly Perfected, penetrate the unseen and void, sit and stand without substance, transform water and fire, and ascend at dawn in broad daylight. To lightly divulge or profane these teachings shall bring calamity upon the Seven Mysteries, forfeit one’s own life, and consign one to eternal oblivion in the River Source.

chunks.original_text: 服符之时，当各随节向王叩齿十二通，微祝曰： 天轮地转，四时交真，五行导炼，结成玉仙，上元凝精，中元变神，下元育养，远形反真，三元混合，我禀自然，灵符充镇，王炁如烟，内明外鲜，赤子宁安，降致飞霞，升入帝轩。 毕，咽炁五过止。 传授大箓之法，依四极明科，七百年内听三传，百年内有其人，听再传。 师弟子对斋百日，或七十日，弟子赉上金九两，丹地绛锦四十七尺，青布二十二尺，金龙、玉鱼各一枚，登盟北向，告九天而传，弟子披心向天而承受。 师不依年限而授，则身受风刀之考。 弟子无信而求真，谓轻天宝，财身没河源，终不得仙。 天科告慎，明详奉行。 上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓卷中竟 #1此卷原《道藏》本作卷下。 据其内容文字，应移作卷中，而以原本卷中为卷下。 #2『诽』原作『非』。 #3『思』原作『也』。 上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓卷下#1 上清九天玄都八圣，游於空虚，灵足超於玉堂，景浮紫澄太玄，玉帝戏参九凤龙车玉舆，乘五色飞云，从十二龙驾，仙官玉女各二十四人，又八鸾白鹄，九凤飞呜云阵，九色之节，十绝华幡，三天宝盖，九天乘骑飞游太空，径造五岳名山。 遇与五岳真君，俱说欲诣龟山洞室八景穴中，与太上玉帝真人，於洞室金堂，以绿环誓天，得写洞文，刻名天书。 玉字刻以金简之上，以誓玄言。 上清太霄琅书，日月飞华，结璘郁仪服芝玄，九母五帝真君夫人，悉来降之。 便一日一夕，於龟山之台，天地日月十方大圣真官，同来造此，而敷金床碧席，会诸天大圣。 复戏陈云韶百伎，赞叹虚空自然，百音相和，长歌誓曲，唱入九霄，上答天王玉京帝君。 灵章一通，便得神仙龟山吏兵千乘万骑，真人功曹，飞行将军，直符吏，玉童神女，使者诸官九亿万众，得九天真符天书玉字，十二凤玄歌之曲，分为上下二卷，藏以金台之上，九天紫室之中，锦蕴金函，钥以银关玉房，以命紫微夫人出以授之。 当开此之日，清风披林，三素之云十方耀明，神光玄映金台之室。 於是紫微夫人跪而受焉，九天真魔上王而欢跃作礼焉。 太清玄老九天正文，自然虚无洞真玉帝君，於玄霞翠羽玉京华山洞室之中敷说正文。 尔时有四千万亿金童，九千万亿玉女，侍卫左右。 其洞室并黄金荐地，白银为床，天尊来下，黄玄云锦为席，诸仙神王祈请，长跪启问九天玄帝：伏闻太上诸圣太帝，玄歌玉章，耀景丹华，翠凤翱翔，骑龙驾乘，遐造京华上帝，同唱九韶太和灵章，洞玄刻石真文，以喻龟山上元太妙之录，以和九天洞房诸仙，玉虚真王命魔灵幡，校三十二天典日月之籍，云行雨施，天下润泽，百华同萌，碧树琼枝，绿华丹葩，香园果林，七宝三景。 上圣天尊，上清玉童，真华玉女，那林琼室，敷化众生。 群臣帝王国主，四天玉郎韩司主韩，十方众官仙主，人景百罗魔王，腾飞虚空，覆化众生。 覆天盖地飞琼云车，千二百玄龙之舆，雷电霹雳，光耀十方，来降我室，拜跪赞唱。 诸天香华，百籁同呜，琳琅瓓玕，自然钟磬，诸天仗乐，七宝三光，百和之音，以相娱乐，以为欢焉。 召九天魔鬼邪精天帝，俱侍座侧。 飞云羽盖，十二缯幡麾节幢鼓，罗列帝前，诸天和唱，同赞诵焉。

When ingesting the talisman, one must face the sovereign of the season and strike the teeth twelve times, then softly intone the prayer:

*"The heavenly wheel turns, the earth revolves,
Four seasons merge with the True,
Five phases guide and refine,
Congealing into Jade Immortals.
The Upper Origin congeals essence,
The Middle Origin transforms spirit,
The Lower Origin nurtures and nourishes,
Distant form returns to the True.
The Three Origins blend as one,
I receive the natural endowment.
The numinous talisman fills and guards,
The sovereign qi billows like mist.
Within bright, without resplendent,
The infant rests in peace,
Descending flying auroras,
Ascending into the imperial terrace."*

Upon completion, swallow the qi five times and cease.

The method for transmitting the Great Register follows the *Bright Statutes of the Four Poles*: within seven hundred years, three transmissions are permitted; within a hundred years, if a worthy recipient appears, a second transmission is allowed. Master and disciple must face each other in purification for a hundred days, or seventy days. The disciple presents nine taels of refined gold, forty-seven feet of crimson brocade from the cinnabar earth, twenty-two feet of blue cloth, one golden dragon, and one jade fish. Facing north at the altar, they invoke the Nine Heavens to transmit the scripture, while the disciple bares his heart to heaven to receive it. Should the master transmit without regard to the time limit, he shall suffer the trial of the wind-blade. Should the disciple seek the True without sincerity, thus belittling the celestial treasure, his wealth and body shall sink into the River Source, and he shall never attain immortality. The celestial statutes warn to be prudent—clearly and carefully observe these precepts.

---

The Nine Perfected of the Eightfold Mystery of the Mystic Capital of the Nine Heavens roamed the void, their numinous feet transcending the Jade Hall. Their radiance floated upon the Purple Clarity of the Great Mystery, as the Jade Emperor sported amidst the Nine Phoenixes’ dragon chariot and jade carriage, riding five-colored flying clouds, followed by twelve dragon-drawn chariots. Twenty-four celestial officials and jade maidens accompanied them, along with eight simurghs and white cranes, nine phoenixes soaring and singing in cloud formations, nine-colored standards, ten tasseled banners, three celestial treasure canopies, and nine heavenly mounts flying through the vast sky, arriving directly at the Five Marchmounts and renowned mountains. There, they met with the True Lords of the Five Marchmounts and together declared their intent to visit the Eightfold Radiance Grotto within the cavern-chamber of Tortoise Mountain, where they would meet with the Perfected of the Jade Emperor of the Most High in the golden hall of the grotto. With jade rings, they swore oaths to heaven, obtaining the right to transcribe the grotto scriptures and inscribe their names in the celestial records. The jade characters were engraved upon golden tablets, pledging the mysterious words.

The *Luminous Writ of the Great Empyrean*, the flying splendor of sun and moon, the radiant ornaments of the sun’s chariot, and the dark mushrooms of the mysterious—all were consumed by the Nine Mothers and the True Lord Consorts of the Five Emperors, who descended together. In a single day and night upon the terrace of Tortoise Mountain, the great sages and true officials of the ten directions, heaven and earth, sun and moon gathered, spreading golden couches and azure mats to convene the assembly of celestial sages. Again, they performed the hundred arts of cloud music, praising the natural emptiness of the void, harmonizing a hundred tones. Their long chants and oath-songs soared into the Nine Empyreans, ascending in response to the Heavenly King and the Lord Emperor of Jade Capital.

Upon the completion of one cycle of the numinous hymn, the immortal officials, soldiers, and cavalry of Tortoise Mountain—numbering a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders—along with the Perfected, the Merit Officers, the Flying Generals, the Direct Talisman Clerks, the Jade Lads, the Divine Maidens, and the envoys and officials of the Nine Heavens, totaling nine hundred million myriad beings, obtained the True Talismans of the Nine Heavens, the celestial writings in jade script, and the melodies of the Twelve Phoenixes’ mysterious songs. These were divided into two scrolls, the upper and the lower, stored upon a golden terrace within the Purple Chamber of the Nine Heavens, wrapped in brocade and sealed in a golden casket, locked with silver bolts in a jade chamber. The transmission was commanded to the Lady of Purple Tenuity, who was to bring them forth.

On the day of their unveiling, a pure wind swept through the forests, and the Threefold Simplicity’s clouds illuminated the ten directions. Divine radiance and mysterious brilliance suffused the chamber of the golden terrace. Thereupon, the Lady of Purple Tenuity knelt to receive them, while the True Demons and Kings of the Nine Heavens rejoiced and prostrated in homage.

The *Orthodox Writ of the Nine Heavens* of the Great Clarity’s Mysterious Elder, the *True Jade Emperor of the Cavern-Real and Spontaneous Emptiness*, was expounded within the grotto-chamber of the Jade Capital’s Flowery Mountain, amidst the rosy clouds and kingfisher plumes. At that time, forty million myriad golden lads and ninety million myriad jade maidens attended to his left and right. The grotto-chamber was spread with yellow gold, its couches of white silver, and when the Heavenly Worthy descended, the mats were of yellow and dark cloud brocade. The divine kings and immortals entreated, kneeling long to inquire of the Mysterious Emperor of the Nine Heavens:

*"We humbly hear that the Most High and the myriad sages, the Great Emperors, the jade hymns of the mysterious songs, the radiant splendor of cinnabar flowers, the soaring kingfisher phoenixes, and the dragon-drawn chariots journeyed afar to the capital of the Flowery Emperor. Together, they chanted the Nine Shao and the numinous hymns of Great Harmony, inscribing the cavern-real true writ upon stone to proclaim the Upper Origin’s Great Mystery of Tortoise Mountain, harmonizing with the immortals of the Nine Heavens’ cavern-chambers. The True King of Jade Emptiness commanded the demonic and numinous banners to review the registers of the thirty-two heavens, the canons of sun and moon, where clouds travel and rain descends, moistening the world below. A hundred flowers burgeon together, jade trees with branches of green, blossoms of cinnabar, fragrant gardens and fruit groves, the seven treasures and threefold radiance.*

*The Most High Heavenly Worthy, the Jade Lads of the Upper Clarity, the True Flower Jade Maidens, the Jeweled Chambers of Na Forest, transform and enlighten the multitudes. chunks.original_text: 尔时太真帝君、国主帝王、上圣领真、九天上帝，自然神仙丹晖日月龙章，仙人八术玄飞七景玉箓，隐地玄丹赤书玉诀，地真凤书可得尔不。 自从天地分判，百毒流行，蠢飞蠕动之类，仙人乘骑，众真云驾，来造皇庭。 百千圣真侍卫灵文，神童玉女对立真文，於金堂琼室七宝华林之中，渌水池上，与诸仙玉真、众龙王、天宝地神、八威九域百万仙官，手把香华麾幢之属，九色八节，立耀太空，日月同光，百籁缘流，天妓仙乐，珍禽异兽，百亿师子，巨虬千寻，无幽无明，照洞烛远，彻朗十方，飞真步空，游宴玉房，金台宝光，八肴之馔。 登仙洞龟山之中，朝茹琼芝，夕漱玉泉，俱来造焉。 十二玄龙，紫凤云虬，神禽圣灵之鸾，丹舆羽盖真骑，诸神丽景九色，五真玉京，五岳四渎，昆仑名山、河海龙神，真仙圣众，万亿九千八百重，灵云紫虚上丹诸君，从灵官来降我。 第一祝九天太真，紫虚九老仙都，百千万亿丈人圣真，八景皇灵，自然及虚无，映曜日月玄微。 尔时天官而说赞曰： 云紫上灵宫，自然百仙童。 文景映日月，九老粲华终。 月葩耀三阳，表此合四蒙。 煌煌群仙游，眇眇造上宫。 顿驾蓬莱岭，携侣步高峰。 日月光仙都，与戏王母墉。 一生超尘俗，谁能知此中。 朝翔太阳观，夕栖隐阆风。 众仙携俦侣，明昧自然冲。 玉女骑圣凤，神仙乘真龙，飘飘相从之，羽盖肃且恭。 命我王乔友，催手翔云中。 紫云我所游，混俗谁与同。 众仙戏云景，丹葩敷春阳。 莫不同此唱，仙真福道场。 皇驾停云侣，飘飘自翱翔。 瞻此八极外，谁力运长存。 日月同仁贤，虚谷谢朝光。 回此众仙童，谁知百岁方。 十圣迎兆身，善哉勿相忘。 顾语流俗士，此仙子未当。 千载昌朝卉，百年荣夕张。 众真游太华，仙人自翱翔。 回景戏九嶷，上与太真游。 眇眇群仙士，紫盖倾光柔。 停景顿曦和，神凤未阳谋。 太和翔阆风，会岭耀华舟。 九回同一观，顾盻莫同州。 眇眇太一宫，飘飘九岭俦。 日月粲华晖，回光照真浮。 翔鸾整晨旭，勖哉上真求。 亿兆不同劫，千载莫之尤。 明会合神童，九回任性周。 右一玄龙乘紫云造空唱赞记。 及此八坦八门，乃咒曰： 云飞上圣人，乃携太真君。 乘龙驾紫凤，乃造王母宫。 朝饵琼芝宝，夕漱玉池醴。 群游太阳观，众憩隐阆风。 俯戢九嶷岭，仰谢皇极中。 安步登五岭，控辔任性终。 服食养性长，千载永无穷。 尔有养性术，蕴心保虚冲。 尔时复有一人来诣上宫，降造灵玄拜九老、九天上真官属，乃问曰：上三天君、真官使官、仙都仆射，帛锦玄黄，乃命仙都侍郎，领玉童化仙玉女，来诣上坐，而复造玄。 若九宫命太玄都宫，仍命明仙太真老圣之官，命出龟仙洞室刻石真文三元真录吏兵玉童真仙使者，命出真天圣神仙官九老上圣，白日造空，同游紫虚焉。 伏见上真仙官刻石灵文玉字自然洞章五华赞诵二篇，其词曰： 上游五岭峰，群翔太华观。 三老诵玉章，三景洞文粲。 夕咏玉仙篇，朝游到晨晏。 千载谢群仙，万代谁知算。 眇眇五华土，湛淡九阳汉。 岭高众仙戏，景媚春卉烂。 携我游云峰，余心俟神旦。 文高百卉云，谁知云景清。 气暄丹木敷，绿叶映紫荣。 上我五峰峻，下游四渍灵。 玉皇灶洞中，乃见大清经。
chunks.translated_text:
At that time, the Supreme Perfection Sovereign Lord, the Lord of the Realm and King of Kings, the Upper Sages leading the Perfected, and the Nine Heavens’ Celestial Emperors—naturally divine immortals with cinnabar radiance, sun-and-moon dragon scripts, the Eight Arts of Immortals, the *Mysterious Flight* of the Seven Luminaries, and jade registers—concealed within the earth the *Mysterious Cinnabar* and *Vermilion Writ* jade formulas. Could the Earthly Perfected’s phoenix scripts be attained?

Since the separation of Heaven and Earth, the hundred poisons have spread, and all creatures—winged, crawling, and moving—along with immortals riding their mounts and the host of Perfected driving cloud chariots, have come to assemble at the imperial court. Hundreds and thousands of sagely Perfected stand guard over the numinous writs, while jade lads and maidens stand in attendance beside the true texts. Within the golden halls and jasper chambers, amidst the seven-jeweled floral groves by the emerald waters, they gather with the jade Perfected, the dragon kings, the celestial treasures and earthly spirits, the Eight Might and Nine Domains’ million-strong immortal officials. In their hands, they hold incense, flowers, banners, and canopies of nine hues and eight nodes, standing resplendent in the vast sky, their brilliance equal to the sun and moon. The hundred sounds flow in harmony, celestial maidens and immortal music fill the air, rare birds and strange beasts abound, a hundred million lions, giant serpents stretching a thousand fathoms—no darkness remains unilluminated, no distance left unlit. The ten directions are wholly radiant, as the flying Perfected tread the void, feasting in jade chambers, golden terraces aglow with precious light, and the eight delicacies laid before them.

Ascending the Cavern Tortoise Mountain to attain immortality, they sup on jasper mushrooms at dawn and rinse with jade springs at dusk, all coming to assemble here. The Twelve Mystic Dragons, purple phoenixes and cloud-serpents, divine birds and sagely *luan*-spirits, cinnabar carriages and feathered canopies of true mounts, the many gods’ resplendent nine-hued radiance, the Five Perfected of Jade Capital, the Five Peaks and Four Waterways, Kunlun’s famed mountains, the dragon spirits of rivers and seas—all the sagely hosts of Perfected and immortals, ten million times nine thousand eight hundred ranks, the cloud spirits of the *Purple Void* and Upper Cinnabar Lords, descend with the spirit officials to meet me.

First, the invocation to the Supreme Perfection of the Nine Heavens, the Nine Elders of the *Purple Void* Immortal Capital, the hundred thousand myriad venerable Perfected and sagely immortals, the *Eight Radiance* August Spirits, the natural and the void, illumining the sun, moon, and subtle mysteries.

At that time, the celestial officials spoke this eulogy:

Clouds and purple grace the Upper Numinous Palace,
Naturally a hundred immortal lads.
Literary radiance mirrors sun and moon,
The Nine Elders’ splendor everlasting.
Lunar blossoms gleam in the Three Yang,
Manifesting this union of the Four Vastnesses.
Resplendent, the host of immortals roam,
Infinitesimal, they ascend the Upper Palace.
Halting their chariots at Penglai’s ridge,
They lead companions to climb the lofty peaks.
Sun and moon illuminate the immortal capital,
Where they sport with the Queen Mother’s wall.
A lifetime transcends the mundane dust—
Who can fathom this realm?
At dawn they soar to the Sun Observation,
At dusk they rest in secluded Langfeng.
The immortals lead their companions,
Bright and dim, naturally harmonious.
Jade maidens ride sagely phoenixes,
Divine immortals mount true dragons,
Drifting together in graceful flight,
Feathered canopies solemn and reverent.
They summon me, Wang Qiao’s friend,
To join them soaring in the clouds.
Purple clouds are my domain—
Who in the mortal world shares this path?
The immortals sport amidst cloudscapes,
Cinnabar blossoms unfold in spring’s radiance.
None fail to sing this refrain,
The blessed Dao-ground of the Perfected.
The imperial chariot halts with cloud companions,
Drifting, drifting, they soar freely.
Gazing beyond the Eight Extremities—
Whose power sustains eternal existence?
Sun and moon share benevolence and wisdom,
The empty valley bids farewell to dawn’s light.
Turning to the host of immortal lads—
Who knows the measure of a century’s span?
The Ten Sages welcome the omen-body—
Excellent! Do not forget.
Addressing the worldly scholars,
These immortal lads are not for you.
A thousand years flourish like morning blossoms,
A hundred years bloom like evening’s splendor.
The host of Perfected roam Mount Taihua,
The immortals soar freely.
Turning their radiance to sport at the Nine Doubts,
Above, they wander with the Supreme Perfection.
Infinitesimal, the host of immortal scholars,
Purple canopies tilt with gentle light.
Halting their radiance to rest in harmonious dawn,
The divine phoenixes plot no schemes.
Supreme harmony soars in Langfeng,
Assembling at the ridge, their floral barges gleam.
Nine circuits share one vision—
Gazing back, none share this realm.
Infinitesimal, the Supreme Unity’s palace,
Drifting, drifting, the companions of the Nine Ridges.
Sun and moon gleam with floral radiance,
Their light illumines the true floating.
Soaring *luan*-birds arrange the morning dawn—
Strive on, seekers of the Upper Perfection!
Countless kalpas differ in measure,
A thousand years pass without blame.
Illuminating meetings with divine lads,
Nine circuits follow nature’s course.

To the right: *One Mystic Dragon Riding Purple Clouds to Soar the Void and Chant Eulogies*, recorded.

And these Eight Levels and Eight Gates, thus the incantation:

Clouds fly, Upper Sagely Ones,
Who lead the Supreme Perfection Lord.
Riding dragons, driving purple phoenixes,
They come to the Queen Mother’s palace.
At dawn they feast on jasper mushrooms and treasures,
At dusk they rinse with jade pool’s sweet wine.
Roaming together at the Sun Observation,
Resting amidst secluded Langfeng.
Bowing below the Nine Doubts’ ridge,
Looking up to the imperial center’s zenith.
Stepping calmly to ascend the Five Ridges,
Guiding reins to follow nature’s end.
Ingesting and nourishing to cultivate longevity,
A thousand years without end.
You possess the art of nurturing nature—
Cherish the void and preserve harmony.

At that time, another arrived at the Upper Palace, descending to the Numinous Mystery to bow before the Nine Elders and the Nine Heavens’ Upper Perfection officials. They inquired: The Lords of the Three Upper Heavens, the Perfected and Envoys, the Immortal Capital’s Chief Ministers, the silk brocades of mysterious yellow—then commanded the Immortal Capital’s Attendants to lead the jade lads and transformed immortal maidens to the upper seat, and again to proceed to the Mystery.

If the Nine Palaces command the Supreme Mystery Capital, then summon the *Bright Immortal* and *Supreme Perfection* venerable sagely officials, and command the Tortoise Immortal’s Cavern Chamber to inscribe the stone true writs, the Three Primes’ Perfected registers, the jade lads, Perfected immortals, and envoys. Command the true celestial sagely immortal officials, the Nine Elders and Upper Sages, to ascend in broad daylight, together roaming the *Purple Void*.

We prostrate to see the Upper Perfection immortal officials inscribing the stone numinous writs and jade characters, the natural cavern chapters of the Five Florals’ two eulogies. Their words:

Above, roaming the Five Ridges’ peaks,
Together soaring at Taihua’s observation.
The Three Elders chant jade chapters,
The Three Radiance cavern texts resplendent.
At dusk they recite the jade immortals’ verses,
At dawn they wander until morning’s end.
A thousand years bid farewell to the host of immortals—
Who through ten thousand generations can fathom the reckoning?
Infinitesimal, the Five Florals’ earth,
Serene, the Nine Yang’s Han.
The ridge’s heights host the immortals’ play,
Radiant scenes, spring blossoms in full bloom.
Leading me to roam the cloud peaks,
My heart awaits the divine dawn.
Lofty as a hundred blossoms’ clouds—
Who knows the cloudscape’s clarity?
Warm qi unfolds the cinnabar trees,
Green leaves reflect purple glory.
Above, I ascend the Five Peaks’ heights,
Below, I wander the Four Streams’ numina.
Within the Jade Sovereign’s cavern hearth,
I behold the *Great Clarity* scriptures.

How sublime the jade-true texts!

Departing the valleys’ lingering,

chunks.original_text: 灵清回光七曜玉华灵丹日月八术自然龟山龙轩各七千万乘。 灵清回光七曜玉华灵丹日月八术自然龟山云軿各七千万乘。 灵清回光七曜玉华灵丹日月八卫自然龟山琼轮各七千万乘。 灵清回光七曜玉华灵丹日月八卫自然龟山羽盖各七千万乘。 灵清回光七曜玉华灵丹日月八术自然龟山龙车各七千万乘。 灵清回光七曜玉华灵丹日月八术自然龟山凤翼各七千万乘。 灵清回光七曜玉华灵丹日月八术自然龟山飞虬各七千万乘。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山上晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山中晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山下晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山前晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山后晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山左晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山右晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九玄绿晖丹曜洞灵自然龟山都晖玉华真人各九亿万重。 九皇丹灵之丹耀推之章刻望真人之文，以传紫微夫人者。 右紫微夫人服之十年，自然升云，金台之座对西王母，与众仙为侣。 服者可朱书紫缯上。 龟山洞室中自然天书真文。 右清虚真人服之九年，自然登空洞之台，与众圣上真为侣。 服者可朱书紫素上。 龟山左洞中金真黄景自然天文。 右真华玉童服之三十年，乃得升天。 以黄书碧缯上。 右洞之中青书绿石，刻作自然真文，传后仙人，慎之慎之。 右此符，服时可青书黄素。 右四符，青书白素缯上，悬之四方，伏制魔王，恶鬼之徒，皆令摄伏。 众仙上圣，悉得游行上清之上，升紫虚之中，与上神帝王神仙，同时上造紫台玉京名山之上，与群仙众真共说妙经已竟，便造龟山元洞，得此真文，以太上丈人老君诸圣云尔。 上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓卷下竟 #1此卷原本作卷中，据其内容，应为卷下。

The Cinnabar Radiance of Nine Sovereigns’ Numinous Elixir, the inscribed chapter of *Pushing the Luminaries*, the script of the Perfected Gazing Afar, transmitted by the Lady of Purple Tenuity.
Consuming this for ten years, the Lady of Purple Tenuity naturally ascended upon clouds to the Golden Terrace, facing the Queen Mother of the West, and became companion to the host of immortals.
The practitioner may write this in vermilion upon purple silk.

The natural celestial script of the Heavenly Writ within Tortoise Mountain’s cavern chamber.
Consuming this for nine years, the Perfected of Pure Emptiness naturally ascended to the Terrace of Cavernous Empyrean, becoming companion to the host of sagely perfected.
The practitioner may write this in vermilion upon purple plain silk.

The golden perfection and yellow radiance of the natural celestial writ within Tortoise Mountain’s left cavern.
Consuming this for thirty years, the Jade Youth of True Splendor may ascend to heaven.
Write this in yellow upon azure silk.

Within the right cavern, inscribe in blue-green upon green stone the natural writ of the perfected, transmitting it to later immortals—be cautious, be most cautious.
When consuming this talisman, write it in blue-green upon yellow plain silk.

For these four talismans, inscribe in blue-green upon white plain silk and hang them in the four directions to subdue demon kings, evil spirits, and their ilk, compelling them to submit.
All immortals and sagely perfected may then roam above the Upper Clarity, ascend into the Purple Void, and together with the divine emperors and transcendents of the highest heavens, ascend to the Purple Terrace and Jade Capital atop the sacred mountains. With the host of immortals and perfected, the recitation of the wondrous scriptures complete, they then enter the Primordial Cavern of Tortoise Mountain to obtain this true writ. Thus say the Most High Venerable Lord, the Elder Lord, and all the sages.

*The Upper Scripture of the Treasure of Primordial Transformation of the Most High, Nine Numinous Wonders of the Mysterious Register of Tortoise Mountain, Final Scroll of the Upper Clarity* concluded.
